original: 245. Rūpabhavapañhe – sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṃ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṃ. Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṃ.

original: 256. Adhimokkhapañhe – dvīhi dhātūhīti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi. Pannarasahīti sesāhi dasahi rūpadhātūhi, pañcahi ca cakkhuviññāṇādīhi.

analyzed: neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhamma pañhe pañcahi iti cakkhu viññāṇa ādīhi anupādinna anupādāniya pañhe

analyzed: sesā pīti sahagatā tattha vicāraḥ vicārena pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttā ati saṅkhāra kkhandha dhamma āyatana dhamma dhātūsu

original: Cha padāni tato uddhaṃ sabbānipi samāsato;
analyzed: cha padāni tatas uddham sabbāni api samāsatas

original: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā”ti.
analyzed: padāni ca na labbhanti cattālīsam ca satta ca ati

original: Pariyosāne ca – dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttā. Imāni
analyzed: pariyosāne ca dhamma āyatanam dhammadhātu iti gāthā api imam eva attham dīpetum vuttā imāni

original: pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti. Tesu khandhādivibhāgo vuttanayānusāreneva veditabboti.
analyzed: pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbāni api labbhanti tesu khandha ādi vibhāgaḥ vutta naya anusārena iva veditabbaḥ ti

original: Vippayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: vippayuttena saṅgahita asaṅgahita pada vaṇṇanā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Dhātuppabhedakusalo, yaṃ dhātukathaṃ tathāgato āha;
analyzed: dhātu ppabheda kusalaḥ yam dhātu katham tathāgataḥ āha

original: Tassā nayamukhabheda-ppakāsanaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tassā naya mukha bheda pakāsanam niṭṭhitam hoti

original: Iminā nayamukhabheda-ppakāsanena hi vibhāvinā sakkā;
analyzed: iminā naya mukha bheda ppakāsanena hi vibhāvinā sakkā

original: Ñātuṃ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
analyzed: ñātum sabbe pi nayā iti vuttā

original: Ekekassa pana sace, padassa vitthārameva bhāseyyaṃ;
analyzed: ekekassa pana sace padassa vitthāram eva bhāseyyam

original: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṃ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
analyzed: vacanam ca ativiya bahum bhaveyya attho ca avisesaḥ

original: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṃ tantiyā mayā etaṃ;
analyzed: iti ūna bhāṇa vāra dvayāya yam tantiyāḥ mayā etam

original: Kurunā pattaṃ puññaṃ, sukhāya taṃ hotu lokassāti.
analyzed: kurunā pattam puññam sukhāya tam hotu lokassa ati

original: Dhātukathā-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhātu kathā aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā

original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Abhidhammapiṭake
analyzed: abhidhamma piṭake

original: Puggalapaññatti-aṭṭhakathā
analyzed: puggala paññatti aṭṭhakathā

original: Nipuṇatthaṃ pakaraṇaṃ, dhātubhedappakāsano;
analyzed: nipuṇattham pakaraṇam dhātu bheda pakāsano

original: Satthā dhātukathaṃ nāma, desayitvā surālaye.
analyzed: satthā dhātu katham nāma desayitvā surālaye

original: Anantaraṃ tassa jino, paññattibhedadīpanaṃ;
analyzed: anantaram tassa jino paññatti bheda dīpanam

original: Āha puggalapaññattiṃ, yaṃ loke aggapuggalo.
analyzed: āha puggala paññattim yam loke agga puggalo

original: Tassā saṃvaṇṇanokāso, yasmā dāni upāgato;
analyzed: tassā saṃvaṇṇanā ukāsaḥ yasmā dāni upāgataḥ

original: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
analyzed: tasmai nam vaṇṇayissāmi tam suṇātha samāhitā iti

original: 1. Mātikāvaṇṇanā
1. Cha paññattiyo – khandhapaññatti…pe… puggalapaññattīti ayaṃ tāva puggalapaññattiyā
analyzed: cha paññattiyaḥ khandha paññatti pe puggala paññatti iti ayam tāva puggala paññattiyā

original: uddeso. Tattha chāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena ye dhamme idha paññapetukāmo tesaṃ gaṇanavasena
analyzed: uddeso tattha cha ati gaṇana paricchedo tena ye dhamme idha paññapetu kāmo tesam gaṇana vasena

original: saṃkhepato paññattiparicchedaṃ dasseti. Paññattiyoti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ.
analyzed: saṃkhepato paññatti paricchedam dasseti paññattiyā ti paricchinna dhamma nidassanam

original: Tattha “ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”ti āgataṭṭhāne paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā
analyzed: tattha ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti iti āgata ṭṭhāne paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā

original: paññatti nāma. “Supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭha”nti āgataṭṭhāne ṭhapanā nikkhipanā paññatti
analyzed: paññatti nāma su paññattam mañca pīṭhanti āgata ṭṭhāne ṭhapanā nikkhipanā paññatti

original: nāma. Idha ubhayampi vaṭṭati. Cha paññattiyoti hi cha paññāpanā, cha dassanā pakāsanātipi;
analyzed: nāma idha ubhayampi vaṭṭati cha paññattiyo ti hi cha paññāpanā cha dassanā pakāsanā atipi

original: cha ṭhapanā nikkhipanātipi idha adhippetameva. Nāmapaññatti hi te te dhamme dassetipi,
analyzed: cha ṭhapanā nikkhipanā atipi idha adhippetam eva nāma paññatti hi te te dhamme dasse tipi

original: tena tena koṭṭhāsena ṭhapetipi.
analyzed: tena tena koṭṭhāsena

original: Khandhapaññattītiādi pana saṃkhepato tāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Tattha khandhānaṃ
analyzed: khandha paññatti itiādi pana saṃkhepato tāsam paññattīnam sarūpa dassanam tattha khandhānam

original: ‘khandhā’ti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā khandhapaññatti nāma. Āyatanānaṃ

original: āyatanānīti, dhātūnaṃ dhātuyoti, saccānaṃ saccānīti, indriyānaṃ indriyānīti, puggalānaṃ

original: puggalāti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā puggalapaññatti nāma.
analyzed: puggala ati paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā puggala paññatti nāma

original: Pāḷimuttakena pana aṭṭhakathānayena aparāpi cha paññattiyo – vijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānapaññatti,
analyzed: pāḷimuttakena pana aṭṭhakathā nayena aparā api cha paññattiyaḥ vijjamāna paññatti a vijjamāna paññatti

original: vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti, vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti,
analyzed: vijjamānena a vijjamāna paññatti a vijjamānena vijjamāna paññatti vijjamānena vijjamāna paññatti

original: avijjamānena avijjamānapaññattīti. Tattha kusalākusalasseva saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena
analyzed: a vijjamānena a vijjamāna paññatti iti tattha kusala akusalassa iva saccikaṭṭha paramattha vasena

original: vijjamānassa sato sambhūtassa dhammassa paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti nāma. Tathā avijjamānassa
analyzed: vijjamānassa sataḥ sambhūtassa dhammassa paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti nāma tathā a vijjamānassa

original: lokaniruttimattasiddhassa itthipurisādikassa paññāpanā avijjamānapaññatti nāma. Sabbākārenapi
analyzed: loka nirutti matta siddhassa itthi purisa ādikassa paññāpanā avijjamānapaññatti nāma sabba ākārena pi

original: anupalabbhaneyyassa vācāvatthumattasseva pañcamasaccādikassa titthiyānaṃ aṇupakatipurisādikassa
analyzed: anupalabbhaneyyassa vācā vatthumattassa iva pañcama sacca ādikassa titthiyānam aṇupakati purisa ādikassa

original: vā paññāpanāpi avijjamānapaññattiyeva. Sā pana sāsanāvacarā na hotīti idha na gahitā.
analyzed: vā paññāpanā api a vijjamāna paññattiyā iva sā pana sāsanāvacarā na hoti iti idha na gahitā

original: Iti imesaṃ vijjamānāvijjamānānaṃ vikappanavasena sesā veditabbā. ‘Tevijjo’, ‘chaḷabhiñño’tiādīsu
analyzed: iti imesam vijjamāna a vijjamānānam vikappana vasena sesā veditabbā tevijjaḥ chaḷabhiñño ti ādīsu

original: hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā ca vijjamānā, puggalo avijjamāno. Tasmā tisso vijjā assāti
analyzed: hi tissaḥ vijjā cha abhiññā ca vijjamānā puggalo a vijjamānaḥ tasmā tissaḥ vijjāḥ assa ati

original: tevijjo, cha abhiññā assāti chaḷabhiññoti evaṃ vijjamānena avijjamānassa paññāpanato

analyzed: evarūpā vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma itthi rūpam purisa rūpa nti ādīsu pana

analyzed: rūpam purisa rūpam ti evam a vijjamānena vijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpāḥ a vijjamānena

original: vijjamānapaññatti nāma. Cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphassotiādīsu cakkhusotādayopi phassopi
analyzed: vijjamāna paññatti nāma cakkhu samphasso sota samphassaḥ ti ādīsu cakkhu sota ādayaḥ api phassaḥ api

analyzed: samphasso cakkhu samphasso ti evam vijjamānena vijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā vijjamānena

original: vijjamānapaññatti nāma. Khattiyaputto, brāhmaṇaputto, seṭṭhiputtotiādīsu khattiyādayopi
analyzed: vijjamānapaññatti nāma khattiya putto brāhmaṇa putto seṭṭhi putto ti ādīsu khattiya ādayaḥ api

analyzed: a vijjamānā puttaḥ api tasmā khattiyassa putto khattiya putto ti evam a vijjamānena a vijjamānassa

original: paññāpanato evarūpā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma. Tāsu imasmiṃ pakaraṇe purimā
analyzed: paññāpanataḥ evarūpā a vijjamānena a vijjamāna paññatti nāma tāsu imasmin pakaraṇe purimā

original: tissova paññattiyo labbhanti. “Khandhapaññatti…pe… indriyapaññattī”ti imasmiñhi ṭhāne
analyzed: tissaḥ uva paññattiyaḥ labbhanti khandha paññatti pe indriya paññatti iti imasmin hi ṭhāne

analyzed: vijjamānassa iva paññāpita ttā vijjamāna paññatti labbhati puggala paññatti iti pade

original: avijjamānapaññatti. Parato pana ‘tevijjo’, ‘chaḷabhiñño’tiādīsu vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti labbhatīti.
analyzed: avijjamāna paññatti paratas pana tevijjaḥ chaḍabhiñño ti ādīsu vijjamānena avijjamāna paññatti labbhati iti

original: Aṭṭhakathāmuttakena pana ācariyanayena aparāpi cha paññattiyo – upādāpaññatti, upanidhāpaññatti,
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā muttakena pana ācariya nayena aparā api cha paññattiyaḥ upādā paññatti upanidhā paññatti

original: samodhānapaññatti, upanikkhittapaññatti, tajjāpaññatti, santatipaññattīti. Tattha
analyzed: samodhāna paññatti upanikkhitta paññatti tajjā paññatti santati paññatti iti tattha

analyzed: anupalabbha sabhāvaḥ api rūpa vedanā ādi bhede khandhe upādāya nissāya kāraṇam katvā sammataḥ

original: satto. Tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya ratho gehaṃ muṭṭhi uddhananti ca; te teyeva rūpādayo
analyzed: tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya rathaḥ geham uddhananti ca te rūpa ādayaḥ

original: upādāya ghaṭo paṭo; candasūriyaparivattādayo upādāya kālo, disā; taṃ taṃ bhūtanimittañceva

analyzed: ca isā paññatti nāma na paññāpana ṭṭhena yā pana tassa atthassa paññāpanā ayam a vijjamāna paññattiyā iva

original: Yā paṭhamadutiyādīni upanidhāya dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādikā, aññamaññañca upanidhāya dīghaṃ
analyzed: yā paṭhama dutiya ādīni upanidhāya dutiyam tatiya nti ādikā aññam aññam ca upanidhāya dīgham

analyzed: rassam dūram santikam ti ādikā paññāpanā ayam upanidhā paññatti nāma apica isā upanidhā paññatti

original: – tadaññāpekkhūpanidhā, hatthagatūpanidhā, sampayuttūpanidhā, samāropitūpanidhā,
analyzed: tad aññā apekkhū panidhā hatthagata upanidhā sampayuttu upanidhā samāropitu upanidhā

original: avidūragatūpanidhā, paṭibhāgūpanidhā, tabbahulūpanidhā, tabbisiṭṭhūpanidhātiādinā
analyzed: avidūra gatūpanidhā paṭibhāgūpanidhā tad bahulūpanidhā tad bisiṭṭhūpanidhā iti ādinā

original: bhedena anekappakārā.
analyzed: bhedena aneka ppakārā

original: Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādikāva tadaññaṃ apekkhitvā vuttatāya tadaññāpekkhūpanidhā
analyzed: tattha dutiyam tatiya nti ādikā ava tad aññam apekkhitvā vutta tāya tad añña apekkhu upanidhā

original: nāma. Chattapāṇi, satthapāṇītiādikā hatthagataṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya hatthagatūpanidhā
analyzed: nāma chatta pāṇi sattha pāṇi iti ādikā hattha gatam upanidhāya vutta tāya hatthagata upanidhā

original: nāma. Kuṇḍalī, sikharī, kiriṭītiādikā sampayuttaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya sampayuttūpanidhā
analyzed: nāma kuṇḍalī sikharī kiriṭī iti ādikā sampayuttam upanidhāya vutta tāya sampayuttu upanidhā

original: nāma. Dhaññasakaṭaṃ, sappikumbhotiādikā samāropitaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya samāropitūpanidhā
analyzed: nāma dhañña sakaṭam sappi kumbha uti ādikā samāropitam upanidhāya vutta tāya samāropitūpanidhā

original: nāma. Indasālaguhā, piyaṅguguhā, serīsakantiādikā avidūragataṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya
analyzed: nāma indasālaguhā piyaṅguguhā serīsakanti ādikā avidūra gatam upanidhāya vutta tāya

original: avidūragatūpanidhā nāma. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, usabhagāmītiādikā paṭibhāgaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya

original: paṭibhāgūpanidhā nāma. Padumassaro, brāhmaṇagāmotiādikā tabbahulaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya
analyzed: paṭibhāgūpanidhā nāma padumassaraḥ brāhmaṇagāmaḥ iti ādikā tad bahulam upanidhāya vutta tāya

original: tabbahulūpanidhā nāma. Maṇikaṭakaṃ, vajirakaṭakantiādikā tabbisiṭṭhaṃ upanidhāya
analyzed: nāma maṇi kaṭakam vajira kaṭakam ti ādikā tat visiṭṭham upanidhāya

original: vuttatāya tabbisiṭṭhūpanidhā nāma.
analyzed: vutta tāya tad bisiṭṭhūpanidhā nāma

original: Yā pana tesaṃ tesaṃ samodhānamapekkhitvā tidaṇḍaṃ, aṭṭhapadaṃ, dhaññarāsi, puppharāsītiādikā
analyzed: yā pana tesam tesam samodhānam apekkhitvā ti daṇḍam aṭṭhapadam dhañña rāsi puppha rāsi iti ādikā

original: paññāpanā, ayaṃ samodhānapaññatti nāma. Yā purimassa purimassa upanikkhipitvā dve,
analyzed: paññāpanā ayam samodhāna paññatti nāma yā purimassa purimassa upanikkhipitvā dve

original: tīṇi, cattārītiādikā paññāpanā, ayaṃ upanikkhittapaññatti nāma. Yā taṃ taṃ dhammasabhāvaṃ
analyzed: tīṇi cattāri iti ādikā paññāpanā ayam upanikkhittapaññatti nāma yā tam tam dhamma sabhāvam

original: apekkhitvā pathavī, tejo, kakkhaḷatā, uṇhatātiādikā paññāpanā, ayaṃ tajjāpaññatti
analyzed: apekkhitvā pathavī tejaḥ kakkhaḷa tā uṇha tā ati ādikā paññāpanā ayam

original: nāma. Yā pana santativicchedābhāvaṃ apekkhitvā āsītiko, nāvutikotiādikā paññāpanā,
analyzed: nāma yā pana santati viccheda abhāvam apekkhitvā āsītikaḥ nāvutikaḥ ti ādikā paññāpanā

original: ayaṃ santatipaññatti nāma. Etāsu pana tajjāpaññatti vijjamānapaññattiyeva. Sesā avijjamānapakkhañceva,

original: avijjamānena avijjamānapakkhañca bhajanti.
analyzed: a vijjamānena a vijjamāna pakkhañca bhajanti

original: Aṭṭhakathāmuttakena ācariyanayeneva aparāpi cha paññattiyo – kiccapaññatti, saṇṭhānapaññatti,

original: liṅgapaññatti, bhūmipaññatti, paccattapaññatti, asaṅkhatapaññattīti. Tattha bhāṇako,
analyzed: liṅga paññatti bhūmi paññatti paccatta paññatti asaṅkhata paññatti iti tattha bhāṇakaḥ

original: dhammakathikotiādikā kiccavasena paññāpanā kiccapaññatti nāma. Kiso, thūlo, parimaṇḍalo,

original: 3. Kuppadhammākuppadhammaniddesesu – yassa adhigato samāpattidhammo kuppati nassati,

original: 4. Akuppadhammaniddeso vuttapaṭipakkhavaseneva veditabbo. Akuppadhammoti idaṃ pana

analyzed: evam hi paṭipajjantaḥ anurakkhati nāma saḥ na parihāyati itaro parihāyati

analyzed: sevati saḥ te sevantaḥ samāpattitaḥ na parihāyati

original: 9. Puthujjananiddese – tīṇi saṃyojanānīti diṭṭhisaṃyojanasīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanavicikicchāsaṃyojanāni.
analyzed: puthujjana niddese tīṇi saṃyojanāni iti diṭṭhi saṃyojana sīlabbata parāmāsa saṃyojana vicikicchā saṃyojanāni

analyzed: idha kathitaḥ iti veditabbo

original: kathaṃ bhavissasī’ti duggatibhayaṃ bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭaṃyeva

original: tayo sekkhā duggatiṃ atītattā sesāni tīṇi bhayāni bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karonti. Maggaṭṭhakasekkhā
analyzed: tayo sekkhāḥ duggatim sesāni tīṇi bhayāni bhāyitvā pāpam na karonti maggaṭṭhaka sekkhāḥ

original: āgamanavasena vā asamucchinnabhayattā vā bhayūparatā nāma honti. Khīṇāsavo imesu
analyzed: āgamana vasena vā asamucchinna bhayattāḥ vā bhayūparatāḥ nāma honti khīṇa asavaḥ imesu

original: catūsu bhayesu ekampi na bhāyati. So hi sabbaso samucchinnabhayo; tasmā abhayūparatoti
analyzed: catūsu bhayesu ekam pi na bhāyati saḥ hi sabbaso samucchinna bhayo tasmai

original: vuccati. Kiṃ pana so upavādampi na bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati. Upavādaṃ pana rakkhatīti
analyzed: vuccati kim pana so upavādam pi na bhāyati iti na bhāyati upavādam pana rakkhati iti

original: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Doṇuppalavāpigāme khīṇāsavatthero viya.
analyzed: vattum vaṭṭati khīṇāsava ttheraḥ viya

original: 12. Abhabbāgamananiddese – sammattaniyāmāgamanassa abhabboti abhabbāgamano. Kammāvaraṇenāti
analyzed: abhabba āgamana niddese sammatta niyāma āgamanassa abhabbaḥ ti abhabba āgamanaḥ kamma āvaraṇena ati

original: pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena. Kilesāvaraṇenāti niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā. Vipākāvaraṇenāti
analyzed: pañcavidhena ānantariya kammena kilesa āvaraṇena ati niyatam icchādiṭṭhiyāḥ vipāka āvaraṇena ati

original: ahetukaduhetukapaṭisandhiyā. Assaddhāti buddhadhammasaṅghesu saddhārahitā. Acchandikāti
analyzed: ahetuka duhetuka paṭisandhiyā assaddhā ati buddha dhamma saṅghesu saddhā rahitā acchandikā ati

original: kattukamyatākusalacchandarahitā. Te ṭhapetvā jambudīpaṃ itaradīpattayavāsino veditabbā.
analyzed: kattu kamyatā kusala chanda rahitā te ṭhapetvā jambudīpam itara dīpa ttaya vāsinaḥ veditabbā

original: Tesu hi manussā acchandikabhāvaṃ paviṭṭhā nāma. Duppaññāti bhavaṅgapaññārahitā. Abhabbāti
analyzed: tesu hi manussāḥ acchandika bhāvam paviṭṭhāḥ nāma duppaññā ati bhavaṅga paññā rahitāḥ abhabbā ati

original: appaṭiladdhamaggaphalūpanissayā. Niyāmanti magganiyāmaṃ, sammattaniyāmaṃ. Okkamitunti
analyzed: a paṭiladdha magga phala upanissayāḥ niyāmanti magga niyāmam sammatta niyāmam okkamitunti

original: etaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattasaṅkhātaṃ niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ pavisituṃ tattha patiṭṭhātuṃ abhabbā.
analyzed: etam kusalesu dhammesu sammatta saṅkhātam niyāmam okkamitum pavisitum tattha patiṭṭhātum abhabbā

original: 13. Bhabbāgamananiddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo. Evamimasmiṃ duke ye ca puggalā
analyzed: bhabba āgamana niddesaḥ vutta paṭipakkha nayena veditabbaḥ evam imasmin duke ye ca puggalāḥ

original: pañcānantariyakā, ye ca niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā, yehi ca ahetukaduhetukapaṭisandhi gahitā,
analyzed: pañca ānantariyakāḥ ye ca niyatam icchādiṭṭhikāḥ yehi ca ahetuka duhetuka paṭisandhi gahitā

original: ye ca buddhādīnaṃ na saddahanti, yesañca kattukamyatāchando natthi, ye ca aparipuṇṇabhavaṅgapaññā,
analyzed: ye ca buddha ādīnam na saddahanti yesam ca kattu kamya tā chandaḥ natthi ye ca a paripuṇṇa bhavaṅga paññā

original: yesañca maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi, te sabbepi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamituṃ abhabbā,
analyzed: yesam ca magga phalānam upanissayaḥ natthi te sabbe pi sammatta niyāmam okkamitum abhabbā

original: viparītā bhabbāti vuttā.
analyzed: viparītā bhabbā ati vuttā

original: 14. Niyatāniyataniddese – ānantarikāti āntarikakammasamaṅgino. Micchādiṭṭhikāti niyatamicchādiṭṭhisamaṅgino.
analyzed: niyata aniyata niddese ānantarikā ati āntarika kamma samaṅginaḥ micchādiṭṭhikā ati niyata micchādiṭṭhi samaṅginaḥ

original: Sabbepi hete nirayassa atthāya niyatattā niyatā nāma. Aṭṭha pana ariyapuggalā sammābhāvāya
analyzed: sabbe pi ha ete nirayassa atthāya niyata ttā niyatāḥ nāma aṭṭha pana ariya puggalā sammābhāvāya

original: uparūparimaggaphalatthāya ceva anupādāparinibbānatthāya ca niyatattā niyatā nāma.
analyzed: upari upari magga phala atthāya ca iva anupādā parinibbāna atthāya ca niyata ttā niyatā nāma

original: Avasesapuggalā pana anibaddhagatikā. Yathā ākāse khittadaṇḍo pathaviyaṃ patanto ‘aggena
analyzed: avasesa puggalāḥ pana anibaddha gatikāḥ yathā ākāse khitta daṇḍaḥ pathaviyam patantaḥ aggena

original: vā majjhena vā mūlena vā patissatī’ti na ñāyati; evameva ‘asukagatiyā nāma nibbattissantī’ti
analyzed: vā majjhena vā mūlena vā patissati iti na ñāyati evam eva asuka gatiyā nāma nibbattissanti iti

original: niyamābhāvā aniyatā nāmāti veditabbā. Yā pana uttarakurukānaṃ niyatagatikatā vuttā,
analyzed: niyama abhāvā aniyatā nāma ati veditabbā yā pana uttarakurukānam niyata gatika tā vuttā

original: na sā niyatadhammavasena. Micchattasammattaniyatadhammāyeva hi niyatā nāma. Tesañca
analyzed: na sā niyata dhamma vasena hi niyatā nāma tesam ca

original: vasenāyaṃ puggalaniyamo kathitoti.
analyzed: vasena ayam puggala niyamo kathito ti

original: 15. Paṭipannakaniddese – maggasamaṅginoti maggaṭṭhakapuggalā. Te hi phalatthāya paṭipannattā
analyzed: paṭipannaka niddese magga samaṅgino ti magga ṭṭhaka puggalā te hi phala tthāya

original: paṭipannakā nāma. Phalasamaṅginoti phalapaṭilābhasamaṅgitāya phalasamaṅgino. Phalapaṭilābhato
analyzed: paṭipannakāḥ nāma phala samaṅginaḥ ti phala paṭilābha samaṅgi tāya phala samaṅginaḥ phala paṭilābhataḥ

original: paṭṭhāya hi te phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpannāpi phale ṭhitāyeva nāma.
analyzed: paṭṭhāya hi te phala samāpattim a samāpannā api phale ṭhitāya iva nāma

original: 16. Samasīsīniddese – apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā, ekappahārenevāti attho. Pariyādānanti
analyzed: sama sīsī niddese apubbam acarimanti apure apacchā eka ppahārena iva ati attho pariyādānam ti

original: parikkhayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo samasīsī nāma vuccati. So panesa tividho
analyzed: parikkhayaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam puggalo samasīsī nāma vuccati so pana isa tividhaḥ

original: hoti – iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti. Tattha yo caṅkamantova
analyzed: hoti iriyāpatha samasīsī roga samasīsī jīvita samasīsī iti tattha yaḥ caṅkamanto uva

original: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā caṅkamantova parinibbāti padumatthero viya;
analyzed: vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam patvā caṅkamantaḥ iva parinibbāti paduma theraḥ viya

original: ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā ṭhitakova parinibbāti koṭapabbatavihāravāsītissatthero
analyzed: ṭhitakaḥ iva vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam patvā ṭhitakaḥ uva parinibbāti koṭapabbata vihāra vāsī tissa thero

original: viya; nisinnova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nisinnova parinibbāti, nipannova
analyzed: viya nisinnaḥ iva vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam patvā nisinnaḥ iva parinibbāti nipannaḥ iva

original: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nipannova parinibbāti – ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma.
analyzed: vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam patvā nipannaḥ uva parinibbāti ayam iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma

original: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāti – ayaṃ rogasamasīsī nāma.
analyzed: yaḥ pana ekam rogam patvā vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam patvā tena iva rogena parinibbāti ayam rogasamasīsī nāma

original: Kataro jīvitasamasīsī nāma? “Sīsanti terasa sīsāni – palibodhasīsañca taṇhā, vinibandhanasīsañca
analyzed: kataraḥ jīvitasamasīsī nāma sīsanti sīsāni palibodha sīsam ca taṇhā vinibandhana sīsam ca

original: māno, parāmāsasīsañca diṭṭhi, vikkhepasīsañca uddhaccaṃ, saṃkilesasīsañca avijjā,
analyzed: māno parāmāsa sīsam ca diṭṭhi vikkhepa sīsam ca uddhaccam saṃkilesa sīsam ca avijjā

original: adhimokkhasīsañca saddhā, paggahasīsañca vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsañca sati, avikkhepasīsañca
analyzed: adhimokkha sīsam ca saddhā paggaha sīsam ca vīriyam upaṭṭhāna sīsam ca sati avikkhepa sīsam ca

original: samādhi, dassanasīsañca paññā, pavattasīsañca jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsañca vimokkho,
analyzed: samādhi dassana sīsañca paññā pavatta sīsañca jīvitindriyam gocara sīsañca vimokkhaḥ

original: saṅkhārasīsañca nirodho”ti. Tattha kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati.
analyzed: saṅkhāra sīsam ca nirodho ti tattha kilesa sīsam avijjam arahatta maggo

original: Pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati. Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
analyzed: pavatta sīsam jīvita indriyam cuti cittam pariyādiyati avijjā pariyādāyakam cittam jīvita indriyam

original: pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: pariyādātum na sakkoti jīvitindriya pariyādāyakam cittam avijjam pariyādātum na sakkoti

original: Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ aññaṃ, jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ aññaṃ. Yassa cetaṃ
analyzed: avijjā pariyādāyakam cittam aññam jīvitindriya pariyādāyakam cittam aññam yassa cetaṃ

original: sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati, so jīvitasamasīsī nāma.
analyzed: sīsa dvayam samam pariyādānam gacchati saḥ jīvitasamasīsī nāma

original: Kathamidaṃ samaṃ hotīti? Vārasamatāya. Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti – sotāpattimagge
analyzed: katham idam samam hoti iti vāra samatāya yasmin hi vāre magga vuṭṭhānam hoti sa utāpatti magge

original: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni, sakadāgāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge cattārīti
analyzed: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni sakadāgāmi magge pañca anāgāmi magge pañca arahatta magge cattāri iti

original: ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyati. Imāya
analyzed: ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgam otaritvā parinibbāyati imāya

original: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānaṃ samaṃ hoti nāma. Tenāyaṃ puggalo jīvitasamasīsīti
analyzed: vāra samatāya idam ubhaya sīsa pariyādānam samam hoti nāma tena ayam puggalaḥ jīvita sama sīsī iti

original: vuccati. Ayameva ca idha adhippeto.
analyzed: vuccati ayam eva ca idha adhippetaḥ

original: 17. Ṭhitakappīniddese – ṭhito kappoti ṭhitakappo, ṭhitakappo assa atthīti ṭhitakappī.
analyzed: ṭhitakappīniddese ṭhitaḥ kappo ti ṭhita kappo ṭhita kappo assa atthi iti ṭhitakappī

original: Kappaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthoti attho. Uḍḍayhanavelā assāti jhāyanakālo bhaveyya. Neva
analyzed: kappam ṭhapetum samatthaḥ ti attho uḍḍayhana velā assa ati jhāyana kālaḥ bhaveyya na iva

original: tāvāti yāva esa maggasamaṅgī puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ na sacchikaroti, neva tāva kappo
analyzed: tāva ati yāva esa magga samaṅgī puggalo sotāpatti phalam na sacchikaroti na iva tāva kappo

original: jhāyeyya. Jhāyamānopi ajjhāyitvāva tiṭṭheyya. Kappavināso hi nāma mahāvikāro mahāpayogo
analyzed: jhāyeyya jhāyamānaḥ api ajjhāyitvā ava tiṭṭheyya kappavināsaḥ hi nāma mahā vikāraḥ mahā apayogaḥ

original: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷassa jhāyanavasena mahālokavināso. Ayampi evaṃ mahāvināso
analyzed: koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷassa jhāyana vasena mahā loka vināsaḥ ayam pi evam mahā vināsaḥ

original: tiṭṭheyya vāti vadati. Sāsane pana dharamāne ayaṃ kappavināso nāma natthi. Kappavināse
analyzed: tiṭṭheyya vāti vadati sāsane pana dharamāne ayam kappa vināsaḥ nāma natthi kappa vināse

original: sāsanaṃ natthi. Gatakoṭike hi kāle kappavināso nāma hoti. Evaṃ santepi satthā antarāyābhāvaṃ
analyzed: sāsanam natthi gata koṭike hi kāle kappa vināsaḥ nāma hoti evam sante pi satthā antarāya abhāvam

original: dīpetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āhari – “idampi bhaveyya, maggasamaṅgino pana phalassa antarāyo
analyzed: dīpetum idam kāraṇam āhari idam pi bhaveyya magga samaṅginaḥ pana phalassa antarāyaḥ

original: na sakkā kātu”nti. Ayaṃ pana puggalo kappaṃ ṭhapento kittakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapeyyāti? Yasmiṃ
analyzed: na sakkā kātunti ayam pana puggalo kappam ṭhapento kittakam kālam ṭhapeyya ati yasmin

original: vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, atha bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭentaṃ manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: vāre magga vuṭṭhānam hoti atha bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭentam manodvāra āvajjanam uppajjati

original: Tato tīṇi anulomāni, ekaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ, ekaṃ maggacittaṃ, dve phalacittāni, pañca
analyzed: tatas tīṇi anulomāni ekam gotrabhu cittam ekam magga cittam dve phala cittāni pañca

original: paccavekkhaṇañāṇānīti ettakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapeyya. Imaṃ panatthaṃ bāhirāya āgantukūpamāyapi
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇāni iti ettakam kālam ṭhapeyya imam pana attham bāhirāya

original: evaṃ dīpayiṃsu. Sace hi sotāpattimaggasamaṅgissa matthakūpari yojanikaṃ ekagghanaselaṃ
analyzed: evam dīpayiṃsu sace hi sotāpatti magga samaṅgissa matthakū pari yojanikam ekagghana selam

original: tivaṭṭāya rajjuyā bandhitvā olambeyya, ekasmiṃ vaṭṭe chinne dvīhi olambeyya, dvīsu
analyzed: tivaṭṭāya rajjuyā bandhitvā olambeyya ekasmin vaṭṭe chinne dvīhi olambeyya dvīsu

original: chinnesu ekena olambeyyeva, tasmimpi chinne abbhakūṭaṃ viya ākāse tiṭṭheyya, na tveva
analyzed: chinnesu ekena olambeyya iva tasmin pi chinne abbhakūṭam viya ākāse tiṭṭheyya na tu eva

original: tassa puggalassa maggānantaraphalassa antarāyaṃ kareyyāti. Ayaṃ pana dīpanā parittā,
analyzed: tassa puggalassa magga anantara phalassa antarāyam kareyya ati ayam pana dīpanā parittā

original: purimāva mahantā. Na kevalaṃ pana sotāpattimaggaṭṭhova kappaṃ ṭhapeti, itare maggasamaṅginopi
analyzed: purimā ava mahantā na kevalam pana kappam ṭhapeti itare magga samaṅginaḥ pi

original: ṭhapentiyeva. Tena bhagavā heṭṭhā gahitañca aggahitañca sabbaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhiṃ
analyzed: ṭhapentiyā iva tena bhagavā heṭṭhā gahitam ca aggahitañca sabbam saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhim

original: piṭṭhivaṭṭakapuggalehi imaṃ tantiṃ āropesi – “sabbepi maggasamaṅgino puggalā ṭhitakappino”ti.
analyzed: piṭṭhi vaṭṭaka puggalehi imam tantim āropesi sabbe pi magga samaṅgino puggalāḥ ṭhita kappinaḥ ti

original: 18. Ariyaniddese – kilesehi ārakattā ariyā. Sadevakena lokena araṇīyattā ariyā. Ariyaṭṭho nāma parisuddhaṭṭhoti parisuddhattāpi ariyā. Sesā aparisuddhatāya anariyā.
analyzed: ariya niddese kilesehi āraka ttā ariyā sa devakena lokena araṇīya ttā ariyā ariya ṭṭhaḥ nāma parisuddha ṭṭho ti parisuddha ttā api ariyā sesā aparisuddha tāya anariyā

original: 19. Sekkhaniddese – maggasamaṅgino maggakkhaṇe, phalasamaṅgino ca phalakkhaṇe, adhisīlasikkhādikā
analyzed: sekkha niddese magga samaṅginaḥ magga kkhaṇe phala samaṅginaḥ ca phala kkhaṇe adhi sīla sikkhā ādikā

original: tissopi sikkhā sikkhantiyevāti sekkhā. Arahatā pana arahattaphalakkhaṇe tisso sikkhā
analyzed: tissaḥ api sikkhā sikkhantiyā eva ati sekkhā arahatā pana arahatta phalakkhaṇe tissaḥ sikkhā

original: sikkhitā. Puna tassa sikkhanakiccaṃ natthīti asekkhā. Iti satta ariyā sikkhantīti
analyzed: sikkhitā puna tassa sikkhana kiccam natthi iti asekkhā iti satta ariyā sikkhanti iti

original: sekkhā. Khīṇāsavā aññassa santike sīlādīnaṃ sikkhitattā sikkhitaasekkhā nāma. Buddhapaccekabuddhā
analyzed: sekkhā khīṇa āsavā aññassa santike sīla ādīnam sikkhita ttā sikkhitaasekkhāḥ nāma buddha paccekabuddhā

original: sayambhūtatāya asikkhitaasekkhā nāma. Sesapuggalā neva sikkhanti na sikkhitāti nevasekkhānāsekkhā.
analyzed: sayambhūta tāya asikkhita asekkhāḥ nāma sesa puggalāḥ na iva sikkhanti na sikkhitā ati nevasekkha anāsekkhā

original: 20. Tevijjaniddese – paṭhamaṃ pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇāni nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ
analyzed: tevijja niddese paṭhamam pubbenivāsa dibba cakkhu ñāṇāni nibbattetvā pacchā arahattam

original: pattopi, paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇanibbattakopi tevijjoyeva
analyzed: pattaḥ api paṭhamam arahattam patvā pacchā pubbenivāsa dibba cakkhu ñāṇa nibbattakaḥ api

original: nāma. Suttantakathā pana pariyāyadesanā abhidhammakathā nippariyāyadesanāti imasmiṃ
analyzed: nāma suttanta kathā pana pariyāya desanā abhidhamma kathā nippariyāya desanā ati imasmin

original: ṭhāne āgamanīyameva dhuraṃ. Tasmā paṭhamaṃ dve vijjā nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ
analyzed: ṭhāne āgamanīyam eva dhuram tasmai paṭhamam dve vijjā nibbattetvā pacchā arahattam

original: pattova idha adhippeto. Chaḷabhiññepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: patto uva idha adhippeto chaḷabhiññe pi esa iva nayo

original: 22. Sammāsambuddhaniddese – pubbe ananussutesūti pacchimabhave saccappaṭivedhato
analyzed: sammāsambuddha niddese pubbe an anussutesu iti pacchima bhave sacca ppaṭivedhato

original: pubbe aññassa kassaci santike assutapubbesu. Tato purimapurimesu pana bhavesu sabbaññubodhisattā

original: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttaṃ – “etesu hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa
analyzed: āgama aṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttam etesu hi saddhā vimuttassa pubbabhāga magga kkhaṇe saddahantassa

original: viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti. Diṭṭhippattassa
analyzed: viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesa khayaḥ hoti diṭṭhippattassa

original: pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati. Tasmā
analyzed: pubbabhāga magga kkhaṇe kilesa chedaka ñāṇam adandham tikhiṇam sūram hutvā vahati tasmai

original: yathā nāma atikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi
analyzed: yathā nāma ati khiṇena asinā kadalim chindantassa chinna ṭhānam na maṭṭham hoti asi

original: na sīghaṃ vahati, saddo suyyati, balavataro vāyāmo kātabbo hoti; evarūpā saddhāvimuttassa
analyzed: na sīgham vahati saddaḥ suyyati balavataraḥ vā āyāmaḥ kātabbaḥ hoti evarūpā saddhā vimuttassa

original: pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā. Yathā pana sunisiteneva asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pubbabhāga magga bhāvanā yathā pana su nisitena iva asinā kadalim chindantassa chinna ṭhānam

original: maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi sīghaṃ vahati, saddo na suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ na hoti; evarūpā
analyzed: maṭṭham hoti asi sīgham vahati saddaḥ na balava vāyāma kiccam na hoti evarūpā

original: diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā veditabbā”ti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo
analyzed: diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāga magga bhāvanā veditabbā ti ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo

original: puggalo saddhāvimuttoti vuccati. Ayañhi saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Ayampi
analyzed: puggalo saddhā vimuttaḥ ti vuccati ayam hi saddahantaḥ vimuttaḥ ti saddhā vimuttaḥ ayam pi

original: kāyasakkhī viya chabbidhova hoti.
analyzed: kāya sakkhī viya chabbidhaḥ uva hoti

original: 29. Dhammānusārīniddese – paṭipannassāti iminā sotāpattimaggaṭṭho dassito. Adhimattanti
analyzed: dhammānusārī niddese paṭipannassa ati iminā sotāpatti magga ṭṭho dassito adhimatta nti

original: balavaṃ. Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññāvāhī. Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi vuttaṃ
analyzed: balavam paññam vāheti iti paññāvāhī paññā imam puggalam vahati iti paññāvāhī iti pi vuttam

original: hoti. Paññāpubbaṅgamanti paññaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo
analyzed: hoti paññā pubbaṅgamanti paññam purecārikam katvā ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo

original: dhammānusārīti vuccati. So hi paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
analyzed: dhamma anusārī iti vuccati so hi paññā saṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussarati iti dhamma anusārī

original: Sotāpattimaggaṭṭhassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Phale pana patte diṭṭhippatto nāma hoti.
analyzed: sotāpatti magga ṭṭhassa iva etam nāmam phale pana patte diṭṭhippatto nāma hoti

original: 30. Saddhānusārīniddesepi – saddhaṃ vāhetīti saddhāvāhī. Saddhā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti
analyzed: saddhānusārī niddese pi saddham vāheti iti saddhāvāhī saddhā imam puggalam vahati iti

original: saddhāvāhītipi vuttameva. Saddhāpubbaṅgamanti saddhaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
analyzed: vuttam eva saddhā pubbaṅgamanti saddham purecārikam katvā ayam vuccati iti

original: ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhānusārīti vuccati. So hi saddhāya sarati. Anussaratīti
analyzed: ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo saddhā anusārī iti vuccati so hi saddhāya sarati anussarati iti

original: saddhānusārī. Sotāpattimaggaṭṭhassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Phale pana patte saddhāvimutto nāma
analyzed: saddhā anusārī sotāpatti magga ṭṭhassa iva itam nāmam phale pana patte saddhāvimuttaḥ nāma

original: hoti. Lokuttaradhammañhi nibbattentānaṃ dve dhurāni nāma, dve abhinivesā nāma, dve
analyzed: hoti lokuttara dhammañhi nibbattentānam dve dhurāni nāma dve abhinivesāḥ nāma dve

original: sīsāni nāma. Tattha saddhādhuraṃ paññādhuranti – dve dhurāni nāma. Eko pana bhikkhu
analyzed: sīsāni nāma tattha saddhādhuram paññādhuranti dve dhurāni nāma ekaḥ pana bhikkhu

original: samathābhinivesena abhinivisati, eko vipassanābhinivesenāti – ime dve abhinivesā
analyzed: samatha abhinivesena abhinivisati ekaḥ vipassanā abhinivesena ati ime dve abhinivesā

original: nāma. Eko ca matthakaṃ pāpuṇanto ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti, eko paññāvimuttoti – imāni
analyzed: nāma ekaḥ ca matthakam pāpuṇantaḥ ubhatobhāga vimutto hoti ekaḥ paññā vimutto ti imāni

original: dve sīsāni nāma. Ye keci hi lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattenti, sabbe te ime dve dhamme
analyzed: dve sīsāni nāma ye keci hi lokuttara dhammam nibbattenti sabbe te ime dve dhamme

original: dhuraṃ katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi ṭhānehi vimuccanti. Tesu
analyzed: dhuram katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi ṭhānehi vimuccanti tesu

original: yo bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samathavasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu aṭṭha samāpatti lābhī paññam dhuram katvā samatha vasena abhiniviṭṭhaḥ aññataram

original: arūpasamāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe
analyzed: arūpa samāpattim padaṭṭhānam katvā vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam pāpuṇāti so sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe

original: dhammānusārī nāma. Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma. Arahattaphale patte
analyzed: dhammānusārī nāma paratas pana chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma arahatta phale patte

original: ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma.
analyzed: ubhatobhāgavimuttaḥ nāma

original: Aparo paññameva dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu
analyzed: aparo paññam eva dhuram katvā vipassanā vasena abhiniviṭṭho suddha saṅkhāre vā rūpāvacara jhānesu

original: vā aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayampi sotāpattimaggakkhaṇeyeva dhammānusārī
analyzed: vā aññataram sammasitvā arahattam pāpuṇāti ayam pi sotāpatti magga kkhaṇeya iva dhamma anusārī

original: nāma. Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma. Arahatte patte paññāvimutto nāma.
analyzed: nāma paratas pana chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma arahatte patte paññāvimutto nāma

original: Idha dve nāmāni apubbāni, tāni purimehi saddhiṃ pañca honti. Aparo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī
analyzed: idha dve nāmāni apubbāni tāni purimehi saddhim pañca honti aparaḥ aṭṭha samāpatti lābhī

original: saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhivasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: saddham dhuram katvā samādhi vasena abhiniviṭṭhaḥ aññataram arūpa samāpattim padaṭṭhānam

original: katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti – ayaṃ sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī
analyzed: katvā vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam pāpuṇāti ayam sotāpatti magga khaṇe saddhā anusārī

original: nāma. Parato chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhīyeva nāma. Arahatte patte ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva
analyzed: nāma paratas chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhīyā iva nāma arahatte patte

original: nāma. Idha ekameva nāmaṃ apubbaṃ. Tena saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti. Aparo saddhameva
analyzed: nāma idha ekam eva nāmam apubbam tena saddhim purimāni pañca cha honti saddham eva

original: dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu vā
analyzed: dhuram katvā vipassanā vasena abhiniviṭṭhaḥ suddha saṅkhāre vā rūpāvacara jhānesu vā

original: aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ayampi sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī
analyzed: aññataram sammasitvā arahattam pāpuṇāti ayam pi sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe saddhā anusārī

original: nāma. Parato chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto nāma. Arahatte patte paññāvimutto nāma.
analyzed: nāma paratas chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto nāma arahatte patte paññāvimutto nāma

original: Idhāpi ekameva nāmaṃ apubbaṃ. Tena saddhiṃ purimāni cha satta honti. Ime satta puggalā
analyzed: idha api ekam eva nāmam apubbam tena saddhim purimāni cha satta honti ime satta puggalā

original: loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā nāmāti.
analyzed: loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā nāma ati

original: 31. Sattakkhattuparamaniddese – sattakkhattunti sattavāre. Sattakkhattuparamā bhavūpapatti
attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ assa, tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
analyzed: atta bhāva ggahaṇam assa tatas param aṭṭhamam bhavam na ādiyati iti satta kkhattu paramaḥ

original: Sotāpanno hotīti ettha sototi ariyamaggo, tena samannāgato sotāpanno nāma. Yathāha –
analyzed: sotāpannaḥ hoti iti ettha sotā ti ariya maggo tena samannāgato sotāpannaḥ nāma yathā āha

original: “Soto sototi hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, sāriputta, sototi? Ayameva
analyzed: soto soto ti hi idam sāriputta vuccati katamaḥ nu kho sāriputta soto ti ayam eva

original: hi, bhante, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhīti.
analyzed: hi bhante ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo soto seyyathidam sammādiṭṭhi pe sammāsamādhi iti

original: Sotāpanno sotāpannoti, hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, sāriputta, sotāpannoti?
analyzed: sotāpanno sotāpanno ti hi idam sāriputta vuccati katamaḥ nu kho sāriputta sotāpanno ti

original: Yo hi, bhante, iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno,
analyzed: yaḥ hi bhante iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgataḥ ayam vuccati sotāpannaḥ

original: svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto iti vā”ti.
analyzed: evaṃnāmaḥ evaṃgottaḥ iti vāti

original: Evaṃ maggakkhaṇepi sotāpanno nāma hoti. Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnanti phalakkhaṇe sotāpanno adhippeto.
analyzed: evam magga kkhaṇe pi sotāpannaḥ nāma hoti idha pana maggena phalassa nāmam dinnanti phala khaṇe sotāpannaḥ adhippeto

original: Avinipātadhammoti vinipātasaṅkhātaṃ apāyaṃ upapattivasena anāgamanasabhāvo. Niyatoti
analyzed: avinipāta dhammo ti vinipāta saṅkhātam apāyam upapatti vasena anāgamana sabhāvaḥ niyataḥ iti

original: magganiyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti bujjhanakabhāvaparāyaṇo. So hi paṭiladdhamaggena
analyzed: magga niyāmena niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ ti bujjhanaka bhāva parāyaṇaḥ saḥ hi paṭiladdha maggena

original: bujjhatīti sambodhiparāyaṇo. Upari tīhi maggehi avassaṃ bujjhissatīti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
analyzed: bujjhati iti sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ upari tīhi maggehi avassam bujjhissati iti sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ

original: Deve ca manusse cāti devalokañca manussalokañca. Sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvāti paṭisandhivasena
analyzed: deve ca manusse ca ati deva lokañca manussa lokañca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā ati paṭisandhi vasena

original: aparāparaṃ gantvā. Dukkhassantaṃ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ parivaṭumaṃ karoti.
analyzed: apara aparam gantvā dukkhassa antam karoti iti vaṭṭa dukkhassa pariyantam parivaṭumam karoti

original: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo sattakkhattuparamo nāma vuccati. Ayaṃ pana kālena
analyzed: ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo satta kkhattu paramaḥ nāma vuccati ayam pana kālena

original: devalokassa kālena manussalokassa vasena missakabhavena kathitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: deva lokassa kālena manussa lokassa vasena missaka bhavena kathitaḥ iti veditabbaḥ

original: 32. Kolaṃkolaniddese – kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato
analyzed: kolaṃkola niddese kulataḥ kulam gacchati iti kolaṃkolo sa utāpatti phala sacchikiriyato

original: hi paṭṭhāya nīce kule upapatti nāma natthi, mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho.
analyzed: hi paṭṭhāya nīce kule upapatti nāma natthi mahā bhoga kulesu yeva nibbattati iti attho

original: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave. Iti ayampi missakabhaveneva
analyzed: dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni iti deva manussa vasena dve vā tayaḥ vā bhave iti ayam pi missaka bhavena iva

original: kathito. Desanāmattameva cetaṃ – ‘dve vā tīṇi vā’ti. Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi
analyzed: kathitaḥ desanā mattam eva dve vā tīṇi vā ati yāva chaṭṭha bhavā saṃsarantaḥ api

original: pana kolaṃkolova hoti.
analyzed: pana kolaṃkolaḥ uva hoti

original: 33. Ekabījiniddese – khandhabījaṃ nāma kathitaṃ. Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ
analyzed: ekabīji niddese khandha bījam nāma kathitam yassa hi sotāpannassa ekam yā iva khandha bījam

original: atthi, ekaṃ attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ, so ekabījī nāma. Mānusakaṃ bhavanti idaṃ panettha
analyzed: atthi ekam atta bhāva ggahaṇam saḥ ekabījī nāma mānusakam bhavanti idam pana ittha

original: desanāmattameva. Devabhavaṃ nibbattetītipi pana vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Bhagavatā gahitanāmavaseneva
analyzed: desanā mattam eva deva bhavam nibbattā iti iti pi pana vattum vaṭṭatiyā iva bhagavatā gahita nāma vasena iva

original: cetāni etesaṃ nāmāni. Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti, ettakaṃ kolaṃkolo,
analyzed: cetāni etesam nāmāni ettakam ṭhānam gataḥ satta kkhattu paramaḥ nāma hoti ettakam kolaṃkolo

original: ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ. Niyamato pana ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo,
analyzed: ettakam ekabījī iti bhagavatā etesam nāmam gahitam niyamataḥ pana ayam satta kkhattu paramaḥ

original: ayaṃ kolaṃkolo, ayaṃ ekabījīti natthi.
analyzed: ayam kolaṃkolaḥ ayam ekabījī iti natthi

original: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? Keci tāva therā ‘pubbahetu niyametī’ti vadanti,
analyzed: kaḥ pana tesam etam pabhedam niyameti iti keci tāva therā pubba hetu niyameti iti vadanti

original: keci ‘paṭhamamaggo’, keci ‘upari tayo maggā’, keci ‘tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā’ti.
analyzed: paṭhama maggo keci upari tayo maggā keci tiṇṇam maggānam vipassanā ati

original: Tattha ‘pubbahetu niyametī’ti vāde ‘paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti, upari
analyzed: tattha pubba hetu niyameti iti vāde paṭhama maggassa upanissayaḥ kataḥ nāma hoti upari

original: tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannā’ti vacanaṃ āpajjati. ‘Paṭhamamaggo niyametī’ti vāde
analyzed: tayo maggā nirupanissayāḥ uppannā ati vacanam āpajjati paṭhama maggaḥ niyameti iti vāde

original: upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati. ‘Upari tayo maggā niyamentī’ti vāde
analyzed: upari tiṇṇam maggānam niratthaka tā āpajjati upari tayo maggāḥ niyamenti iti vāde

original: ‘aṭṭhamamagge anuppanneyeva upari tayo maggā uppannā’ti āpajjati. ‘Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhama magge an uppanne iva upari tayo maggāḥ uppannā ti āpajjati tiṇṇam maggānaṃ

original: vipassanā niyametī’ti vādo pana yujjati. Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā
analyzed: vipassanā niyameti iti vādaḥ pana yujjati sace hi upari tiṇṇam maggānam vipassanā

original: balavatī hoti, ekabījī nāma hoti; tato mandatarāya kolaṃkolo; tato mandatarāya sattakkhattuparamoti.
analyzed: balavatī hoti ekabījī nāma hoti tatas mandatarāya kolaṃkolo tatas mandatarāya satta kkhattu paramaḥ ti

original: Ekacco hi sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo hoti, vaṭṭābhirato, punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarati
analyzed: ekaccaḥ hi sotāpannaḥ vaṭṭa ajjhāsayaḥ hoti vaṭṭa abhirato punappunam vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarati

original: sandissati. Anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi, visākhā upāsikā, cūḷarathamahārathā devaputtā,
analyzed: sandissati anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi visākhā upāsikā cūḷaratha mahārathā devaputtā

original: anekavaṇṇo devaputto, sakko devarājā, nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā
analyzed: anekavaṇṇaḥ deva putto sakkaḥ deva rājā nāgadatto deva putto ti ime hi ettakāḥ janāḥ vaṭṭa jhāsayā

original: vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
analyzed: vaṭṭa abhiratāḥ āditas paṭṭhāya cha deva loke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti

original: ime idha na gahitā. Na kevalañcime; yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
analyzed: ime idha na gahitāḥ na kevalañca ime yaḥ api manussesu yā iva satta kkhattum saṃsaritvā arahattam

original: pāpuṇāti, yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
analyzed: pāpuṇāti yaḥ api deva loke nibbattaḥ devesu yā iva satta kkhattum apara aparam saṃsaritvā arahattam

original: pāpuṇāti, imepi idha na gahitā. Missakabhavavaseneva panettha sattakkhattuparamakolaṃkolā
analyzed: pāpuṇāti ime api idha na gahitāḥ missaka bhava vasena iva pana ittha satta kkhattu parama kolaṃkolā

original: mānusakabhavanibbattakoyeva ca ekabījī gahitoti veditabbo. Tattha ekeko dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena
analyzed: ca eka bījī gahitaḥ tattha ekekaḥ dukkha apaṭipadā ādi vasena

original: catubbidhabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Saddhādhureneva cattāro sattakkhattuparamā, cattāro kolaṃkolā,
analyzed: catubbidha bhāvam āpajjati saddhā dhurena iva cattāraḥ satta kkhattu paramā cattāro kolaṃkolā

original: cattāro ekabījinoti dvādasa honti. Sace paññāya sakkā nibbattetuṃ, ‘ahaṃ lokuttaraṃ

original: ṭhāne kathitāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ṭhāne kathitā iti veditabbā

original: 34. Sakadāgāminiddese – paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī. Sakidevāti
analyzed: sakadāgāmi niddese paṭisandhi vasena sakim āgacchati iti sakadāgāmī sakid eva ati

analyzed: eka vāraṃya iva imam lokam āgantvā ati iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāraḥ vajjetvā ekaḥ iva

original: 35. Anāgāminiddese – orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānanti oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu. Yassa

original: Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha anāvattanasabhāvo.

original: Buddhadassanatheradassanadhammassavanānaṃ panatthāyassa āgamanaṃ anivāritaṃ. Ayaṃ

original: 36. Antarāparinibbāyiniddese – upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannasamanantarā vā

analyzed: antarā parinibbāyī iti vuccati

original: Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā.
2. Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 53. Ahirikaniddesādīsu – iminā ahirikenāti iminā evaṃpakārena ahirikadhammena samannāgato. Iminā anottappenātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ahirika niddesa ādīsu iminā ahirikena ati iminā evaṃpakārena ahirika dhammena samannāgataḥ iminā anottappena ati ādīsu pi esa eva nayo

original: 63. Ajjhattasaṃyojanoti ajjhattabandhano. Bahiddhāsaṃyojanoti bahiddhābandhano. Te

analyzed: dullabha niddese dullabhā ati na sulabhā pubba kārī iti paṭhamam eva kārako kata vedī iti

analyzed: ācariya upajjhāye paṭijaggantā abhivādana ādīni tesam kurumānā katavedinaḥ nāma tesam

analyzed: āvi bhāva tthāya upajjhāya posaka soṇa thera ādīnam vatthūni kathetabbāni

original: Aparo nayo – parena akateyeva upakāre attani kataṃ upakāraṃ anapekkhitvā kārako pubbakārī,
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ parena a kateya iva upakāre attani katam upakāram an apekkhitvā kārakaḥ pubba kārī

original: seyyathāpi mātāpitaro ceva ācariyupajjhāyā ca. So dullabho; sattānaṃ taṇhābhibhūtattā.

original: Parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavattiṃ attani kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto,
analyzed: parena katassa upakārassa anurūpa ppavattim attani katam upakāram upakārataḥ jānantaḥ

original: Sopi dullabho; sattānaṃ avijjābhibhūtattā.

original: Apica – akāraṇavacchalo pubbakārī, sakāraṇavacchalo kataññukatavedī. ‘Karissati me’ti
analyzed: apica akāraṇavacchalo pubba kārī sa kāraṇavacchalo kataññu kata vedī karissati mā iti

original: kataññukatavedī. Tamojotiparāyaṇo pubbakārī, jotijotiparāyaṇo kataññukatavedī. Desetā
analyzed: kataññu katavedī tamaḥ joti parāyaṇo pubba kārī joti joti parāyaṇo kataññu katavedī desetā

original: pubbakārī, paṭipajjitā kataññukatavedī. Sadevake loke arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubbakārī,
analyzed: pubba kārī paṭipajjitā kataññu kata vedī sa devake loke araham sammāsambuddhaḥ pubba kārī

original: upakārassa kārako, ‘kataññukatavedī’ti tena kataṃ ñatvā pacchā kārako. Tesu pubbakārī

original: 84. Duttappayaniddese – duttappayāti atappayā, na sakkā kenaci tappetuṃ. Yo hi upaṭṭhākakulaṃ
analyzed: duttappaya niddese duttappayā ati atappayā na sakkā kenacid tappetum yaḥ hi upaṭṭhāka kulam

original: paribhuñjati. Punappunaṃ dinnampi gahetvā nikkhipateva. Yo ca teneva nayena laddhaṃ
analyzed: paribhuñjati punappunam dinnam pi gahetvā nikkhipatā iva yaḥ ca tena iva nayena laddham

original: 85. Sutappayaniddese – na vissajjetīti attano akatvā parassa na deti. Atireke pana
analyzed: na vissajjeti iti attanaḥ a katvā parassa na deti atireke pana

analyzed: sati na nikkhipati parassa deti idam vuttam hoti yaḥ pana bhikkhu upaṭṭhāka kulā

analyzed: vā ñāti kulā vā jiṇṇa cīvaraḥ sāṭakam labhitvā cīvaram katvā paribhuñjati na nikkhipati

original: aggaḷaṃ datvā pārupantopi puna diyyamāne sahasā na paṭiggaṇhāti. Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ
analyzed: aggaḷam da tvā puna diyyamāne sahasā na paṭiggaṇhāti yaḥ ca laddham laddham

original: attanā paribhuñjati, paresaṃ na deti. Ime dvepi sukhena sakkā tappetunti sutappayā nāmāti.

original: 86. Āsavāti kilesā. Na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatīti na kukkuccāyitabbayuttakaṃ
analyzed: kilesāḥ na kukkuccāyitabbam kukkuccāyati iti na kukkuccāyitabba yuttakam

original: dīpimaṃsanti kukkuccāyati. Kāle santeyeva ‘kālo natthī’ti, appavāretvāva ‘pavāritosmī’ti,
analyzed: kukkuccāyati kāle kālaḥ na atthi iti appavāretvā ava pavāritaḥ smi iti

original: patte rajasmiṃ apatiteyeva ‘patita’nti, attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse akateyeva ‘maṃ

original: uddissa kata’nti kukkuccāyati. Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatīti kukkuccāyitabbayuttakaṃ

original: na kukkuccāyati. Acchamaṃsaṃ labhitvā sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyati…pe… attānaṃ
analyzed: na kukkuccāyati accha maṃsam labhitvā sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyati pe attānam

original: uddissa macchamaṃse kate ‘maṃ uddissa kata’nti na kukkuccāyati. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: uddissa macchamaṃse kate mam uddissa katanti na kukkuccāyati aṅguttara ṭṭhakathāyam

original: kukkuccāyatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Imesanti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ subhūmiyaṃ

original: tiṇalatādīni viya rattimpi divāpi āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva. Sukkapakkhe kappiyamaṃsaṃ

original: nayena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 88. Hīnādhimuttoti hīnajjhāsayo. Dussīloti nissīlo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo.
analyzed: hīna adhimuttaḥ ti hīna ajjhāsayaḥ dussīlaḥ ti nissīlaḥ pāpa dhammo ti lāmaka dhammo

original: 89. Paṇītādhimuttoti paṇītajjhāsayo. Kalyāṇadhammoti bhaddakadhammo, sucidhammo, sundaradhammo.
analyzed: paṇīta adhimutto ti paṇīta ajjhāsayo kalyāṇa dhammo ti bhaddaka dhammo suci dhammo sundara dhammo

original: 90. Tittoti suhito pariyosito. Tappetāti aññesampi tittikaro. Paccekasambuddhā ye

original: Aññe pana tappetuṃ na sakkonti. Tesañhi dhammakathāya abhisamayo na hoti. Sāvakānaṃ
analyzed: aññe pana tappetum na sakkonti tesam hi dhamma kathāya abhisamayaḥ na hoti sāvakānam

original: pana te dhammaṃ desentā na attano vacanaṃ katvā kathenti, buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ katvā

analyzed: kathenti sotum nisinna parisā api ayam bhikkhu na attanā paṭividdha dhammam katheti

original: buddhehi paṭividdhadhammaṃ kathetī’ti cittīkāraṃ karoti. Iti so cittīkāro buddhānaṃyeva

original: na rājapurisehīti. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.

original: Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 3. Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 91. Tikaniddese – dussīloti nissīlo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo. Sīlavipattiyā vā

original: Saṅkassarasamācāroti saṅkāya parehi saritabbasamācāro. Kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā

original: jānitvā mantentī’ti evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hoti.

original: Paṭicchannakammantoti paṭicchādetabbayuttakena pāpakammena samannāgato. Assamaṇo

analyzed: appamattaka ābādhaḥ kathitaḥ

analyzed: itare api dve gilānā upaṭṭhātabbā kim kāraṇā yaḥ api hi niṭṭhappatta gilānaḥ saḥ an upaṭṭhiyamānaḥ

original: ‘sace maṃ paṭijaggeyyuṃ, phāsukaṃ me bhaveyya, na kho pana maṃ paṭijaggantī’ti manopadosaṃ
