original: Neva okkamatīti neva pavisati. Niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu
analyzed: na iva okkamati iti na iva pavisati niyāmam kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu

original: magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaṃ. Iminā padaparamo puggalo kathito. Dutiyavārena ugghaṭitaññū
analyzed: magga niyāma saṅkhātam sammattam iminā pada paramaḥ puggalo kathitaḥ dutiya vārena ugghaṭita ññū

original: gahito sāsane nāḷakattherasadiso. Buddhantare ekavāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santike ovādaṃ
analyzed: gahitaḥ sāsane nāḷaka tthera sadisaḥ buddha antare eka vāram paccekabuddhānam santike ovādam

original: labhitvā paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo ca. Tatiyavārena vipañcitaññū puggalo kathito.
analyzed: labhitvā paṭividdha paccekabodhi ñāṇo ca tatiya vārena vipañcitaññū puggalo kathito

original: Neyyo pana tannissitova hoti.
analyzed: neyyaḥ pana tad nissitaḥ va hoti

original: Dhammadesanā anuññātāti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā. Aññesampi dhammo
analyzed: dhamma desanā anuññātā ti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhamma kathā anuññātā aññesam pi dhammo

original: desetabboti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Padaparamassa hi imasmiṃ attabhāve
analyzed: desetabbo ti itaresam pi dhammo kathetabbo kim kāraṇā pada paramassa hi imasmin atta bhāve

original: dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati. Yo pana tathāgatassa
analyzed: dhammam paṭivijjhitum a sakkontassa api anāgate paccayaḥ bhavissati yaḥ pana tathāgatassa

original: rūpadassanaṃ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi
analyzed: rūpa dassanam labhantaḥ api a labhantaḥ api dhamma vinayam ca savanāya labhantaḥ api a labhantaḥ api

original: dhammaṃ abhisameti; so alabhanto na tāva abhisameti, labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti
analyzed: dhammam abhisameti saḥ a labhantaḥ na tāva abhisameti labhantaḥ pana khippam eva abhisamessati iti

original: iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ dhammo desetabbo. Tatiyassa pana punappunaṃ desetabbova. Kāyasakkhidiṭṭhappattasaddhāvimuttā heṭṭhā kathitāyeva.
analyzed: iminā kāraṇena tesam dhammo desetabbo tatiyassa pana punappunam desetabbaḥ uva kāya sakkhi diṭṭha ppatta saddhā vimuttāḥ heṭṭhā kathitāya eva

original: 98. Gūthabhāṇīādīsu – sabhaggatoti sabhāyaṃ ṭhito. Parisaggatoti gāmaparisāya ṭhito.
analyzed: gūtha bhāṇī ādīsu sabhaggato ti sabhāyam ṭhito parisaggato ti gāma parisāya ṭhitaḥ

original: Ñātimajjhagatoti dāyādānaṃ majjhe ṭhito. Pūgamajjhagatoti seṇīnaṃ majjhe ṭhito. Rājakulamajjhagatoti
analyzed: ñāti majjha gataḥ uti dāyādānam majjhe ṭhitaḥ pūga majjha gataḥ uti seṇīnam majjhe ṭhitaḥ rāja kula majjha gataḥ uti

original: rājakulassa majjhe mahāvinicchaye ṭhito. Abhinītoti pucchanatthāya nīto. Sakkhipuṭṭhoti
analyzed: rāja kulassa majjhe mahā vinicchaye ṭhitaḥ abhinītaḥ ti pucchana atthāya nītaḥ sakkhi puṭṭho ti

original: sakkhiṃ katvā pucchito. Ehambho purisāti ālapanametaṃ. Attahetu vā parahetu vāti
analyzed: sakkhim katvā pucchitaḥ eham bho purisa ati ālapanam etam atta hetu vā para hetu vā ti

original: attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā. Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha
analyzed: attanaḥ vā parassa vā hattha pāda ādi hetu vā dhana hetu vā āmisa kiñcikkha hetu vā ti ettha

original: āmisanti lābho adhippeto. Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ. Antamaso tittiravaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādiappamattakassāpi
analyzed: āmisanti lābhaḥ adhippeto yam vā tam vā appamattakam antamasaḥ tittira vaṭṭaka sappi piṇḍa navanīta piṇḍa ādi appamattakassa api

original: lañjassa hetūti attho. Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
analyzed: lañjassa hetu uti attho sampajāna musā bhāsitā hoti iti musāvādam kattā hoti

original: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo gūthasadisavacanattā gūthabhāṇīti vuccati. Yathā
analyzed: ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ gūtha sadisa vacanattā gūthabhāṇī iti vuccati yathā

original: hi gūthaṃ nāma mahājanassa aniṭṭhaṃ hoti akantaṃ; evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ
analyzed: hi gūtham nāma mahājanassa aniṭṭham hoti a kantam evam eva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ

original: devamanussānaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ hoti akantaṃ.
analyzed: deva manussānam aniṭṭham hoti a kantam

original: 99. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pupphasadisavacanattā pupphabhāṇīti vuccati.
analyzed: ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo puppha sadisa vacana ttā puppha bhāṇī iti vuccati

original: Yathā hi phullāni vassikāni vā adhimuttakāni vā mahājanassa iṭṭhāni kantāni honti;
analyzed: yathā hi phullāni vassikāni vā adhimuttakāni vā mahājanassa iṭṭhāni kantāni honti

original: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ hoti kantaṃ.
analyzed: evam eva imassa puggalassa vacanam deva manussānam iṭṭham hoti kantam

original: 100. Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso. Nāssā elanti nelā. Niddosāti attho, “nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
analyzed: na ilā ti elam vuccati dosaḥ na assā elanti na ilā niddosā ati attho na ilaṅgo seta pacchādo ti

original: ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā. Sūcivijjhanaṃ
analyzed: ettha vutta nelam viya byañjana madhura tāya kaṇṇānam sukhā

original: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
analyzed: viya kaṇṇa sūlam na janeti attha madhura tāya sakala sarīre kopam a janetvā pa imam janeti iti

original: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
analyzed: pemanīyā hadayam gacchati a paṭihaññamānā sukhena cittam pavisati iti hadayaṅgamā

original: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī. Pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
analyzed: guṇa paripuṇṇa tāya pure bhavāti porī pure porī purassa

original: esātipi porī. Nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti. Pitimattaṃ
analyzed: porī nagara vāsīnam kathā ati atthaḥ nagara vāsinaḥ hi yutta kathāḥ honti

original: pitāti, mātimattaṃ mātāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa
analyzed: pitā ati mātimattam mātā ati bhātimattam bhātā ati vadanti evarūpī kathā bahunaḥ janassa

original: kantā hotīti bahujanakantā. Bahujanassa kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti
analyzed: kantā hoti iti bahu jana kantā bahu janassa kanta bhāvena iva bahunaḥ janassa manāpā citta vuddhi karā ati

original: bahujanamanāpā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo madhubhāṇīti vuccati. Mudubhāṇītipi
analyzed: bahu jana manāpā ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ madhubhāṇī iti vuccati mudubhāṇī iti pi

original: pāṭho. Ubhayatthāpi madhuravacanoti attho. Yathā hi catumadhuraṃ nāma madhuraṃ paṇītaṃ;
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ ubhayattha api atthaḥ yathā hi catumadhuram nāma madhuram paṇītam

original: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ madhuraṃ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva imassa puggalassa vacanam deva manussānam madhuram hoti

original: 101. Arukūpamacittādīsu – abhisajjatīti laggati. Kuppatīti kopavasena kuppati. Byāpajjatīti
analyzed: arukūpamacitta ādīsu abhisajjati iti laggati kuppati iti kopa vasena kuppati byāpajjati iti

original: pakatibhāvaṃ pajahati, pūtiko hoti. Patitthīyatīti thinabhāvaṃ thaddhabhāvañca āpajjati.
analyzed: pakati bhāvam pajahati pūtikaḥ hoti patitthīyati iti thina bhāvam thaddha bhāvañca āpajjati

original: Kopanti dubbalakodhaṃ. Dosanti dussanavasena tato balavataraṃ. Appaccayanti atuṭṭhākāraṃ
analyzed: kopanti dubbala kodham dosanti dussana vasena tatas balavataram appaccayanti atuṭṭha ākāram

original: domanassaṃ. Duṭṭhārukoti purāṇavaṇo. Kaṭṭhenāti daṇḍakakoṭiyā. Kaṭhalāyāti kapālena.
analyzed: domanassam duṭṭhāruko ti purāṇavaṇaḥ kaṭṭhena ati daṇḍaka koṭiyā kaṭhalāya ati kapālena

original: Āsavaṃ detīti aparāparaṃ savati. Purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāya eva pubbaṃ lohitaṃ
analyzed: āsavam deti iti apara aparam savati purāṇavaṇaḥ hi attanaḥ dhamma tāya eva pubbam lohitam

original: yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati, ghaṭṭito pana tāni adhikataraṃ savati. Evamevaṃ khoti
analyzed: imāni tīṇi savati ghaṭṭitaḥ pana tāni adhikataram evam evam

original: ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ, duṭṭhāruko viya hi kodhano puggalo. Tassa attano dhammatāya
analyzed: ettha idam opamma saṃsandanam duṭṭha ārukaḥ viya hi kodhanaḥ puggalo tassa attanaḥ dhamma tāya

original: savanaṃ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātakassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇaṃ.
analyzed: savanam viya kodhanassa api attanaḥ dhamma tāya uddhu mātakassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇam

original: Kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṃ viya appamattakampi vacanaṃ bhiyyoso mattāya savanaṃ
analyzed: kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanam viya appamattakam pi vacanam bhiyyosaḥ mattāya savanam

original: viya ‘mādisaṃ nāma esa evaṃ vadatī’ti bhiyyoso mattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: viya mādisam nāma esaḥ evam vadati iti bhiyyosaḥ mattāya uddhumāyana bhāvaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo arukūpamacittoti vuccati. Purāṇavaṇasadisacittoti attho.
analyzed: ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo arukū pama cittaḥ ti vuccati purāṇa vaṇa sadisa cittaḥ ti attho

original: 102. Rattandhakāratimisāyāti rattiṃ cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇena andhabhāvakaraṇe
analyzed: ratta ndhakāra timi sāya ati rattim cakkhu viññāṇa uppatti nivāraṇena andha bhāva karaṇe

original: bahalatame. Vijjantarikāyāti vijjuppattikkhaṇe. Idhāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – cakkhumā
analyzed: bahalatame vijjantarikāya ati vijju patti kkhaṇe idha api idam opamma saṃsandanam cakkhumā

original: puriso viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo. Andhakāraṃ viya sotāpattimaggavajjhā kilesā.
analyzed: puriso viya hi yogāvacaraḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ andhakāram viya sotāpatti magga vajjhāḥ kilesā

original: Vijjusañcaraṇaṃ viya sotāpattimaggañāṇassa uppattikālo. Vijjantarikāya cakkhumato
analyzed: vijju sañcaraṇam viya sotāpatti magga ñāṇassa uppatti kālo vijjantarikāya cakkhumato

original: purisassa sāmantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ
analyzed: purisassa sāmantā rūpa dassanam viya sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe nibbāna dassanam puna andhakāra avattharaṇam

original: viya sakadāgāmimaggavajjhā kilesā. Puna vijjusañcaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggañāṇassa
analyzed: viya sakadāgāmi magga vajjhā kilesā puna vijju sañcaraṇam viya sakadāgāmi magga ñāṇassa

original: uppādo. Vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa sāmantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe
analyzed: uppādaḥ vijjantarikāya cakkhumataḥ purisassa sāmantā rūpa dassanam viya sakadāgāmi magga kkhaṇe

original: nibbānadassanaṃ. Puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya anāgāmimaggavajjhā kilesā. Puna vijjusañcaraṇaṃ
analyzed: nibbāna dassanam puna andhakāra avattharaṇam viya anāgāmi magga vajjhā kilesā puna vijju sañcaraṇam

original: viya anāgāmimaggañāṇassa uppādo. Vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa sāmantā rūpadassanaṃ
analyzed: anāgāmi magga ñāṇassa uppādaḥ vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa sāmantā rūpa dassanaṃ

original: viya anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo
analyzed: viya anāgāmi magga kkhaṇe nibbāna dassanam veditabbam ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo puggalo

original: vijjūpamacittoti vuccati. Ittarakālobhāsena vijjusadisacittoti attho.
analyzed: vijju upama citto ti vuccati ittara kāla ubhāsena vijju sadisa citto ti attho

original: 103. Vajirūpamacittatāyapi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – vajiraṃ viya hi arahattamaggañāṇaṃ
analyzed: idam opamma saṃsandanam vajiram viya hi arahatta magga ñāṇam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Maṇigaṇṭhipāsāṇagaṇṭhi viya arahattamaggavajjhā kilesā. Vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhiṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam maṇi gaṇṭhi pāsāṇa gaṇṭhi viya arahatta magga vajjhāḥ kilesāḥ vajirassa maṇi gaṇṭhim

original: vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhiṃ vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthibhāvo viya arahattamaggañāṇena
analyzed: vā pāsāṇa gaṇṭhim vā vinivijjhitvā agamana bhāvassa natthi bhāvaḥ viya arahatta magga ñāṇena

original: acchejjānaṃ kilesānaṃ natthibhāvo. Vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apaṭipūraṇaṃ viya
analyzed: a chejjānam kilesānam natthi bhāvaḥ vajirena nibbiddha vedhassa puna a paṭipūraṇam viya

original: arahattamaggena chinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
analyzed: arahatta maggena chinnānam kilesānam puna anuppādaḥ daṭṭhabbo ayam vuccati iti ayam

original: evarūpo puggalo vajirūpamacittoti vuccati. Kilesānaṃ mūlaghātakaraṇasamatthatāya
analyzed: evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ vaji rūpam acittaḥ ti vuccati kilesānam mūla ghāta karaṇa samattha tāya

original: vajirena sadisacittoti attho.
analyzed: vajirena sadisa cittaḥ ti attho

original: 104. Andhādīsu tathārūpaṃ cakkhu na hotīti tathājātikaṃ tathāsabhāvaṃ paññācakkhu
analyzed: andha ādīsu tathārūpam cakkhu na hoti iti tathājātikam tathā sabhāvam paññācakkhu

original: na hoti. Phātiṃ kareyyāti phītaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ kareyya. Sāvajjānavajjeti sadosaniddose.
analyzed: na hoti phātim kareyya ati phītam vaḍḍhitam kareyya sa avajjā anavajjā iti sa dosa niddose

original: Hīnappaṇīteti adhamuttame. Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgeti kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññapaṭibāhanato
analyzed: hīna ppaṇītā iti adhama uttame kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāgā iti kaṇha sukkāya iva aññamañña paṭibāhanato

original: paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – kusale dhamme
analyzed: paṭipakkha vasena sappaṭibhāgā ti vuccanti ayam pana ittha saṅkhepaḥ kusale dhamme

original: ‘kusalā dhammā’ti yena paññācakkhunā jāneyya, akusale dhamme ‘akusalā dhammā’ti,
analyzed: kusalāḥ dhammā ati yena paññā cakkhunā jāneyya akusale dhamme akusalāḥ dhammā ati

original: sāvajjādīsupi eseva nayo. Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgesu pana kaṇhadhamme ‘sukkasuppaṭibhāgā’ti,
analyzed: sāvajja ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ kaṇha sukka sappaṭibhāgesu pana kaṇha dhamme sukka suppaṭibhāgā ti

original: sukkadhamme ‘kaṇhasappaṭibhāgā’ti yena paññācakkhunā jāneyya. Tathārūpampissa cakkhu
analyzed: sukka dhamme kaṇha sappaṭibhāgā ti yena paññā cakkhunā jāneyya tathārūpam pissa cakkhu

original: na hotīti iminā nayena sesaṭṭhānesupi attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo
analyzed: na hoti iti iminā nayena sesa ṭṭhānesu pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo

original: puggalo diṭṭhadhammikabhogasaṃharaṇapaññācakkhuno ca samparāyikatthasodhanapaññācakkhuno
analyzed: puggalaḥ diṭṭhadhammika bhoga saṃharaṇa paññā cakkhuno ca samparāyika attha sodhana paññā cakkhuno

original: ca abhāvā andhoti vuccati. Dutiyo diṭṭhadhammikabhogasaṃharaṇapaññācakkhuno bhāvā,
analyzed: ca abhāvā andho ti vuccati dutiyaḥ diṭṭhadhammika bhoga saṃharaṇa paññā cakkhuno bhāvā

original: samparāyikatthasodhanapaññācakkhuno pana abhāvā ekacakkhūti vuccati. Tatiyo dvinnampi
analyzed: pana abhāvā eka cakkhu iti vuccati tatiyaḥ dvinnam pi

original: bhāvā dvicakkhūti vuccati.
analyzed: bhāvāḥ dvi cakkhu iti vuccati

original: 107. Avakujjapaññādīsu dhammaṃ desentīti upāsako dhammassavanatthāya āgatoti attano
analyzed: avakujja paññā ādīsu dhammam desenti iti upāsakaḥ dhamma ssavana tthāya āgataḥ ti attano

original: kammaṃ pahāya dhammaṃ desenti. Ādikalyāṇanti ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjaṃ
analyzed: kammam pahāya dhammaṃ desenti ādi kalyāṇam ti ādimhi kalyāṇam bhaddakam anavajjam

original: niddosaṃ katvā desenti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha pana ādīti pubbapaṭṭhapanā.
analyzed: niddosam katvā desenti sesa padesu pi esā iva nayaḥ ettha pana ādi iti pubba paṭṭhapanā

original: Majjhanti kathāvemajjhaṃ. Pariyosānanti sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Itissa dhammaṃ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi
analyzed: majjhanti kathā vemajjham pariyosānanti sanniṭṭhānam iti ssa dhammam kathentā pubba paṭṭhapane pi

original: kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kathenti, vemajjhepi, pariyosānepi. Ettha ca
analyzed: kalyāṇam bhaddakam anavajjam eva katvā kathenti vemajjhe pi pariyosāne pi ettha ca

original: atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānāni, atthi sāsanassa. Tattha desanāya tāva – catuppadikagāthāya
analyzed: atthi desanāya ādi majjha pariyosānāni atthi sāsanassa tattha desanāya tāva catuppadika gāthāya

original: paṭhamapadaṃ ādi, dve padāni majjhaṃ, avasānapadaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Ekānusandhikasuttassa
analyzed: paṭhama padam ādi dve padāni majjham avasāna padam pariyosānam ekānusandhika suttassa

original: – nidānaṃ ādi, anusandhi majjhaṃ, idamavocāti appanā pariyosānaṃ. Anekānusandhikassa
analyzed: nidānam ādi anusandhi majjham idam avoca ati appanā pariyosānam aneka anusandhikassa

original: – paṭhamo anusandhi ādi, tato paraṃ eko vā anekā vā majjhaṃ, pacchimo pariyosānaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ anusandhi ādi tato param ekaḥ vā aneke vā majjham pacchimaḥ pariyosānaṃ

original: Ayaṃ tāva desanāya nayo.
analyzed: ayam tāva desanāya

original: Sāsanassa pana sīlaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhaṃ, vipassanā pariyosānaṃ. Samādhi vā ādi,
analyzed: sāsanassa pana sīlam ādi samādhi majjham vipassanā pariyosānam samādhi vā ādi

original: vipassanā majjhaṃ, maggo pariyosānaṃ. Vipassanā vā ādi, maggo majjhaṃ, phalaṃ pariyosānaṃ.
analyzed: vipassanā majjham maggaḥ pariyosānam vipassanā vai ādi maggaḥ majjham phalam pariyosānam

original: Maggo vā ādi, phalaṃ majjhaṃ, nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Dve dve vā kariyamāne sīlasamādhayo
analyzed: maggaḥ vā ādi phalam majjham nibbānam pariyosānam dve dve vā kariyamāne sīla samādhayaḥ

original: ādi, vipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ. Sātthanti sātthakaṃ katvā
analyzed: ādi vipassanā maggāḥ majjham phala nibbānāni pariyosānam sātthanti sātthakam katvā

original: desenti. Sabyañjananti akkharapāripūriṃ katvā desenti. Kevalaparipuṇṇanti sakalaparipuṇṇaṃ
analyzed: desenti akkhara pāripūrim katvā desenti kevala paripuṇṇanti sakala paripuṇṇam

original: anūnaṃ katvā desenti. Parisuddhanti parisuddhaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā desenti.
analyzed: anūnam katvā desenti parisuddhanti parisuddham nijjaṭam niggaṇṭhim katvā desenti

original: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsentīti evaṃ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ
analyzed: brahmacariyam pakāsenti iti evam desentā ca seṭṭha cariya bhūtam sikkhattaya saṅgahitam

original: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pakāsenti. Neva ādiṃ manasi karotīti neva pubbapaṭṭhapanaṃ
analyzed: ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam pakāsenti na iva ādim manasi karoti iti na iva pubba paṭṭhapanam

original: manasi karoti. Kumbhoti ghaṭo. Nikkujjoti adhomukho ṭhapito. Evamevanti ettha kumbho
analyzed: manasi karoti kumbhaḥ iti ghaṭaḥ nikkujjaḥ iti adhomukhaḥ ṭhapitaḥ evam evanti ettha kumbhaḥ

original: nikkujjo viya avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo. Udakāsiñcanakālo viya dhammadesanāya
analyzed: nikkujjaḥ viya avakujja paññaḥ puggalo daṭṭhabbo udaka āsiñcana kālaḥ viya dhamma desanāya

original: laddhakālo. Udakassa vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṃ asamatthakālo.
analyzed: laddha kālaḥ udakassa vivaṭṭana kālaḥ viya tasmin āsane nisinnassa uggahetum asamattha kālaḥ

original: Udakassa asaṇṭhānakālo viya uṭṭhahitvā asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
analyzed: udakassa asaṇṭhāna kālaḥ viya uṭṭhahitvā asat lakkhaṇa kālaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam vuccati iti

original: ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo avakujjapaññoti vuccati. Adhomukhapaññoti attho.
analyzed: ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo avakujja pañño ti vuccati adhomukha pañño ti attho

original: 108. Ākiṇṇānīti pakkhittāni. Satisammosā pakireyyāti muṭṭhassatitāya vikireyya. Evamevanti
analyzed: ākiṇṇāni iti pakkhittāni sati sammosā pakireyya ati muṭṭha sati tāya vikireyya evam evam ti

original: ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo. Nānākhajjakāni viya nānappakāraṃ
analyzed: ettha ucchaṅgaḥ viya ucchaṅga paññaḥ puggalo daṭṭhabbo nānā khajjakāni viya nānappakāram

original: buddhavacanaṃ. Ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane
analyzed: buddha vacanam ucchaṅge nānā khajjakāni khādantassa nisinna kālaḥ viya tasmin āsane

original: nisinnassa uggahaṇakālo. Vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā vikiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā
analyzed: nisinnassa uggahaṇa kālaḥ vuṭṭhahantassa sati sammosāḥ vikiraṇa kālaḥ viya tasmai āsanā

original: vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo
analyzed: vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asat lakkhaṇa kālo veditabbaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo

original: ucchaṅgapaññoti vuccati. Ucchaṅgasadisapaññoti attho.
analyzed: ucchaṅga pañño ti vuccati ucchaṅga sadisa pañño ti attho

original: 109. Ukkujjoti uparimukho ṭhapito. Saṇṭhātīti patiṭṭhahati. Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho
analyzed: ukkujjo ti upari mukhaḥ ṭhapito saṇṭhāti iti patiṭṭhahati evam eva kho ti ettha upari mukhaḥ

original: ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo. Udakassa āsittakālo viya desanāya
analyzed: ṭhapitaḥ kumbhaḥ viya puthu paññaḥ puggalo daṭṭhabbo udakassa āsitta kālaḥ viya desanāya

original: laddhakālo. Udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggahaṇakālo. No vivaṭṭanakālo
analyzed: laddha kālaḥ udakassa saṇṭhāna kālaḥ viya tattha nisinnassa uggahaṇa kālo no vivaṭṭana kālo

original: viya uṭṭhāya gacchantassa sallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo
analyzed: viya uṭṭhāya gacchantassa sat lakkhaṇa kālo veditabbo ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo

original: puggalo puthupaññoti vuccati. Vitthārikapaññoti attho.
analyzed: puggalo puthu pañño ti vuccati vitthārika pañño ti attho

original: 110. Avītarāgādīsu – yathā sotāpannasakadāgāmino, evaṃ puthujjanopi pañcasu kāmaguṇesu,
analyzed: avīta rāga ādīsu yathā sotāpanna sakadāgāminaḥ evam puthujjanaḥ api pañcasu kāmaguṇesu

original: tīsu ca bhavesu avītarāgo. Adabbatāya pana na gahito. Yathā hi cheko vaḍḍhakī dabbasambhāratthaṃ
analyzed: tīsu ca bhavesu avīta rāgaḥ adabba tāya pana na gahitaḥ yathā hi chekaḥ vaḍḍhakī dabba sambhāra attham

original: vanaṃ paviṭṭho na ādito paṭṭhāya sampattasampattarukkhe chindati, ye panassa dabbasambhārūpagā
analyzed: vanam paviṭṭhaḥ na āditas paṭṭhāya sampatta sampatta rukkhe chindati ye panassa dabba sambhāra upagā

original: honti, teyeva chindati; evamidhāpi bhagavatā dabbajātikā ariyāva gahitā, puthujjanā
analyzed: honti teya iva chindati evam idha api bhagavatā dabba jātikāḥ ariyāḥ ava gahitāḥ puthujjanāḥ

original: pana adabbatāya na gahitāti veditabbā. Kāmesu vītarāgoti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vītarāgo.
analyzed: pana adabba tāya na gahitā ati veditabbā kāmesu vīta rāgaḥ ti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vīta rāgaḥ

original: Bhavesu avītarāgoti rūpārūpabhavesu avītarāgo.
analyzed: bhavesu a vīta rāgaḥ ti rūpa arūpa bhavesu a vīta rāgaḥ

original: 113. Pāsāṇalekhūpamādīsu – anusetīti appahīnatāya anuseti. Na khippaṃ lujjatīti na
analyzed: pāsāṇa lekhu upama ādīsu anuseti iti appahīna tāya anuseti na khippam lujjati iti na

original: antarā nassati, kappuṭṭhāneneva nassati. Evamevanti evaṃ tassāpi puggalassa kodho
analyzed: antarā nassati kappu ṭṭhānena iva nassati evam evanti evam tassa api puggalassa kodho

original: na antarā punadivase vā aparadivase vā nibbāti, addhaniyo pana hoti. Maraṇeneva nibbātīti
analyzed: na antarā puna divase vā apara divase vā nibbāti addhaniyaḥ pana hoti maraṇena iva nibbāti iti

original: attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pāsāṇalekhā viya kujjhanabhāvena ciraṭṭhitikato
analyzed: atthaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo puggalo pāsāṇa lekhā viya kujjhana bhāvena cira ṭṭhitikato

original: pāsāṇalekhūpamoti vuccati.
analyzed: pāsāṇa lekhu upamaḥ ti vuccati

original: 114. So ca khvassa kodhoti so appamattakepi kāraṇe sahasā kuddhassa kodho. Na ciranti
analyzed: saḥ ca khvassa kodho ti saḥ appamattake pi kāraṇe sahasā kuddhassa kodho na ciranti

original: aciraṃ appahīnatāya nānuseti. Yathā pana pathaviyaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā katalekhā vātādīhi
analyzed: aciram a pahīna tāya na anuseti yathā pana pathaviyam ākaḍḍhitvā kata lekhā vāta ādīhi

original: khippaṃ nassati, evamassa sahasā uppannopi kodho khippameva nibbātīti attho. Ayaṃ
analyzed: khippam nassati evam assa sahasā uppannaḥ api kodhaḥ khippam eva nibbāti iti atthaḥ ayam

original: vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pathaviyaṃ lekhā viya kujjhanabhāvena aciraṭṭhitikato
analyzed: vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo pathaviyam lekhā viya kujjhana bhāvena acira ṭṭhitikato

original: pathavīlekhūpamoti vuccati.
analyzed: pathavī lekhu upamaḥ ti vuccati

original: 115. Āgāḷhenāti atigāḷhena mammacchedakena thaddhavacanena. Pharusenāti na sotasukhena.
analyzed: āgāḷhena ati atigāḍhena mammacchedakena thaddhavacanena pharusena ati na sota sukhena

original: Amanāpenāti na cittasukhena. Saṃsandatīti ekībhavati. Sandhiyatīti ghaṭayati. Sammodatīti
analyzed: amanāpena ati na citta sukhena saṃsandati iti ekībhavati sandhiyati iti ghaṭayati sammodati iti

original: nirantaro hoti. Atha vā – saṃsandatīti cittakiriyādīsu cittena samodhānaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: nirantaraḥ hoti atha vā saṃsandati iti citta kiriyā ādīsu cittena samodhānam gacchati

original: Khīrodakaṃ viya ekībhāvaṃ upetīti attho. Sandhiyatīti ṭhānagamanādīsu kāyakiriyādīsu
analyzed: khīra udakam viya ekībhāvam upeti iti attho sandhiyati iti ṭhāna gamana ādīsu kāya kiriyā ādīsu

original: kāyena samodhānaṃ gacchati. Tilataṇḍulā viya missībhāvaṃ upetīti attho. Sammodatīti
analyzed: kāyena samodhānam gacchati tila taṇḍulāḥ viya missībhāvam upeti iti attho sammodati iti

original: uddesaparipucchādīsu vacīkiriyāsu vācāya samodhānaṃ gacchati. Vippavāsagatopi piyasahāyako
analyzed: uddesa paripuccha ādīsu vacī kiriyāsu vācāya samodhānam gacchati vippavāsa gataḥ api piya sahāyako

original: viya piyatarabhāvaṃ upetīti attho. Apica – kiccakaraṇīyesu tehi saddhiṃ āditova ekakiriyabhāvaṃ
analyzed: viya piyatara bhāvam upeti iti atthaḥ apica kicca karaṇīyesu tehi saddhim āditas va eka kiriya bhāvam

original: upagacchanto saṃsandati. Yāva majjhā pavattanto sandhiyati, yāva pariyosānā anivattanto
analyzed: upagacchantaḥ saṃsandati yāva majjhā pavattantaḥ sandhiyati yāva pariyosānā a nivattantaḥ

original: sammodatītipi veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo udakalekhā viya khippaṃ
analyzed: sammodati iti pi veditabbaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ udaka lekhā viya khippam

original: saṃsandanato udakalekhūpamoti vuccati.
analyzed: saṃsandanataḥ udaka lekhu upamaḥ ti vuccati

original: 116. Potthakūpamesu – yāya upamāya te potthakūpamāti vuccanti, taṃ tāva upamaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: potthakūpamesu yāya upamāya te potthakūpamā ati vuccanti tam tāva upamam dassetuṃ

original: tayo potthakātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha navoti navavāyimo. Potthakoti sāṇavākasāṭako. Dubbaṇṇoti
analyzed: tayo potthakā tiādi vuttam tattha navo ti potthako ti sāṇavāka sāṭakaḥ dubbaṇṇo ti

original: vivaṇṇo. Dukkhasamphassoti kharasamphasso. Appagghoti atibahuṃ agghanto kahāpaṇagghanako
analyzed: vivaṇṇaḥ dukkha samphasso ti khara samphassaḥ appagghaḥ ti atibahum agghantaḥ kahāpaṇagghanako

original: hoti. Majjhimoti paribhogamajjhimo. So hi navabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā jiṇṇabhāvaṃ appatto
analyzed: hoti majjhimaḥ ti paribhoga majjhimaḥ so hi nava bhāvam atikkamitvā jiṇṇa bhāvam appatto

original: majjhe paribhogakālepi dubbaṇṇo ca dukkhasamphasso ca appagghoyeva ca hoti. Atibahuṃ
analyzed: majjhe paribhoga kāle pi dubbaṇṇaḥ ca dukkha samphasso ca ca hoti atibahum

original: agghanto aḍḍhaṃ agghati. Jiṇṇakāle pana aḍḍhamāsakaṃ vā kākaṇikaṃ vā agghati. Ukkhaliparimajjananti
analyzed: agghantaḥ aḍḍham agghati jiṇṇa kāle pana aḍḍha māsakam vā kākaṇikam vā agghati ukkhali parimajjana nti

original: kāḷukkhaliparipuñchanaṃ.
analyzed: kāḷukkhali paripuñchanam

original: Navoti upasampadāya pañcavassakālato heṭṭhā jātiyā saṭṭhivassopi navoyeva. Dubbaṇṇatāyāti
analyzed: navaḥ ti upasampadāya pañca vassa kālataḥ heṭṭhā jātiyā dubbaṇṇa tāya ati

original: sarīravaṇṇenapi guṇavaṇṇenapi dubbaṇṇatāya. Dussīlassa hi parisamajjhe nisinnassa
analyzed: sarīra vaṇṇena api guṇa vaṇṇena api dubbaṇṇa tāya dussīlassa hi parisamajjhe nisinnassa

original: nittejatāya sarīravaṇṇopi na sampajjati, guṇavaṇṇe vattabbameva natthi. Ye kho panassāti
analyzed: nitteja tāya sarīra vaṇṇaḥ api na sampajjati guṇa vaṇṇe vattabbam eva natthi ye kho panassa ati

original: ye kho pana tassa upaṭṭhākā vā ñātimittādayo vā etaṃ puggalaṃ sevanti. Tesaṃ tanti
analyzed: ye kho pana tassa upaṭṭhākāḥ vā ñāti mitta ādayaḥ vā etam puggalam sevanti tesam tanti

original: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ cha satthāre sevantānaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ viya, devadattaṃ sevantānaṃ
analyzed: tesam puggalānam cha satthāre sevantānam micchādiṭṭhikānam viya devadattam sevantānam

original: kokālikādīnaṃ viya ca taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti. Majjhimoti pañcavassakālato
analyzed: kokālikā ādīnam viya ca tam sevanam dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya hoti majjhimaḥ ti pañca vassa kālato

original: paṭṭhāya yāva navavassakālā majjhimo nāma. Theroti dasavassakālato paṭṭhāya thero
analyzed: paṭṭhāya yāva nava vassa kālāḥ majjhimo nāma thero ti dasa vassa kālato paṭṭhāya thero

original: nāma. Evamāhaṃsūti evaṃ vadanti. Kiṃ nu kho tuyhanti tuyhaṃ bālassa bhaṇitena ko
analyzed: nāma evam āhaṃsu iti evam vadanti kim nu kho tuyham ti tuyham bālassa bhaṇitena ko

original: atthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathārūpanti tathājātikaṃ tathāsabhāvaṃ ukkhepanīyakammassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ.
analyzed: atthaḥ iti vuttam hoti tathārūpam ti tathājātikam tathā sabhāvam ukkhepanīya kammassa kāraṇa bhūtam

original: 117. Kāsikavatthūpamesu – kāsikavatthaṃ nāma tayo kappāsaṃsū gahetvā kantitasuttena
analyzed: kāsikavatthu upamesu kāsikavattham nāma tayaḥ kappa āsaṃsū gahetvā kantita suttena

original: vāyitaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ. Taṃ navavāyimaṃ anagghaṃ hoti. Paribhogamajjhimaṃ vīsampi
analyzed: vāyitam su khuma vattham tam anaggham hoti paribhoga majjhimam

original: tiṃsampi sahassāni agghati. Jiṇṇakāle pana aṭṭhapi dasapi sahassāni agghati.
analyzed: tiṃsam pi sahassāni agghati jiṇṇa kāle pana aṭṭha pi dasa pi sahassāni agghati

original: Tesaṃ taṃ hotīti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhādayo sevantānaṃ viya taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ
analyzed: tesam tam hoti iti tesam sammāsambuddha ādayo sevantānam viya tam sevanam dīgharattam

original: hitāya sukhāya hoti. Sammāsambuddhañhi ekaṃ nissāya yāvajjakālā muccanakasattānaṃ
analyzed: hitāya sukhāya hoti sammāsambuddham hi ekam nissāya yāvajja kālā muccanaka sattānam

original: pamāṇaṃ natthi. Tathā sāriputtattheramahāmoggallānatthere avasese ca asītimahāsāvake
analyzed: pamāṇam natthi tathā sāriputta thera mahāmoggallāna tthere avasese ca asīti mahā sāvake

original: nissāya saggaṃ gatasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Yāvajjakālā tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ paṭipannasattānampi
analyzed: nissāya saggam gata sattānam pamāṇam natthi yāvajjakālā tesam diṭṭhānugatim paṭipanna sattānam pi

original: pamāṇaṃ natthiyeva. Ādheyyaṃ gacchatīti tassa mahātherassa taṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: pamāṇam ādheyyam gacchati iti tassa mahā therassa tam attha nissitam vacanaṃ

original: yathā gandhakaraṇḍake kāsikavatthaṃ ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbataṃ gacchati, evaṃ uttamaṅge
analyzed: yathā gandha karaṇḍake kāsika vattham ādhātabbatam ṭhapetabbatam gacchati evam uttamaṅge

original: sirasmiṃ hadaye ca ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbatampi gacchati. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sirasmim hadaye ca ādhātabba tam ṭhapetabba tam pi gacchati sesam ettha heṭṭhā vutta anusārena iva veditabbam

original: 118. Suppameyyādīsu – sukhena pametabboti suppameyyo. Idhāti imasmiṃ sattaloke. Uddhatoti
analyzed: suppameyya ādīsu sukhena pametabbo ti suppameyyaḥ idha ati imasmin satta loke uddhato ti

original: uddhaccena samannāgato. Unnaḷoti uggatanaḷo; tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitoti attho.
analyzed: uddhaccena samannāgataḥ unnaḷo ti uggata naḷo tuccha mānam ukkhipitvā ṭhito ti attho

original: Capaloti pattamaṇḍanādinā cāpallena samannāgato. Mukharoti mukhakharo. Vikiṇṇavācoti
analyzed: capalo ti patta maṇḍana ādinā cāpallena samannāgataḥ mukharo ti mukha kharaḥ

original: asaṃyatavacano. Asamāhitoti cittekaggatārahito. Vibbhantacittoti bhantacitto, bhantagāvībhantamigīsappaṭibhāgo.
analyzed: asaṃyata vacanaḥ asamāhito ti citta ekagga tā rahitaḥ vibbhanta cittaḥ ti bhanta cittaḥ

original: Pākaṭindriyoti vivaṭindriyo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘suppameyyo’ti vuccati.
analyzed: vivaṭ indriyaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo puggalo suppameyyaḥ ti vuccati

original: Yathā hi parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati; evameva imehi aguṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa
analyzed: yathā hi parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇam gayhati evam eva imehi aguṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa

original: sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati. Tenesa ‘suppameyyo’ti vutto.
analyzed: sukhena pamāṇam tena isa suppameyyaḥ ti vutto

original: 119. Dukkhena pametabboti duppameyyo. Anuddhatādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni.
analyzed: dukkhena pametabbaḥ ti duppameyyaḥ anuddhata ādīni vutta paṭipakkha vasena veditabbāni

original: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘duppameyyo’ti vuccati. Yathā hi mahāsamuddassa
analyzed: ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo duppameyyaḥ ti vuccati yathā hi mahā samuddassa

original: dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati; evameva imehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ
analyzed: dukkhena pamāṇam gayhati evam eva imehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇam

original: gayhati. Tādiso ‘anāgāmī nu kho, khīṇāsavo nu kho’ti vattabbataṃ gacchati, tenesa
analyzed: gayhati tādisaḥ anāgāmī nu kho khīṇāsavaḥ nu kho ti vattabbatam gacchati tena īsa

original: ‘duppameyyo’ti vutto.
analyzed: duppameyyaḥ ti vuttaḥ

original: 120. Na sakkā pametunti appameyyo. Yathā hi ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ, evaṃ khīṇāsavassa. Tenesa ‘appameyyo’ti vutto.
analyzed: na sakkā pametunti appameyyaḥ yathā hi ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇam gahetum evam khīṇa āsavassa tena isa appameyyaḥ ti vutto

original: 121. Na sevitabbādīsu – na sevitabboti na upasaṅkamitabbo. Na bhajitabboti na allīyitabbo.
analyzed: na sevitabba ādīsu na sevitabbaḥ iti na upasaṅkamitabbaḥ na bhajitabbaḥ iti na allīyitabbaḥ

original: Na payirupāsitabboti na santike nisīdanavasena punappunaṃ upāsitabbo. Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu
analyzed: na payirupāsitabbaḥ ti na santike nisīdana vasena punappunam upāsitabbaḥ hīnaḥ hoti sīlena ati ādīsu

original: upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā. Yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati, so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena
analyzed: upādāya upādāya hīna tā veditabbā yaḥ hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati saḥ dasa sīlāni rakkhantena

original: na sevitabbo. Yo pana dasa sīlāni rakkhati, so catupārisuddhisīlaṃ rakkhantena na
analyzed: na sevitabbaḥ yaḥ pana dasa sīlāni rakkhati so catu pārisuddhi sīlam rakkhantena na

original: sevitabbo. Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca.
analyzed: sevitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā ati ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca

original: Attano atthāya eva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo. Anuddayānukampāvasena pana taṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ atthāya eva hi evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ na sevitabbaḥ anuddaya anukampā vasena pana tam

original: upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: upasaṅkamitum vaṭṭati

original: 122. Sadiso hotīti samāno hoti. Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ
analyzed: sadisaḥ hoti iti samānaḥ hoti sīla sāmañña gatānam satanti sīlena samāna bhāvam gatānam

original: santānaṃ. Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatīti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha
analyzed: santānam sīla kathā ca naḥ bhavissati iti evam samāna sīlānam amhākam sīlam eva ārabbha

original: kathā bhavissati. Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro
analyzed: kathā bhavissati sā ca no phāsu bhavissati iti sā ca sīla kathā amhākam phāsu vihāraḥ

original: sukhavihāro bhavissati. Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi
analyzed: sukha vihāraḥ bhavissati sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati iti sā ca amhākam kathā divasam pi

original: kathentānaṃ pavattinī bhavissati, na paṭihaññissati. Dvīsu hi sīlavantesu ekena sīlassa
analyzed: kathentānam pavattinī bhavissati na paṭihaññissati dvīsu hi sīlavantesu ekena sīlassa

original: vaṇṇe kathite itaro anumodati; tena tesaṃ kathā phāsu ceva hoti, pavattinī ca. Ekasmiṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇe kathite itaraḥ anumodati tena tesam kathā phāsu ca iva hoti pavattinī ca ekasmin

original: pana dussīle sati dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathāti neva sīlakathā hoti, na phāsu hoti,
analyzed: pana dussīle sati dussīlassa sīla kathā dukkathā ati na iva sīla kathā hoti na phāsu hoti

original: na pavattinī. Samādhipaññākathāsupi eseva nayo. Dve hi samādhilābhino samādhikathaṃ,
analyzed: na samādhi paññā kathāsu pi esā iva nayaḥ dve hi samādhi lābhino samādhi katham

original: sappaññā ca paññākathaṃ kathentā, rattiṃ vā divasaṃ vā atikkantampi na jānanti.
analyzed: sappaññā ca paññākatham kathentā rattim vā divasam vā atikkantam pi na jānanti

original: 123. Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva garukārañca karitvā. Adhiko hotīti atireko
analyzed: sakkatvā garum katvā ati sakkāram ca iva garukāram ca karitvā adhikaḥ hoti iti

original: hoti. Sīlakkhandhanti sīlarāsiṃ. Paripūressāmīti taṃ atirekasīlaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya
analyzed: hoti sīla kkhandhanti sīla rāsim paripūressāmi iti tam atireka sīlam puggalam nissāya

original: attano aparipūraṃ sīlarāsiṃ paripūraṃ karissāmi. Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti
analyzed: attanaḥ a paripūram sīla rāsim paripūram karissāmi tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi iti

original: ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme sevanto tasmiṃ
analyzed: ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāra dhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāra dhamme sevanto tasmin

original: tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma. Samādhipaññākkhandhesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tasmim ṭhāne sīla kkhandham paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma samādhi paññā kkhandhesu pi esā iva nayaḥ

original: 124. Jigucchitabbādīsu – jigucchitabboti gūthaṃ viya jigucchitabbo. Atha kho nanti
analyzed: jigucchitabba ādīsu jigucchitabbaḥ iti gūtham viya jigucchitabbaḥ atha kho

original: atha kho assa. Kittisaddoti kathāsaddo. Evamevanti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ
analyzed: atha kho assa kitti saddo ti kathā saddo evam evanti ettha gūtha kūpaḥ viya dussīlyam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhamanīahi viya dussīlapuggalo. Guthakūpato uddhariyamānena
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam gūtha kūpe patitvā ṭhitaḥ dhamanī ahi viya dussīla puggalaḥ gutha kūpataḥ uddhariyamānena

original: tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi
analyzed: tena ahinā purisassa sarīram āruḷhena api a daṭṭha bhāvaḥ viya dussīlam sevamānassa api

original: tassa kiriyāya kāraṇabhāvo sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahino gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ
analyzed: tassa kiriyāya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sarīram gūthena makkhetvā ahinaḥ gata kālaḥ viya dussīlam

original: sevamānassa pāpakittisaddassa abbhuggamanakālo veditabbo.
analyzed: sevamānassa pāpa kitti saddassa abbhut gamana kālaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 125. Tindukālātanti tindukarukkhaalātaṃ. Bhiyyoso mattāya cicciṭāyatīti tañhi jhāyamānaṃ
analyzed: tinduka alātam tinduka rukkha alātam bhiyyosaḥ mattāya cicciṭāyati iti tat hi jhāyamānam

original: pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāti saddaṃ karoti. Ghaṭṭitaṃ pana

original: adhimattaṃ karotīti attho. Evamevanti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato
analyzed: adhimattam karoti iti evam evam kodhanaḥ attanaḥ uddhataḥ

original: caṇḍikato hutvā carati. Appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ vuttakāle ‘mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadatī’ti
analyzed: caṇḍikataḥ hutvā carati appamattakam pana vacanam vutta kāle mādisam nāma evam vadati iti

original: atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati. Gūthakūpoti gūthapuṇṇakūpo, gūtharāsiyeva
analyzed: atirekataram caṇḍikataḥ hutvā carati gūtha kūpaḥ iti gūtha puṇṇa kūpaḥ

original: vā. Opammasaṃsandanaṃ panettha purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo,
analyzed: vā opamma saṃsandanam pana ittha purima nayena iva veditabbam tasmai evarūpaḥ puggalaḥ ajjhupekkhitabbaḥ

original: na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamānopi atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva,
analyzed: na sevitabbo ti yasmā kodhanaḥ atiseviyamānaḥ api atiupasaṅkamiyamānaḥ api kujjhatiyā iva

original: ‘kiṃ iminā’ti paṭikkamantopi kujjhatiyeva, tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo,
analyzed: kim iminā ati paṭikkamantaḥ api kujjhatiyā iva tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbaḥ

original: na sevitabbo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yo hi palālaggiṃ atiupasaṅkamitvā tappati, tassa sarīraṃ
analyzed: na sevitabbo kim vuttam hoti yaḥ hi palālaggim atiupasaṅkamitvā tappati tassa sarīram

original: jhāyati. Yo atipaṭikkamitvā tappati, tassa sītaṃ na vūpasammati. Anupasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: jhāyati yaḥ atipaṭikkamitvā tappati tassa sītam na vūpasammati an upasaṅkamitvā

original: apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappentassa sītaṃ vūpasammati, kāyopi na ḍayhati.
analyzed: a paṭikkamitvā pana majjhatta bhāvena tappentassa sītam vūpasammati kāyaḥ api na ḍayhati

original: Tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo, na sevitabbo,
analyzed: tasmā viya kodhanaḥ puggalaḥ majjhatta bhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbaḥ na sevitabbaḥ

original: na bhajitabbo, na payirupāsitabbo.
analyzed: na bhajitabbaḥ na payirupāsitabbaḥ

original: 126. Kalyāṇamittoti sucimitto. Kalyāṇasahāyoti sucisahāyo. Sahāyoti sahagāmī saddhiṃcaro.
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittaḥ iti su ci mittaḥ kalyāṇa sahāyaḥ iti su ci sahāyaḥ sahāyaḥ uti sahagāmī saddhiṃcaraḥ

original: Kalyāṇasampavaṅkoti kalyāṇesu sucipuggalesu sampavaṅko, tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāramānasoti attho.
analyzed: kalyāṇa sampavaṅko ti kalyāṇesu suci puggalesu sampavaṅko tad ninna tappoṇa tad pabbhāra mānaso ti attho

original: 127. Sīlesu paripūrakārītiādīsu – sīlesu paripūrakārinoti ete ariyasāvakā yāni tāni
analyzed: sīlesu paripūrakāri iti ādīsu ete ariya sāvakāḥ yāni tāni

original: maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāni, ādibrahmacariyakāni, pārājikasaṅkhātāni cattāri
analyzed: magga brahmacariyassa ādi bhūtāni ādibrahmacariyakāni pārājika saṅkhātāni cattāri

original: mahāsīlasikkhāpadāni, tesaṃ avītikkamanato yāni khuddānukhuddakāni āpajjanti, tehi
analyzed: mahā sīla sikkhāpadāni tesaṃ a vītikkamanataḥ yāni khuddānukhuddakāni āpajjanti tehi

original: ca vuṭṭhānato sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ paripūraṃ samattaṃ karontīti ‘sīlesu paripūrakārino’ti
analyzed: ca vuṭṭhānataḥ sīlesu yam kattabbam tam paripūram samattam karonti iti sīlesu paripūra kārino ti

original: vuccanti. Samādhipāribandhakānaṃ pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ, paññāpāribandhakassa ca
analyzed: vuccanti samādhi pāribandhakānam pana kāma rāga byāpādānam paññā pāribandhakassa ca

original: saccapaṭicchādakassa mohassa asamūhatattā, samādhiṃ paññañca bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu
analyzed: sacca paṭicchādakassa mohassa a samūha tattā samādhim paññam ca bhāventā api samādhi paññāsu

original: yaṃ kattabbaṃ taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti samādhismiṃ paññāya
analyzed: yam kattabbam tam mattasaḥ pamāṇena padesa mattam eva karonti iti samādhismim paññāya

original: ca mattaso kārinoti vuccanti. Iminā upāyena itaresupi dvīsu nayesu attho veditabbo.
analyzed: ca mattasaḥ kārino ti vuccanti iminā upāyena itaresu pi dvīsu nayesu atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Tatrāyaṃ aparopi suttantanayo –
analyzed: tatra ayam aparaḥ api suttantanayaḥ

original: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlesu paripūra kārī hoti samādhismim kārī paññāya

original: mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjatipi, vuṭṭhātipi.
analyzed: mattasaḥ kārī saḥ yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjati pi vuṭṭhāti pi

original: Taṃ kissa hetu? Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā. Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni
analyzed: tat kissa hetu na hi mā ittha bhikkhave abhabba tā vuttā yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni

original: ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni, tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti, ṭhitasīlo ca,
analyzed: ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariya sāruppāni tattha dhuva sīlo ca hoti ṭhita sīlo ca

original: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti,
analyzed: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu so tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā sotāpannaḥ hoti

original: avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu…pe…
analyzed: a vinipāta dhammaḥ niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu

original: so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā, rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā, sakadāgāmī hoti; sakideva
analyzed: so tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā rāga dosa mohānam tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva

original: imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī
analyzed: imam lokam āgantvā dukkhassantam karoti idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu sīlesu paripūra kārī

original: hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: hoti samādhismim paripūra kārī paññāya kārī so yāni sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ…pe… anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. Idha pana, bhikkhave,
analyzed: so pañcannam orambhāgiyānaṃ pe an āvatti dhammo tasmā idha pana bhikkhave

original: bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī. So yāni
analyzed: bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī samādhismim paripūrakārī paññāya paripūrakārī saḥ yāni

original: tāni khuddānukhuddakāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So āsavānaṃ khayā…pe… upasampajja viharatī”ti.
analyzed: tāni sikkhati sikkhāpadesu so āsavānam khaya āpe upasampajja viharati iti

original: 130. Satthāraniddese – pariññaṃ paññapetīti pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapeti. Tatrāti
analyzed: satthāra niddese pariññam paññapeti iti pahānam samatikkamam paññapeti tatra ati

original: tesu tīsu janesu. Tena daṭṭhabboti tena paññāpanena so satthā rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā
analyzed: tesu tīsu janesu tena daṭṭhabbaḥ ti tena paññāpanena so satthā rūpāvacara samāpattiyā

original: lābhīti daṭṭhabboti attho. Dutiyavārepi eseva nayo. Sammāsambuddho satthā tena daṭṭhabboti
analyzed: lābhī iti daṭṭhabbaḥ ti attho dutiya vāre pi esā iva nayaḥ sammāsambuddhaḥ satthā tena daṭṭhabbaḥ ti

original: tena titthiyehi asādhāraṇena paññāpanena ayaṃ tatiyo satthā sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tena titthiyehi asādhāraṇena paññāpanena ayam tatiyaḥ satthā sabbaññu buddhaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Titthiyā hi kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā rūpabhavaṃ vakkhanti. Rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā
analyzed: titthiyāḥ hi kāmānam pariññam paññapentā rūpa bhavam vakkhanti rūpānam pariññam paññapentā

original: arūpabhavaṃ vakkhanti. Vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā asaññabhavaṃ vakkhanti. Sammā
analyzed: arūpa bhavam vakkhanti vedanānam pariññam paññapentā asañña bhavam vakkhanti sammā

original: paññapentā ‘evaṃ paññapeyyuṃ’, no ca sammā paññapetuṃ sakkonti. Sammāsambuddho pana
analyzed: paññapentāḥ evam paññapeyyum no ca sammā paññapetum sakkonti sammāsambuddhaḥ pana

original: kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ pahānaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññapeti. Rūpavedanānaṃ pariññaṃ pahānaṃ
analyzed: kāmānam pariññam pahānam anāgāmi maggena paññapeti rūpa vedanānam pariññam pahānam

original: arahattamaggena paññapeti. Ime tayo satthāroti ime dve janā bāhirakā, eko sammāsambuddhoti
analyzed: arahatta maggena paññapeti ime tayo satthāro ti ime dve janāḥ bāhirakāḥ ekaḥ sammāsambuddho ti

original: – imasmiṃ loke tayo satthāro nāma.
analyzed: imasmin loke tayo satthāraḥ nāma

original: 131. Dutiye satthāraniddese – diṭṭhe ceva dhammeti imasmiṃ attabhāve. Attānaṃ saccato
analyzed: dutiye satthāra niddese diṭṭhe ca iva dhamme ti imasmin atta bhāve attānam saccatas

original: thetato paññapetīti “attā nāmeko atthi nicco dhuvo sassato”ti bhūtato thirato paññapeti.
analyzed: thetataḥ paññapeti iti attā nāma ekaḥ atthi niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sassataḥ ti bhūtataḥ thirataḥ paññapeti

original: Abhisamparāyañcāti aparasmiṃ attabhāve evameva paññapeti. Sesamettha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
analyzed: abhisamparāyan ca ati aparasmin atta bhāve evam eva paññapeti sesam ettha vutta nayena iva veditabbanti

original: Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: tika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 4. Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā
132. Catukkaniddese – asappurisoti lāmakapuriso. Pāṇaṃ atipātetīti pāṇātipātī. Adinnaṃ
analyzed: catukka niddese asappuriso ti lāmaka puriso pāṇam atipāteti iti pāṇa atipātī adinnam

original: ādiyatīti adinnādāyī. Kāmesu micchā caratīti kāmesumicchācārī. Musā vadatīti musāvādī.
analyzed: ādiyati iti adinna ādāyī kāmesu micchā carati iti kāmesu micchā cārī musā vadati iti musā vādī

original: Surāmerayamajjapamāde tiṭṭhatīti surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī.
analyzed: surā meraya majja pamāde tiṭṭhati iti surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhāyī

original: 133. Pāṇātipāte samādapetīti yathā pāṇaṃ atipāteti, tathā naṃ tattha gahaṇaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
analyzed: pāṇa atipāte samādapeti iti yathā pāṇam atipāteti tathā nam tattha gahaṇam gaṇhāpeti

original: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo yasmā sayaṃ katena ca dussīlyena
analyzed: sesesu pi esā iva nayaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo puggalo yasmai sayam katena ca dussīlyena

original: samannāgato yañca samādapitena kataṃ, tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo, tasmā asappurisena
analyzed: samannāgataḥ yat ca samādapitena katam tatas upaḍḍhassa dāyādaḥ tasmai a sappurisena

original: asappurisataroti vuccati. Sappurisoti uttamapuriso.
analyzed: asappurisataro ti vuccati sappuriso ti uttama puriso

original: 135. Sappurisena sappurisataroti attanā katena susīlyena samannāgatattā yañca samādapito karoti. Tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādattā uttamapurisena uttamapurisataro.
analyzed: sappurisena sappurisataro ti attanā katena su sīlyena samannāgata ttā yat ca samādapito karoti tatas upaḍḍhassa dāyādattā uttama purisena uttama purisataro

original: 136. Pāpoti akusalakammapathasaṅkhātena dasavidhena pāpena samannāgato.
analyzed: pāpo ti akusala kammapatha saṅkhātena dasavidhena pāpena samannāgato

original: 138. Kalyāṇoti kusalakammapathasaṅkhātena dasavidhena kalyāṇadhammena samannāgato suddhako bhadrako. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
analyzed: kalyāṇo ti kusala kammapatha saṅkhātena dasavidhena kalyāṇa dhammena samannāgato suddhakaḥ bhadrako sesam ettha heṭṭhā vutta naya ttā uttāna attham eva

original: 140. Pāpadhammādīsu – pāpo dhammo assāti pāpadhammo. Kalyāṇo dhammo assāti kalyāṇadhammo. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
analyzed: pāpa dhamma ādīsu pāpaḥ dhammaḥ assa ati pāpa dhammo kalyāṇaḥ dhammaḥ assa ati kalyāṇa dhammo sesam ettha uttānattham eva

original: 144. Sāvajjādīsu – sāvajjoti sadoso. Sāvajjena kāyakammenāti sadosena pāṇātipātādinā
analyzed: sāvajja ādīsu sāvajjaḥ ti sa dosaḥ sāvajjena kāya kammena ati sa dosena pāṇa atipāta ādinā

original: kāyakammena. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo tīhi dvārehi
analyzed: kāya kammena itaresu pi esā iva nayaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo tīhi dvārehi

original: āyūhanakammassa sadosattā, gūthakuṇapādibharito padeso viya sāvajjoti vuccati.
analyzed: āyūhana kammassa sa dosa ttā gūtha kuṇapa ādi bharito padesaḥ viya sāvajjaḥ ti vuccati

original: 145. Sāvajjena bahulanti yassa sāvajjameva kāyakammaṃ bahu hoti, appaṃ anavajjaṃ;
analyzed: sāvajjena yassa sāvajjam eva kāya kammam bahu hoti appam anavajjam

original: so sāvajjena bahulaṃ kāyakammena samannāgato, appaṃ anavajjenāti vuccati. Itaresupi
analyzed: so sāvajjena bahulam kāya kammena samannāgataḥ appam anavajjena ati vuccati itaresu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ko pana evarūpo hotīti? Yo gāmadhammatāya vā nigamadhammatāya vā kadāci
analyzed: eṣa iva nayaḥ kaḥ pana evarūpaḥ hoti iti yaḥ gāma dhamma tāya vā nigama dhamma tāya vā kadāci

original: karahaci uposathaṃ samādiyati, sīlāni pūreti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo
analyzed: uposatham samādiyati sīlāni pūreti ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpo puggalo

original: tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammesu sāvajjasseva bahulatāya anavajjassa appatāya vajjabahuloti vuccati.
analyzed: tīhi dvārehi āyūhana kammesu sāvajjassa iva bahula tāya anavajjassa appa tāya vajja bahulo ti vuccati

original: Yathā hi ekasmiṃ padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni rāsikatānassu, tesaṃ upari
analyzed: yathā hi ekasmin padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni tesam upari

original: tahaṃ tahaṃ atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ. Evarūpo ayaṃ puggalo veditabbo.
analyzed: taham taham atimuttaka vassika pāṭalāni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ evarūpaḥ ayam puggalaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Yathā pana ekasmiṃ padese atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni rāsikatānassu, tesaṃ upari tahaṃ
analyzed: yathā pana ekasmin padese atimuttaka vassika pāṭalāni tesam upari

original: tahaṃ dubbaṇṇaduggandhāni badarapupphādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ. Evarūpo tatiyo puggalo
analyzed: dubbaṇṇa duggandhāni badara puppha ādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ evarūpaḥ tatiyaḥ puggalo

original: veditabbo. Catuttho pana tīhipi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa niddosattā, catumadhurabharitasuvaṇṇapāti
analyzed: veditabbo catutthaḥ pana tīhi pi dvārehi āyūhana kammassa niddosa ttā

original: viya daṭṭhabbo. Tesu paṭhamo andhabālaputhujjano. Dutiyo antarantarā kusalassa kārako
analyzed: viya daṭṭhabbo tesu paṭhamaḥ andha bāla puthujjanaḥ dutiyaḥ antar antarā kusalassa kārako

original: lokiyaputhujjano. Tatiyo sotāpanno sakadāgāmianāgāminopi eteneva saṅgahitā. Catuttho
analyzed: lokiya puthujjano tatiyaḥ sotāpannaḥ sakadāgāmi anāgāminaḥ api etena iva saṅgahitāḥ catutthaḥ

original: khīṇāsavo. So hi ekantena anavajjoyeva. Ayaṃ aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyo.
analyzed: khīṇa āsavaḥ saḥ hi ekantena ayam aṅguttara ṭṭhakathāyaḥ

original: 148. Ugghaṭitaññūādīsu – ugghaṭitaññūti ettha ugghaṭitaṃ nāma ñāṇugghāṭanaṃ, ñāṇe
analyzed: ugghaṭita ññū ādīsu ettha ugghaṭitam nāma ñāṇa ugghāṭanam ñāṇe

original: ugghaṭitamatteyeva jānātīti attho. Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāre udāhaṭamatteyeva.
analyzed: ugghaṭita mattā iya iva jānāti iti saha udāhaṭa velāyāḥ ati udāhāre udāhaṭa mattā iya iva

original: Dhammābhisamayoti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
analyzed: dhamma abhisamayaḥ ti catu sacca dhammassa ñāṇena saddhim abhisamayaḥ ayam vuccati iti ayam

original: ‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
analyzed: cattāro sati paṭṭhāna ati ādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanā anusārena

original: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ugghaṭitaññūti vuccati.
analyzed: ñāṇam pesetvā arahattam gaṇhitum samatthaḥ puggalo ugghaṭitaññū ti vuccati

original: 149. Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
analyzed: vipañcitam vitthāritam eva attham jānāti iti vipañcitaññū ayam vuccati iti ayam

original: saṅkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe bhājiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho
analyzed: saṅkhittena mātikam ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe bhājiyamāne arahattam pāpuṇitum samatthaḥ

original: puggalo vipañcitaññūti vuccati.
analyzed: puggalaḥ vipañcitaññū ti vuccati

original: 150. Uddesādīhi netabboti neyyo. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti.
analyzed: uddesa ādīhi netabbaḥ oti neyyaḥ anupubbena dhamma abhisamayaḥ hoti iti anukkamena arahatta ppatti

original: 151. Byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamo. Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti na tena attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ sakkotīti attho.
analyzed: byañjana padam eva paramam assa ati pada paramaḥ na tāya jātiyā dhamma abhisamayaḥ hoti iti na tena atta bhāvena jhānam vā vipassanam vā maggam vā phalam vā nibbattetum sakkoti iti attho

original: 152. Yuttapaṭibhānādīsu – paṭibhānaṃ vuccati ñāṇampi, ñāṇassa upaṭṭhitavacanampi.
analyzed: yutta paṭibhāna ādīsu paṭibhānam vuccati ñāṇam pi ñāṇassa upaṭṭhita vacanam pi

original: Taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttañca paṭibhānamassāti yuttappaṭibhāno.
analyzed: tat idha adhippetam attha yuttam kāraṇa yuttam ca paṭibhānam assa ati yutta paṭibhānaḥ

original: Pucchitānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya no muttaṃ paṭibhānamassāti no muttappaṭibhāno.
analyzed: pucchita anantaram eva sīgham byākātum asamattha tāya no muttam paṭibhānam assa ati no mutta paṭibhānaḥ

original: Iminā nayena sesā veditabbā. Ettha pana paṭhamo – kiñci kālaṃ vīmaṃsitvā yuttameva
analyzed: iminā nayena sesāḥ veditabbāḥ ettha pana kiñci kālam vīmaṃsitvā yuttam eva

original: pekkhati, tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero viya. So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pariggahetvā yuttapayuttakāraṇameva katheti.
analyzed: pekkhati tipiṭakacūḷanāga theraḥ viya so kira pañham puṭṭhaḥ pariggahetvā yutta payutta kāraṇam eva kathā iti

original: Dutiyo – pucchānantarameva yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati, vīmaṃsitvāpi ca yuttaṃ
analyzed: dutiyaḥ puccha anantaram eva yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati vīmaṃsitvā api ca yuttam

original: na pekkhati catunikāyikapaṇḍitatissatthero viya. So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pañhapariyosānampi
analyzed: na pekkhati catu nikāyika paṇḍita tissa theraḥ viya so kira pañham puṭṭho pañha pariyosānam pi

original: nāgameti, yaṃ vā taṃ vā kathetiyeva. Vacanatthaṃ panassa vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ katthaci na laggati.
analyzed: na āgameti yam vā tam vā vacana attham panassa vīmaṃsiyamānam katthaci na laggati

original: Tatiyo – pucchāsamakālameva yuttaṃ pekkhati, taṅkhaṇaññeva vacanaṃ byākaroti tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero viya. So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho sīghameva katheti, yuttapayuttakāraṇo ca hoti.
analyzed: tatiyo pucchā sama kālam eva yuttam pekkhati vacanam byākaroti tipiṭakacūḷābhaya theraḥ viya saḥ kira pañham puṭṭho sīgham eva katheti yutta payutta kāraṇo ca hoti

original: Catuttho – puṭṭho samāno neva yuttaṃ pekkhati, na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti tibbandhakāranimuggo viya hoti lāḷudāyitthero viya.
analyzed: catutthaḥ puṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ na iva yuttam pekkhati na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhitum sakkoti tibbandha kāra nimuggaḥ viya hoti lāḷudāyi ttheraḥ viya

original: 156. Dhammakathikesu – appañca bhāsatīti sampattaparisāya thokameva katheti. Asahitañcāti
analyzed: dhamma kathikesu appañca bhāsati iti sampatta parisāya thokam eva katheti asahitam ca ati

original: kathento ca pana na atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttaṃ katheti. Parisā cassa na kusalā hotīti
analyzed: kathentaḥ ca pana na attha yuttam kāraṇa yuttam katheti parisā ca sassa na kusalā hoti iti

original: sotuṃ nisinnaparisā cassa yuttāyuttaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ siliṭṭhāsiliṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti
analyzed: sotum nisinna parisā ca ssa yutta ayuttam kāraṇa akāraṇam siliṭṭha a siliṭṭham na jānāti iti

original: attho. Evarūpoti ayaṃ evaṃjātiko bāladhammakathiko. Evaṃjātikāya bālaparisāya dhammakathikotveva
analyzed: atthaḥ evarūpaḥ ti ayam evaṃjātikaḥ bāla dhamma kathikaḥ evaṃjātikāya bāla parisāya dhamma kathikaḥ tu eva

original: nāmaṃ labhati. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Ettha ca dveyeva janā sabhāvadhammakathikā,
analyzed: nāmam labhati iminā nayena sabbattha atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ettha ca dveyā iva janā sabhāva dhamma kathikā

original: itare pana dhammakathikānaṃ antare paviṭṭhattā evaṃ vuttā.
analyzed: itare pana dhamma kathikānam antare paviṭṭha ttā evam vuttā

original: 157. Valāhakūpamesu valāhakāti meghā. Gajjitāti thanitā. Tattha gajjitvā no vassanabhāvo
analyzed: valāhaka upamesu valāhakā ati meghāḥ gajjitā ati thanitā tattha gajjitvā no vassana bhāvaḥ

original: nāma pāpako. Manussā hi yathā devo gajjati ‘suvuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti bījāni nīharitvā
analyzed: nāma pāpakaḥ manussāḥ hi yathā devaḥ gajjati su vuṭṭhikā bhavissati iti bījāni nīharitvā

original: vapanti. Atha deve avassante khette bījāni khetteyeva nassanti, gehe bījāni geheyeva
analyzed: vapanti atha deve avassante khette bījāni khette iva nassanti gehe bījāni gehe iva

original: nassantīti dubbhikkhaṃ hoti. No gajjitvā vassanabhāvopi pāpakova. Manussā hi ‘imasmiṃ
analyzed: nassanti iti dubbhikkham hoti no gajjitvā vassana bhāvaḥ pi pāpakaḥ eva manussāḥ hi imasmin

original: kāle dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti ninnaṭṭhānesuyeva vappaṃ karonti. Atha devo vassitvā
analyzed: kāle dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissati iti ninna ṭṭhānesu yeva vappam karonti atha devaḥ vassitvā

original: sabbabījāni mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti, dubbhikkhameva hoti. Gajjitvā vassanabhāvo pana
analyzed: sabba bījāni mahā samuddam pāpeti dubbhikkham eva hoti gajjitvā vassana bhāvaḥ pana

original: bhaddako. Tadā hi subhikkhaṃ hoti. No gajjitvā no vassanabhāvo ekantapāpakova.
analyzed: bhaddako tadā hi subhikkham hoti no gajjitvā no vassana bhāvaḥ ekanta pāpakaḥ va

original: Bhāsitā hoti no kattāti ‘idāni ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi, vāsadhuraṃ pūressāmī’ti kathetiyeva, na pana uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, na kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāveti.
analyzed: bhāsitā hoti no kattā ati idāni gantha dhuram pūressāmi vāsa dhuram pūressāmi iti na pana uddesam gaṇhāti na kammaṭṭhānam bhāveti

original: Kattā hoti no bhāsitāti ‘ganthadhuraṃ vā pūressāmi vāsadhuraṃ vā’ti na bhāsati. Sampatte
analyzed: kattā hoti no bhāsitā ati gantha dhuram vā pūressāmi vāsa dhuram vā ati na bhāsati sampatte

original: pana kāle tamatthaṃ sampādeti. Iminā nayena itarepi veditabbā. Sabbaṃ panetaṃ paccayadāyakeneva
analyzed: pana kāle tam attham sampādeti iminā nayena itarā api veditabbā sabbam pana etam paccaya dāyakena iva

original: kathitaṃ. Eko hi ‘asukadivase nāma dānaṃ dassāmī’ti saṅghaṃ nimanteti, sampattakāle
analyzed: kathitam ekaḥ hi asuka divase nāma dānam dassāmi iti saṅgham nimanteti sampatta kāle

original: no karoti. Ayaṃ puggalo puññena parihāyati, bhikkhusaṅghopi lābhena parihāyati. Aparo
analyzed: no karoti ayam puggalo puññena parihāyati bhikkhu saṅghaḥ api lābhena parihāyati aparaḥ

original: saṅghaṃ animantetvāva sakkāraṃ katvā ‘bhikkhū ānessāmī’ti na labhati, sabbe aññattha
analyzed: saṅgham a nimantetvā ava sakkāram katvā bhikkhū ānessāmi iti na labhati sabbe aññattha

original: nimantitā honti. Ayampi puññena parihāyati, saṅghopi tena lābhena parihāyati. Aparo
analyzed: nimantitāḥ honti ayam pi puññena parihāyati saṅghaḥ api tena lābhena parihāyati aparaḥ

original: paṭhamaṃ saṅghaṃ nimantetvā, pacchā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti, ayaṃ kiccakārī hoti.
analyzed: paṭhamam saṅgham nimantetvā pacchā sakkāram katvā dānam deti ayam kicca kārī hoti

original: Aparo neva saṅghaṃ nimanteti, na dānaṃ deti, ayaṃ ‘pāpapuggalo’ti veditabbo.
analyzed: aparaḥ na iva saṅgham nimanteti na dānam deti ayam pāpa puggalaḥ iti veditabbaḥ

original: 158. Mūsikūpamesu – gādhaṃ kattā no vasitāti attano āsayaṃ bilaṃ kūpaṃ khaṇati, no
analyzed: mūsi kūpamesu gādham kattā naḥ vasitā ati attanaḥ āsayam bilam kūpam khaṇati naḥ

original: tattha vasati, kismiñcideva ṭhāne vasati, evaṃ biḷārādiamittavasaṃ gacchati. Khattātipi
analyzed: tattha vasati kismiṃcid eva ṭhāne vasati evam biḷāra ādi amitta vasam gacchati khattā atipi

original: pāṭho. Vasitā no gādhaṃ kattāti sayaṃ na khaṇati, parena khate bile vasati, evaṃ
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ vasitā naḥ gādham kattā ati sayam na khaṇati parena khate bile vasati evam

original: jīvitaṃ rakkhati. Tatiyā dvepi karontī, jīvitaṃ rakkhati. Catutthā dvepi akarontī
analyzed: jīvitam rakkhati tatiyā dve api karontī jīvitam rakkhati catutthā dve api a karontī

original: amittavasaṃ gacchati. Imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu paṭhamo yathā sā mūsikā
analyzed: amitta vasam gacchati imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu paṭhamaḥ yathā sā mūsikā

original: gādhaṃ khaṇati, evaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ uggaṇhāti. Yathā pana sā tattha na vasati,
analyzed: gādham khaṇati evam navaṅgam satthu sāsanam uggaṇhāti yathā pana sā tattha na vasati

original: kismiñcideva ṭhāne vasantī, amittavasaṃ gacchati; tathā ayampi pariyattivasena ñāṇaṃ
analyzed: kismiṃcid eva ṭhāne vasantī amitta vasam gacchati tathā ayam pi pariyatti vasena ñāṇam

original: pesetvā catusaccadhammaṃ na paṭivijjhati, lokāmisaṭṭhānesuyeva caranto maccumārakilesamāradevaputtamārasaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: pesetvā catu sacca dhammam na paṭivijjhati loka āmisa ṭṭhānesu yeva carantaḥ maccu māra kilesa māra devaputta māra saṅkhātānam

original: amittānaṃ vasaṃ gacchati. Dutiyo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ na khaṇati, evaṃ navaṅgaṃ
analyzed: amittānam vasam gacchati dutiyaḥ yathā sā mūsikā gādham na khaṇati evam navaṅgam

original: satthusāsanaṃ na uggaṇhāti. Yathā pana parena khatabile vasantī jīvitaṃ rakkhati;
analyzed: satthu sāsanam na uggaṇhāti yathā pana parena khata bile vasantī jīvitam rakkhati

original: evaṃ parassa kathaṃ sutvā catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vasaṃ atikkamati.
analyzed: evam parassa katham sutvā catu sacca dhammam paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇam mārānam vasam atikkamati

original: Iminā nayena tatiyacatutthesupi opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: iminā nayena tatiya catutthesu pi opamma saṃsandanam veditabbam

original: 159. Ambūpamesu – āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇīti anto āmaṃ bahi pakkasadisaṃ. Pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇīti
analyzed: ambu upamesu āmam pakka vaṇṇī iti antar āmam bahi pakka sadisam pakkam āma vaṇṇī iti

original: anto pakkaṃ bahi āmasadisaṃ. Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. Tattha yathā ambe apakkabhāvo
analyzed: antar pakkam bahi āma sadisam sesa dvayesu pi esa iva nayaḥ tattha yathā ambe apakka bhāvaḥ

original: āmatā hoti, evaṃ puggalepi puthujjanabhāvo āmatā, ariyabhāvo pakkatā. Yathā ca tattha
analyzed: āmatā hoti evam puggale pi puthujjana bhāvaḥ āmatā ariya bhāvaḥ pakkatā yathā ca tattha

original: pakkasadisatā pakkavaṇṇitā; evaṃ puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatā pakkavaṇṇitāti
analyzed: pakka sadisa tā pakka vaṇṇitā evam puggale pi ariyānam abhikkamana ādi sadisa tā pakka vaṇṇitā ati

original: – iminā nayena upamitapuggalesu opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: iminā nayena upamita puggalesu opamma saṃsandanam veditabbam

original: 160. Kumbhūpamesu – kumbhoti ghaṭo. Tucchoti anto ritto. Pihitoti pidahitvā ṭhapito.
analyzed: kumbha upamesu kumbhaḥ iti ghaṭaḥ tucchaḥ iti antaḥ rittaḥ pihitaḥ iti pidahitvā ṭhapitaḥ

original: Puroti anto puṇṇo. Vivaṭoti vivaritvā ṭhapito. Upamitapuggalesu panettha anto guṇasāravirahito
analyzed: puras ti antaḥ puṇṇaḥ vivaṭaḥ ti vivaritvā ṭhapito upamita puggalesu pana ittha antaḥ guṇa sāra virahito

original: tuccho bāhirasobhanatāya pihito puggalo veditabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tucchaḥ bāhira sobhana tāya pihitaḥ puggalaḥ veditabbaḥ sesesu pi esā iva nayo

original: 161. Udakarahadūpamesu – udakarahado tāva jaṇṇumattepi udake sati paṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇattā
analyzed: udaka rahad upamesu udaka rahadaḥ tāva jaṇṇumatte api udake sati paṇṇa rasa sambhinna vaṇṇattā

original: vā bahalattā vā udakassa apaññāyamānatalo uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma hoti. Tiporisa
analyzed: vā bahala ttā vā udakassa a paññāyamāna talo uttānaḥ gambhīra ubhāsaḥ nāma hoti tiporisa

original: catuporisepi pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamānatalo gambhīro uttānobhāso
analyzed: catuporise pi pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamāna talo gambhīraḥ uttāna ubhāso

original: nāma hoti. Ubhayakāraṇasambhāvato pana itare dve veditabbā. Puggalopi kilesussadabhāvato
analyzed: nāma hoti ubhaya kāraṇa sambhāvataḥ pana itare dve veditabbā puggalaḥ api

original: guṇagambhīratāya ca abhāvato guṇagambhīrānaṃ sadisehi abhikkamādīhi yutto uttāno
analyzed: guṇa gambhīra tāya ca abhāvataḥ sadisehi abhikkama ādīhi yuttaḥ uttānaḥ

original: gambhīrobhāso nāma. Iminā nayena sesāpi veditabbā.
analyzed: gambhīrobhāsaḥ nāma iminā nayena sesā api veditabbā

original: 162. Balībaddūpamesu – balībaddo tāva yo attano gogaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti, paragogaṇe
analyzed: balībaddha upamesu balībaddaḥ tāva yaḥ attanaḥ go gaṇam ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti para go gaṇe

original: pana sorato sukhasīlo hoti – ayaṃ sakagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo nāma. Puggalopi
analyzed: pana sorataḥ sukha sīlo hoti ayam sakagavacaṇḍaḥ no paragavacaṇḍaḥ nāma puggalaḥ api

original: attano parisaṃ ghaṭṭento vijjhanto pharusena samudācaranto, paraparisāya pana soraccaṃ
analyzed: attano parisam ghaṭṭentaḥ vijjhantaḥ pharusena samudācarantaḥ para parisāya pana soraccam

original: nivātavuttitaṃ āpajjanto sakagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo nāmāti. Iminā nayena
analyzed: āpajjanto sakagavacaṇḍaḥ hoti no paragavacaṇḍaḥ nāma ati iminā nayena

original: sesāpi veditabbā. Niddesavāre panettha ubbejitā hotīti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbegappattaṃ karoticceva attho.
analyzed: sesā api veditabbā niddesa vāre pana ittha ubbejitā hoti iti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbega ppattam attho

original: 163. Āsīvisūpamesu – āsīviso tāva yassa visaṃ āsuṃ āgacchati sīghaṃ pharati; ghoraṃ
analyzed: āsīvisa upamesu āsīvisaḥ tāva yassa visam āsum āgacchati sīgham pharati ghoram

original: pana na hoti, cirakālaṃ na pīḷeti – ayaṃ āgataviso no ghoraviso. Sesapadesupi eseva
analyzed: pana na hoti cira kālam na pīḍeti ayam āgata visaḥ no ghora visaḥ sesa padesu pi esā iva

original: nayo. Puggalavibhājanaṃ pana uttānatthameva.
analyzed: puggala vibhājanam pana uttāna attham eva

original: 164. Ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hotītiādīsu ananuviccāti atulayitvā, apariggaṇhitvā. Apariyogāhetvāti paññāya guṇe anogāhetvā.
analyzed: an anuvicca a pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇā rahassa vaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti itiādīsu an anuvicca ati a tulayitvā a pariggaṇhitvā a pariyogāhetvā ati paññāya guṇe anogāhetvā

original: 166. Bhūtaṃ tacchanti vijjamānato bhūtaṃ, aviparītato tacchaṃ. Kālenāti yuttapayuttakālena.
analyzed: bhūtam tacchanti vijjamānataḥ bhūtam kālena ati yutta payutta kālena

original: Tatra kālaññū hotīti yamidaṃ kālenāti vuttaṃ. Tatra yo puggalo kālaññū hoti, kālaṃ
analyzed: tatra kālaññū hoti iti yam idam kālena ati vuttam tatra yaḥ puggalaḥ kālaññū hoti kālam

original: jānāti, tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇatthāya “imasmiṃ kāle pucchitenāpi mayā na kathetabbā,
analyzed: jānāti tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇa atthāya imasmin kāle pucchitena api mayā na kathetabbā

original: imasmiṃ kāle kathetabbā”ti – ayaṃ kālena bhaṇati nāma. Upekkhako viharatīti majjhattabhūtāya
analyzed: imasmin kāle kathetabbā ati ayam kālena bhaṇati nāma upekkhakaḥ viharati iti majjhatta bhūtāya

original: upekkhāya ṭhito hutvā viharati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.
analyzed: upekkhāya ṭhitaḥ hutvā viharati sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva

original: 167. Uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvītiādīsu – yo uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ
analyzed: uṭṭhāna phala upajīvī iti ādīsu yaḥ uṭṭhāna vīriyena iva divasam tassa nissanda phala mattam

original: kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti, taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ na
analyzed: kiñcid eva labhitvā jīvikam kappeti tam pana uṭṭhānam āgamma kiñci puñña phalam na

original: paṭilabhati, taṃ sandhāya yassa puggalassa uṭṭhahatotiādi vuttaṃ. Tatūpari devāti
analyzed: paṭilabhati tam sandhāya yassa puggalassa uṭṭhahato tiādi vuttam deva ti

original: tato upari brahmakāyikādayo devā. Tesañhi uṭṭhānavīriyena kiccaṃ nāma natthi. Puññaphalameva
analyzed: tatas upari brahmakāyika ādayaḥ devā tesam hi uṭṭhāna vīriyena kiccam nāma natthi puñña phalam eva

original: upajīvanti. Puññavato cāti idaṃ puññavante khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo ceva bhummadeve ādiṃ
analyzed: upajīvanti puññavataḥ ca ati idam puññavante khattiya brāhmaṇa ādayo ca iva bhummadeve ādim

original: katvā nimmānaratipariyosāne deve ca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sabbepi hete vāyāmaphalañceva
analyzed: katvā nimmāna rati pariyosāne deve ca sandhāya vuttam sabbe pi hete vāyāma phalam ca iva

original: puññaphalañca anubhavanti. Nerayikā pana neva uṭṭhānena ājīvaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti,
analyzed: puñña phalam ca anubhavanti nerayikāḥ pana na iva uṭṭhānena ājīvam uppādetum sakkonti

original: nāpi nesaṃ puññaphalena koci ājīvo uppajjati.
analyzed: na api nesam puñña phalena koci ājīvaḥ uppajjati

original: 168. Tamādīsu – “nīce kule paccājāto”tiādikena tamena yuttoti tamo. Kāyaduccaritādīhi
analyzed: tama ādīsu nīce kule paccājāto ti ādikena tamena yutto ti kāya duccarita ādīhi

original: puna nirayatamūpagamanato tamaparāyaṇo. Nesādakuleti migaluddakādīnaṃ kule. Venakuleti
analyzed: punar tam aparāyaṇaḥ nesāda kula iti migaluddaka ādīnam kule vena kula iti

original: vilīvakārakule. Rathakārakuleti cammakārakule. Pukkusakuleti pupphachaḍḍakakule.
analyzed: vilīvakāra kule rathakāra kule iti cammakāra kule pukkusa kule iti puppha chaḍḍaka kule

original: Kasiravuttiketi dukkhavuttike. Dubbaṇṇoti paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. Duddasikoti
analyzed: kasira vuttike iti dukkha vuttike dubbaṇṇo ti paṃsu pisācakaḥ viya jhāma khāṇu vaṇṇo duddasikaḥ ti

original: vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano. Okoṭimakoti lakuṇḍako. Kāṇoti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo
analyzed: vijāta mātuyā api amanāpa dassanaḥ okoṭimakaḥ ti lakuṇḍako kāṇaḥ ti ekakkhikāṇaḥ vā ubhayakkhikāṇaḥ

original: vā. Kuṇīti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. Khañjoti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo
analyzed: vā kuṇī iti eka hattha kuṇī vā ubhaya hattha kuṇī vā khañjo iti eka pāda khañjaḥ vā ubhaya pāda khañjaḥ

original: vā. Pakkhahatoti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī. Padīpeyyassāti telakapallakādino padīpūpakaraṇassa.
analyzed: vā pakkha hataḥ ti hata pakkhaḥ pīṭha sappī padīpeyyassa ati telaka pallaka ādino padīpūpakaraṇassa

original: Evaṃ puggalo tamo hoti tamaparāyaṇoti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiññeva

original: kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalepi kappe saṃsarati. Sopi tamo tamaparāyaṇova.
analyzed: kālam katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakale api kappe saṃsarati saḥ api tamaḥ tama parāyaṇaḥ uva

original: So pana kuhakapuggalo bhaveyya. Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ pana kuhaka puggalaḥ bhaveyya kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hoti iti vuttam

original: Ettha ca nīce kule paccājāto hoti caṇḍālakule vātiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti

original: Dubbaṇṇotiādīhi rūpavipatti. Bahvābādhotiādīhi dukkhakāraṇasamāyogo. Na lābhītiādīhi
analyzed: dubbaṇṇaḥ tiādīhi rūpa vipatti bahu ābādhaḥ iti ādīhi dukkha kāraṇa samāyogaḥ na lābhī iti ādīhi

original: sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca. Kāyena duccaritantiādīhi tamaparāyaṇabhāvassa
analyzed: sukha kāraṇa vipatti ca iva upabhoga vipatti ca kāyena

original: kāraṇasamāyogo. Kāyassa bhedātiādīhi samparāyikatamūpagamo. Sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo.
analyzed: kāraṇa samāyogaḥ kāyassa bheda ati ādīhi samparāyika tama upagamaḥ sukka pakkhaḥ vutta paṭipakkha nayena veditabbo

original: Apicettha tividhāya kulasampattiyā paccājātiādikena jotinā yuttato joti, ālokabhūtoti
analyzed: apica ittha tividhāya kula sampattiyā paccājāti ādikena jotinā yuttataḥ joti āloka bhūtā ti

analyzed: vuttam hoti kāya su carita ādīhi pana saggu upapatti joti bhāva upagamanataḥ joti parāyaṇaḥ

original: Khattiyamahāsālakule vātiādīsu khattiyamahāsālāti khattiyā mahāsārā mahāsārappattā
analyzed: khattiya mahāsāla kule vā ati ādīsu khattiya mahāsālā ati khattiyāḥ mahā sārāḥ mahā sāra ppattā

analyzed: vaḷañjana atthāya geha majjhe rāsim katvā ṭhapitāḥ honti te khattiya mahāsālāḥ nāma yesam

analyzed: asīti koṭi dhanam nihitam hoti diyaḍḍhaḥ kahāpaṇa kumbhaḥ vaḷañjana tthāya

original: Nidhānagatassa jātarūparajatassa pahūtatāya pahūtajātarūparajate. Vittūpakaraṇassa
analyzed: nidhāna gatassa jātarūpa rajatassa pahūta tāya pahūta jātarūpa rajate vittu upakaraṇassa

original: tuṭṭhikaraṇassa pahūtatāya pahūtavittūpakaraṇe. Godhanādīnañca sattavidhadhaññānañca

analyzed: pahūta tāya pahūta dhana dhaññe abhirūpaḥ uti sundara rūpaḥ dassanīyaḥ iti aññam kammam pahāya

original: divasampi passitabbayutto. Pāsādikoti dassaneneva cittapasādāvaho. Paramāyāti uttamāya.
analyzed: divasam pi passitabba yuttaḥ pāsādiko ti dassanena iva citta pasāda āvaho paramāya āti uttamāya

original: Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti pokkharavaṇṇatāya. Pokkharaṃ vuccati sarīraṃ. Tassa vaṇṇasampattiyāti
analyzed: vaṇṇa pokkhara tāya ati pokkhara vaṇṇa tāya pokkharam vuccati sarīram tassa vaṇṇa sampattiyā ati

original: attho. Samannāgatoti upeto.
analyzed: attho samannāgato ti upeto

original: 169. Oṇatoṇatādīsu – diṭṭhadhammikāya vā samparāyikāya vā sampattiyā virahito oṇato.

analyzed: nīcaḥ lāmakaḥ ti attho tad vipakkhataḥ uṇṇataḥ uccaḥ uggataḥ ti attho sesam ettha tama ādīsu

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Apica – oṇatoṇatoti idāni nīco, āyatimpi nīcova bhavissati.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbam apica oṇatoṇato ti idāni nīcaḥ āyatim pi nīcaḥ uva bhavissati

original: Oṇatuṇṇatoti idāni nīco, āyatiṃ ucco bhavissati. Uṇṇatoṇatoti idāni ucco, āyatiṃ

original: nīco bhavissati. Uṇṇatuṇṇatoti idāni ucco, āyatimpi uccova bhavissatīti.
analyzed: nīcaḥ bhavissati uṇṇa tuṇṇataḥ ti idāni uccaḥ āyatim pi uccaḥ uva bhavissati iti

original: 170. Rukkhūpamesu – rukkho tāva pheggusāraparivāroti vanajeṭṭhakarukkho sayaṃ pheggu
analyzed: rukkha upamesu rukkho tāva pheggu sāra parivāro ti vana jeṭṭhaka rukkho sayam pheggu

original: hoti, parivārarukkhā panassa sārā honti. Iminā nayena sesā veditabbā. Puggalesu pana

analyzed: sīla sāra virahataḥ pheggu tā sīla ācāra samannāgamena ca sāra tā veditabbā

original: 171. Rūpappamāṇādīsu – sampattiyuttaṃ rūpaṃ pamāṇaṃ karotīti rūpappamāṇo. Tattha
analyzed: rūpa ppamāṇa ādīsu sampatti yuttam rūpam pamāṇam karoti iti rūpa ppamāṇaḥ tattha

analyzed: pasādam janeti iti rūpa ppasanno kitti sadda bhūtam ghosam pamāṇam karoti iti ghosa ppamāṇaḥ

original: Ārohaṃ vātiādīsu pana – ārohanti uccattanaṃ. Pariṇāhanti kisathūlabhāvāpagataṃ parikkhepasampattiṃ.
analyzed: āroham vā ti ādīsu pana ārohanti uccattanam pariṇāhanti kisa thūla bhāva apagatam parikkhepa sampattim

original: Saṇṭhānanti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ dīgharassavaṭṭatādiyuttaṭṭhānesu tathābhāvaṃ. Pāripūrinti
analyzed: saṇṭhānam ti aṅga paccaṅgānam tathābhāvam pāripūrin ti

original: yathāvuttappakārānaṃ anūnataṃ, lakkhaṇaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ vā. Paravaṇṇanāyāti parehi
analyzed: yathāvutta ppakārānam anūna tam lakkhaṇa paripuṇṇa bhāvam vā para vaṇṇanāya ati parehi

original: parammukhā nicchāritāya guṇavaṇṇanāya. Parathomanāyāti parehi thutivasena gāthādiupanibandhanena
analyzed: parammukhāḥ nicchāritāya guṇa vaṇṇanāya parathomanāya ati parehi thuti vasena gāthā ādi upanibandhanena

original: vuttāya thomanāya. Parapasaṃsanāyāti parehi sammukhā vuttāya pasaṃsāya. Paravaṇṇahārikāyāti
analyzed: vuttāya thomanāya para pasaṃsanāya ati parehi sammukhā vuttāya pasaṃsāya para vaṇṇa hārikāya ati

original: paramparathutivasena parehi pavattitāya vaṇṇaharaṇāya.
analyzed: parampara thuti vasena parehi vaṇṇa haraṇāya

original: 172. Cīvaralūkhanti cīvarassa dubbaṇṇādibhāvena lūkhataṃ. Pattalūkhanti bhājanassa
analyzed: cīvara lūkhanti cīvarassa dubbaṇṇa ādi bhāvena lūkhatam patta lūkhanti bhājanassa

original: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavatthūhi lūkhataṃ. Senāsanalūkhanti nāṭakādisampattivirahena senāsanassa
analyzed: vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna vatthūhi lūkhatam senāsana lūkhanti nāṭaka ādi sampatti virahena senāsanassa

original: lūkhataṃ. Vividhanti acelakādibhāvena anekappakāraṃ. Dukkarakārikanti sarīratāpanaṃ.
analyzed: lūkhatam vividhanti acelaka ādi bhāvena aneka ppakāram sarīra tāpanam

original: Aparo nayo – imesu hi catūsu puggalesu rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno rūpappamāṇo nāma.
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ imesu hi catūsu puggalesu rūpe pamāṇam gahetvā pasannaḥ rūpappamāṇaḥ nāma

original: Rūpappasannoti tasseva atthavacanaṃ. Ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ghosappamāṇo nāma.
analyzed: rūpa ppasannaḥ ti tassa iva atthavacanam ghose pamāṇam gahetvā pasannaḥ ghosappamāṇaḥ nāma

original: Cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno lūkhappamāṇo nāma. Dhamme pamāṇaṃ

original: gahetvā pasanno dhammappamāṇo nāma. Itarāni tesaṃyeva atthavacanāni. Sabbasatte ca
analyzed: gahetvā pasannaḥ dhammappamāṇaḥ nāma itarāni tesam yeva attha vacanāni sabba satte ca

original: tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā rūpappamāṇā, eko na rūpappamāṇo. Pañca koṭṭhāse

original: katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā, eko na ghosappamāṇo. Dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava

original: koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā, eko na lūkhappamāṇo. Satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko
analyzed: koṭṭhāsāḥ lūkha ppamāṇāḥ ekaḥ na lūkha ppamāṇaḥ sata sahassam koṭṭhāse katvā pana ekaḥ

original: koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo, sesā na dhammappamāṇā. Evamayaṃ catuppamāṇo lokasannivāso.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ uva dhamma ppamāṇaḥ sesāḥ na dhamma ppamāṇāḥ evam ayam catu pamāṇaḥ loka sannivāso

original: Etasmiṃ catuppamāṇe lokasannivāse buddhesu appasannā mandā, pasannāva bahukā. Rūpappamāṇassa
analyzed: etasmin catu pamāṇe loka sannivāse buddhesu appasannā mandā pasannā ava bahukā rūpa ppamāṇassa

original: uttari pasādāvaho ghoso nāma natthi. Lūkhappamāṇassa kāsikāni vatthāni mahārahāni
analyzed: uttari pasādāvahaḥ ghosaḥ nāma natthi lūkha ppamāṇassa kāsikāni vatthāni mahā rahāni

original: kañcanabhājanāni tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike sabbasampattiyutte pāsādavare pahāya paṃsukūlacīvaraselamayapattarukkhamūlādisenāsanasevino
analyzed: kañcana bhājanāni tiṇṇam utūnam anucchavike sabba sampatti yutte pāsāda vare pahāya paṃsu kūla cīvara sela maya patta rukkha mūla ādi senāsana sevinaḥ

original: buddhassa bhagavato lūkhato uttari pasādāvahaṃ aññaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi. Dhammappamāṇassa
