analyzed: sa devake loke asādhāraṇa sīla ādi guṇassa tathāgatassa sīla ādi guṇataḥ uttari pasāda āvaho

original: añño sīlādiguṇo nāma natthi. Iti bhagavā imaṃ catuppamāṇikaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ muṭṭhinā
analyzed: sīla ādi guṇo nāma na atthi iti bhagavā imam catuppamāṇikam loka sannivāsam muṭṭhinā

original: gahetvā viya ṭhitoti.
analyzed: gahetvā viya ṭhitā uti

original: 173. Attahitāya paṭipannādīsu – sīlasampannoti sīlena sampanno samannāgato. Samādhisampannotiādīsupi
analyzed: atta hitāya paṭipanna ādīsu sīla sampanno ti sīlena sampanno samannāgato samādhi sampanno ti ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ettha ca sīlaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ kathitaṃ. Tathā samādhipaññā ca. Vimutti
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ettha ca sīlam lokiya lokuttaram kathitam tathā samādhi paññā ca vimutti

original: arahattaphalavimuttiyeva. Ñāṇadassanaṃ ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. No parantiādīsu
analyzed: arahatta phala vimuttiyā iva ñāṇa dassanam ekūnavīsatividham paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam no para ti ādīsu

analyzed: para puggalam tayā api sīla sampannena bhavitum vaṭṭati iti vatvā yathā sīlam

original: evaṃ na samādapeti, na gaṇhāpeti. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Etesu pana catūsu paṭhamo
analyzed: evam na samādapeti na gaṇhāpeti esa iva nayaḥ sabbattha etesu pana catūsu paṭhamaḥ

original: vakkalittherasadiso hoti. Dutiyo upanandasakyaputtasadiso. Tatiyo sāriputtamoggallānattherasadiso.
analyzed: vakkali tthera sadisaḥ hoti dutiyaḥ upananda sakyaputta sadiso tatiyaḥ sāriputta moggallāna tthera sadisaḥ

original: Catuttho devadattasadisoti veditabbo.
analyzed: catutthaḥ devadatta sadisaḥ ti veditabbaḥ

analyzed: lokiya kula putta ācārena virahitaḥ uccāram karoti passāvam karoti khādati

analyzed: bhuñjati ca hattha apalekhano ti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hattham apalekhati

analyzed: vuttaḥ api na tiṭṭhati iti tat ubhayam pi ha etam titthiyāḥ etassa vacanaṃ

analyzed: katam bhavissati iti na karonti abhihaṭanti puretaram gahetvā āhaṭam bhikkham uddissa katanti

original: pahāraṃ labhantīti. Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti.
analyzed: pahāram labhanti iti na ummāram antaram katvā diyyamānam na gaṇhāti

original: Kasmā? Ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatīti. Daṇḍamusalesupi eseva nayo. Dvinnanti

analyzed: dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmin uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhati kasmai kabaḷantarāyaḥ hoti iti

original: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati. Pāyantiyā dārakassa
analyzed: na gabbhiniyā ati ādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyam dārako kilamati pāyantiyā dārakassa

original: saṅkittetvā katabhattesu. Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya
analyzed: kata bhattesu dubbhikkha samaye kira acelaka sāvakāḥ acelakānam atthāya

original: adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti.

analyzed: saṇḍa saṇḍa cārinī iti samūha samūha cārinī sace hi acelakam disvā imassa bhikkham dassāma ati

original: Dvāgārikādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekissāpi dattiyāti ekāya dattiyā. Datti nāma ekā khuddakapāti
analyzed: dvāgārika ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ ekissā api dattiyā ati ekāya dattiyā datti nāma ekā khuddakapāti

original: divasavārena ābhatabhattabhojanaṃ. Sākabhakkhoti allasākabhakkho. Sāmākabhakkhoti

original: cammakārehi cammaṃ vilikhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ. Haṭaṃ vuccati silesopi, sevālopi kaṇikārādirukkhaniyyāsopi.

original: Kaṇanti kuṇḍakaṃ. Ācāmoti bhattaukkhalikāya laggo jhāmodano. Taṃ chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne gahetvā

original: Sāṇānīti sāṇavākacelāni. Masāṇānīti missakacelāni. Chavadussānīti matasarīrato chaḍḍitavatthāni.

analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ kesakambalanti manussa kesehi kata kambalam yam sandhāya vuttam seyyathā api

original: Vāḷakambalanti assavāḷādīhi katakambalaṃ. Ulūkapakkhanti ulūkapattāni ganthetvā katanivāsanaṃ.

original: Luddoti dāruṇo kakkhaḷo. Macchaghātakoti macchabandho kevaṭṭo. Bandhanāgārikoti bandhanāgāragopako.

original: Kurūrakammantāti dāruṇakammantā.
analyzed: kurūra kammantā ati dāruṇa kammantā

original: 176. Muddhāvasittoti khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisitto. Puratthimena nagarassāti
analyzed: muddhāvasitto ti khattiya abhisekena muddhani abhisitto puratthimena nagarassa ati

original: nagarato puratthimadisāya. Sandhāgāranti yaññasālaṃ. Kharājinaṃ nivāsetvāti sakhuraṃ
analyzed: nagarataḥ puratthima disāya yaññasālam khara ajinam nivāsetvā ati sa khuram

original: ajinacammaṃ nivāsetvā. Sappitelenāti sappinā ca telena ca. Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso
analyzed: ajina cammam nivāsetvā sappi telena ati sappinā ca telena ca ṭhapetvā hi sappim avasesaḥ

original: yo koci sneho telanti vuccati. Kaṇḍuvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle
analyzed: yaḥ koci snehaḥ telanti vuccati kaṇḍuvamānaḥ ti nakhānam chinna ttā kaṇḍuvitabba kāle

original: tena kaṇḍuvamāno. Anantarahitāyāti asanthatāya. Sarūpavacchāyāti sadisavacchāya.
analyzed: tena kaṇḍuvamānaḥ anantara hitāya ati a santhatāya sa rūpavacchāya ati

original: Sace gāvī setā hoti, vacchopi setakova sace kabarā vā, rattā vā, vacchopi tādisovāti
analyzed: sace gāvī setā hoti vacchaḥ upi setakā uva sace kabarā vā rattā vā vacchaḥ upi tādisā uvāti

original: – evaṃ sarūpavacchāya. So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti. Vacchatarāti taruṇavacchakabhāvaṃ
analyzed: evam sarūpa vacchāya saḥ evam āha ati saḥ rājā evam vada iti taruṇa vacchaka bhāvam

original: atikkantā balavavacchā. Vacchatarīsupi eseva nayo. Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya
analyzed: atikkantā balava vacchā vacchatarīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ barihi satthāya ati parikkhepa karaṇa tthāya

original: ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.
analyzed: ca iva yañña bhūmiyam attharaṇa tthāya ca

original: 177. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Nicchātoti chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā, sā
analyzed: diṭṭhā iva dhammā iti imasmin yeva atta bhāve chātam vuccati taṇhā sā

original: assa natthīti nicchāto. Sabbakilesānaṃ nibbutattā nibbuto. Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā
analyzed: assa natthi iti nicchātaḥ sabba kilesānam nibbuta ttā nibbutaḥ antaḥ tāpana kilesānam abhāvā

original: sītalo jātoti sītībhūto. Jhānamaggaphalanibbānasukhāni paṭisaṃvedetīti sukhappaṭisaṃvedī.
analyzed: sītalaḥ jātaḥ iti sītībhūtaḥ jhāna magga phala nibbāna sukhāni paṭisaṃvedeti iti sukha ppaṭisaṃvedī

original: Brahmabhūtena attanāti seṭṭhabhūtena attanā.
analyzed: brahma bhūtena attana ati seṭṭha bhūtena attana

original: Imaṃ pana puggalaṃ buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ – idha tathāgatotiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: imam pana puggalam buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetum idha tathāgataḥ ti ādim āha tattha

original: tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti
analyzed: tathāgato ti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgataḥ tathā āgataḥ uti tathāgataḥ tathā gataḥ iti

original: tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti
analyzed: tathāgato tathā lakkhaṇam āgataḥ ti tathāgataḥ tathā dhamme yāthāvataḥ abhisambuddhaḥ ti

original: tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathāvāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato,
analyzed: tathāgato tathā dassitāya tathāgato tathā vāditāya tathāgato tathā kāritāya tathāgato

original: abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti. Arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāneva.
analyzed: abhibhavana ṭṭhena tathāgato ti araham sammāsambuddhaḥ ti ādīni visuddhimagge

original: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ. Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: tam dhammam ti tam vutta pakāra sampadam dhammam suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmai paṭhamam

original: gahapatiṃ niddisati? Nihatamānattā ussannattā ca. Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā
analyzed: gahapatim niddisati nihata mānattā ussanna ttā ca yebhuyyena hi khattiya kulataḥ pabbajitā

original: jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti. Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
analyzed: jātim nissāya mānam karonti brāhmaṇa kulā pabbajitāḥ mante nissāya mānam karonti

original: Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Gahapatidārakā
analyzed: hīna jacca kulā pabbajitāḥ attanaḥ vijāti tāya patiṭṭhātum na sakkonti gahapati dārakā

original: pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa
analyzed: pana kacchehi sedam muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇam pupphamānāya bhūmim kasitvā tādisassa

original: mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti. Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ
analyzed: mānassa abhāvataḥ nihata māna dappāḥ honti te pabbajitvā mānam vā dappam vā a katvā yathābalam

original: buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
analyzed: buddha vacanam uggahetvā vipassanāya kammam karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātum

original: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā, gahapatikāva bahukā. Iti
analyzed: itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitāḥ nāma na bahakāḥ gahapatikāḥ ava bahukāḥ iti

original: nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
analyzed: nihata mānattā ussanna ttā ca paṭhamam gahapatim niddisati iti

original: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Paccājātoti patijāto. Tathāgate
analyzed: aññatarasmim vā ati itaresam vā kulānam aññatarasmim paccājātaḥ ti pati jātaḥ tathāgate

original: saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho
analyzed: saddham paṭilabhati iti parisuddham dhammam sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: vata so bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evaṃ paccavekkhati.
analyzed: vata saḥ bhagavā ati saddham paṭilabhati iti paṭisañcikkhati iti evam paccavekkhati

original: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā
analyzed: sambādhaḥ ghara āvāso ti sace pi ghare vā dve

original: vasanti, tathāpi nesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhoyeva. Rajopathoti
analyzed: vasanti tathā api ghara āvāso

original: rāgarajādīnaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Āgamanapathotipi vattuṃ
analyzed: rāgaraja ādīnam uṭṭhāna ṭṭhānam ti mahā aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam āgamana pathāḥ ti pi vattum

original: vaṭṭati. Alagganaṭṭhena abbhokāso viyāti abbhokāso. Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsāde
analyzed: vaṭṭati a laggana ṭṭhena abbhokāsaḥ viyāti abbhokāsaḥ pabbajitaḥ hi kūṭāgāra ratana pāsāde

original: ca devavimānādīsu ca supihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati,
analyzed: ca deva vimāna ādīsu ca su pihita dvāra vāta pānesu paṭicchannesu vasantaḥ pi nā iva laggati

original: na sajjati, na bajjhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “abbhokāso pabbajjā”ti.
analyzed: na sajjati na bajjhati tena vuttam abbhokāsaḥ pabbajjāti

original: Apica – sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato. Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: apica sambādhaḥ ghara āvāsaḥ kusala kiriyāya okāsa abhāvataḥ rajas pathaḥ a saṃvuta saṅkāra ṭṭhānam

original: viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato. Abbhokāso pabbajjā kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ
analyzed: viya rajānam kilesa rajānam sannipāta ṭṭhānataḥ abbhokāsaḥ pabbajjā kusala kiriyāya yathāsukham

original: okāsasambhāvato. Nayidaṃ sukaraṃ…pe… pabbajeyyanti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā – yadetaṃ
analyzed: okāsa sambhāvataḥ nayi dam sukaraṃpe pabbajeyyanti ettha ayam saṅkhepa kathā yat etam

original: sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya
analyzed: sikkhattaya brahmacariyam ekam pi divasam akhaṇḍam katvā carimaka cittam pāpetabba tāya

original: ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. Ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya
analyzed: ekanta paripuṇṇam eka divasam pi ca kilesa malena a malinam katvā carimaka cittam pāpetabba tāya

original: ekantaparisuddhaṃ. Saṅkhalikhitaṃ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ.
analyzed: ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam likhita saṅkha sadisam dhota saṅkha sappaṭibhāgam caritabbam

original: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ
analyzed: idam na sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā agāra majjhe vasantena caritum

original: – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ
analyzed: yaṃnūnāham kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāya rasa pītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyam

original: carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ
analyzed: carantānam an ucchavikāni vatthāni a chādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyam

original: pabbajeyya”nti. Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ “agāriya”nti vuccati,
analyzed: pabbajeyyanti ettha ca yasmai agārassa hitam kasi vāṇijja ādi kammam agāriyanti vuccati

original: tañca pabbajjāya natthi, tasmā pabbajjā “anagāriya”nti ñātabbā. Taṃ anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajeyyanti
analyzed: tat ca pabbajjāya natthi tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyam ti ñātabbā tam anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: paṭipajjeyyaṃ. Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti, sahassato
analyzed: paṭipajjeyyam appam vāti sahassataḥ heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appaḥ nāma hoti sahassataḥ

original: paṭṭhāya mahā. Abandhanaṭṭhena ñātiyeva ñātiparivaṭṭo. Sopi vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo
analyzed: paṭṭhāya mahā a bandhana aṭṭhena ñātiyā iva ñāti parivaṭṭaḥ so api vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo

original: hoti, vīsatiyā paṭṭhāya mahā.
analyzed: hoti vīsatiyā paṭṭhāya mahā

original: 178. Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam sikkhā sājīva samāpannaḥ ti yā bhikkhūnam adhi sīla saṅkhātā sikkhā tat ca

original: Yattha cete saha jīvanti, ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: yattha ca ite saha jīvanti eka jīvikā sabhāga vuttino honti tam bhagavatā paññatta sikkhāpada saṅkhātam

original: sājīvañca. Tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. Samāpannoti
analyzed: sājīvam ca tattha sikkhana bhāvena samāpanno ti bhikkhūnam sikkhā sājīva samāpanno samāpanno ti

original: sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho. Pāṇātipātaṃ
analyzed: sikkham paripūrento sa ājīvam ca a vītikkamantaḥ hutvā tat ubhayam upagataḥ ti attho pāṇātipātam

original: pahāyātiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva. Pahāyāti imaṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: pahāya ati ādīsu pāṇa atipāta ādi kathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva pahāya ati imam pāṇa atipāta cetanā saṅkhātam

original: dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā. Paṭivirato hotīti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato
analyzed: dussīlyam pajahitvā paṭivirataḥ hoti iti pahīna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya tatas dussīlyato oratas

original: viratova hoti. Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā
analyzed: virataḥ uva hoti nihita daṇḍaḥ nihita sattho ti para upaghāta tthāya daṇḍam vā sattham vā

original: ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā
analyzed: ādāya avattanataḥ nikkhitta daṇḍo ca iva nikkhitta sattho ca ati atthaḥ ettha ca ṭhapetvā

original: daṇḍaṃ, sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vināsanabhāvato ‘sattha’nti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: daṇḍam sabbam pi avasesam upakaraṇam sattānam vināsana bhāvataḥ sattham ti veditabbam

original: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
analyzed: yam pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍam vā dantakaṭṭhavāsim vā pipphalikam vā gahetvā vicaranti

original: na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya. Tasmā nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: na tam tasmai tasmai nihita daṇḍāḥ saṅkham gacchanti

original: Lajjīti pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgato. Dayāpannoti dayaṃ mettacittataṃ
analyzed: lajjī iti pāpa jigucchana lakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgataḥ dayā āpanno ti dayam

original: āpanno. Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako. Tāya dayāpannatāya
analyzed: āpannaḥ sabba pāṇabhūta hita anukampī iti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako tāya dayā panna tāya

original: sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho. Viharatīti iriyati, pāleti.
analyzed: sabbesam pāṇa bhūtānam hita cittakaḥ ti attho viharati iti iriyati pāleti

original: Dinnameva ādiyatīti dinnādāyī. Cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhatīti dinnapāṭikaṅkhī.
analyzed: dinnam eva ādiyati iti dinna ādāyī cittena api dinnam eva paṭikaṅkhati iti dinna pāṭikaṅkhī

original: Thenetīti theno. Na thenena athenena. Athenattāyeva sucibhūtena. Attanāti attabhāvena.
analyzed: thena iti iti thenaḥ na thenena athenena athenattāya iva suci bhūtena attanā ati atta bhāvena

original: Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: atha enam suci bhūtam atta bhāvam katvā viharati iti vuttam hoti

original: Abrahmacariyanti aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ caratīti brahmacārī. Ārācārīti
analyzed: a brahmacariyanti a seṭṭha cariyam brahmam seṭṭham ācāram carati iti brahmacārī ārācārī iti

original: abrahmacariyato dūracārī. Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti
analyzed: a brahmacariyataḥ dūra cārī methunā ati rāga pariyuṭṭhāna vasena sadisa ttā methunakā ati

original: laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā. Gāmadhammāti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.
analyzed: laddha vohārehi paṭisevitabbataḥ methunā ati saṅkham gatāḥ asat dhammāḥ gāma dhammā ati gāma vāsīnam dhammāḥ

original: Saccaṃ vadatīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti saccasandho. Na antarantarā
analyzed: saccam vadati iti sacca vādī saccena saccam sandahati ghaṭa iti iti sacca sandhaḥ na antar antarā

original: musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena
analyzed: musā vadati iti atthaḥ yaḥ hi puriso kadāci musā vadati kadāci saccam tassa musāvādena

original: antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati, tasmā na so saccasandho. Ayaṃ pana na tādiso.
analyzed: saccam saccena na tasmā na saḥ sacca sandhaḥ ayam pana na tādisaḥ

original: Jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho. Thetoti thiro,
analyzed: musā avatvā saccena saccam sandahatiyā iva ati sacca sandho

original: thirakathoti attho. Eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko
analyzed: thira kathā ti attho ekaḥ hi puggalaḥ haliddi rāgaḥ viya thusa rāsimhi nikhāta khāṇukaḥ

original: viya, assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca, na thirakatho hoti. Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya,
analyzed: viya assa piṭṭhe ṭhapita kumbhaṇḍam iva ca na thira kathaḥ hoti ekaḥ pāsāṇa lekhā viya

original: indakhīlo viya ca thirakatho hoti. Asinā sīse chindantepi dve kathā na katheti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: indakhīlaḥ ca asinā sīse chindante api dve kathā na kathā iti ayam

original: vuccati theto. Paccayikoti pattiyāyitabbako, saddhāyikoti attho. Ekacco hi puggalo
analyzed: vuccati theto paccayikaḥ ti saddhāyikaḥ iti attho ekaccaḥ hi puggalo

original: na paccayiko hoti. ‘Idaṃ kena vuttaṃ? Asukenā’ti vutte ‘mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā’ti
analyzed: na paccayikaḥ hoti idam kena vuttam asukena ati vutte mā tassa vacanam saddahatha ati

original: vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti. ‘Idaṃ kena vuttaṃ? Asukenā’ti vutte ‘yadi
analyzed: vattabbatam āpajjati ekaḥ paccayikaḥ hoti idam kena vuttam asukena ati vutte yadi

original: tena vuttaṃ, idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida’nti vattabbataṃ
analyzed: tena vuttam idam eva pamāṇam idāni upaparikkhitabbam na atthi evam eva idam ti vattabbataṃ

original: āpajjati. Ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ
analyzed: āpajjati ayam vuccati paccayikaḥ a visaṃvādakaḥ lokassa ati tāya sacca vādi tāya lokam

original: na visaṃvādetīti attho.
analyzed: na visaṃvādeti iti attho

original: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. Bhinnānaṃ
analyzed: imesam bhedāya ati yesam itas sutvā ati vuttānam santike sutam tesam bhedāya bhinnānam

original: vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ
analyzed: vā sandhātā ati dvinnam mittānam vā samāna upajjhāyaka ādīnam vā kenacid eva kāraṇena bhinnānam

original: ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā – ‘tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ, evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na
analyzed: ekam ekam upasaṅkamitvā tumhākam īdise kule jātānam evam bahu sutānam idam na

original: yutta’ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā. Anuppadātāti sandhānānuppadātā. Dve jane samagge
analyzed: yutta nti ādīni vatvā sandhānam kattā anuppadātā ati sandhāna anuppadātā dve jane samagge

original: disvā – ‘tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ, evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta’ntiādīni
analyzed: tumhākam evarūpe kule jātānam evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānam anucchavikam etanti ādīni

original: vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti samaggārāmo. Yattha samaggā
analyzed: vatvā daḷhīkammam kattā ati samaggaḥ ārāmaḥ assa ati samagga ārāmaḥ yattha samaggā

original: natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. Samaggarāmotipi pāḷi. Ayameva attho.
analyzed: natthi tattha vasitum pi na icchati iti attho ayam eva attho

original: Samaggaratoti samaggesu rato. Te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho. Samagge
analyzed: samagga rato ti samaggesu rato te pahāya aññatra gantum pi na icchati iti attho samagge

original: disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti samagganandī. Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte
analyzed: disvā api sutvā api nandati iti samagga nandī samagga karaṇim vācam bhāsitā ati yā vācā satte

original: samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggīguṇaparidīpakameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.
analyzed: karoti tam sāmaggī guṇa paridīpakam eva vācam bhāsati na itaranti

original: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī. Vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ
analyzed: kālena vadati iti kāla vādī vattabba yutta kālam sallakkhetvā vadati iti atthaḥ bhūtam

original: tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti bhūtavādī. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthasannissitameva
analyzed: tatham taccham sabhāvam eva vadati iti bhūta vādī diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika attha sannissitam eva

original: katvā vadatīti atthavādī. Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī.
analyzed: katvā vadati iti attha vādī nava lokuttara dhamma sannissitam katvā vadati iti dhamma vādī

original: Saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti vinayavādī. Nidhānaṃ vuccati
analyzed: saṃvara vinaya pahāna vinaya sannissitam katvā vadati iti vinaya vādī nidhānam vuccati

original: ṭhapanokāso. Nidhānamassa atthīti nidhānavatī. Hadaye nidhātabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti
analyzed: ṭhapana ukāsaḥ nidhānam assa atthi iti nidhānavatī hadaye nidhātabba yuttakam vācam bhāsitā ati

original: attho. Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na
analyzed: attho kālena ati evarūpim bhāsamānaḥ api ca aham nidhānavatim vācam bhāsissāmi iti na

original: akālena bhāsati. Yuttakālaṃ pana sallakkhetvāva bhāsatīti attho. Sāpadesanti saupamaṃ,
analyzed: akālena bhāsati yutta kālam pana sallakkhetvā ava bhāsati iti attho sa apadesa nti saupamam

original: sakāraṇanti attho. Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā. Yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
analyzed: sa kāraṇam ti paricchedam dassetvā yathā assā paricchedaḥ paññāyati

original: evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
analyzed: evam bhāsati iti atthaḥ attha saṃhitanti anekehi pi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātum a sakkuṇeyya tāya

original: atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā
analyzed: attha sampannam bhāsati yam vā saḥ attha vādī attham vadati tena atthena saṃhita ttā

original: atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. Na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: attha saṃhitam vācam bhāsati na aññam nikkhipitvā aññam bhāsati iti vuttam hoti

original: 179. Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ, khandhabījaṃ, phaḷubījaṃ, aggabījaṃ
analyzed: bīja gāma bhūta gāma samārambhā ati mūla bījam khandha bījam phaḷu bījam agga bījam

original: bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa
analyzed: bīja bījanti pañcavidhassa bīja gāmassa ca iva yassa kassaci nīla tiṇa rukkha ādikassa bhūta gāmassa

original: ca samārambhā. Chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho. Ekabhattikoti
analyzed: ca samārambhā chedana bhedana pacana ādi bhāvena vikopanā paṭivirato ti attho ekabhattiko ti

original: pātarāsabhattaṃ, sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. Tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena
analyzed: pāta rāsa bhattam sāya māsa bhattanti dve bhattāni tesu pāta rāsa bhattam antomajjhanhikena

original: paricchinnaṃ. Itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ
analyzed: paricchinnam itaram majjhanhikataḥ uddham antoaruṇena tasmai antomajjhanhike dasa khattum

original: bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ekabhattikoti. Rattiyā bhojanaṃ
analyzed: bhuñjamānaḥ api ekabhattikaḥ va hoti tam sandhāya vuttam ekabhattikaḥ ti rattiyā bhojanam

original: ratti, tato uparatoti rattūparato. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyasatthaṅgamanā
analyzed: tatas uparato ti rattu uparato atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriya satthaṅgamanā

original: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā virato vikālabhojanā. Sāsanassa ananulomattā
analyzed: bhojanam vikālabhojanam nāma tatas virata ttā virataḥ vikāla bhojanā sāsanassa ananuloma ttā

original: visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā
analyzed: visūkam paṭāṇībhūtam visūka dassanam attanā

original: ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccanāpanādivasenapi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā
analyzed: ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamasaḥ mayūra nacca nāpana ādi vasena api nacca ādīnam visūka bhūtā

original: dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi
analyzed: dassanā ca ati nacca gīta vādita visūka dassanā nacca ādīni hi attanā payojetum vā parehi

original: payojāpetuṃ vā yuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti. Mālādīsu
analyzed: vā yuttāni passitum vā na iva bhikkhūnam na bhikkhunīnam vaṭṭanti mālā ādīsu

original: – mālāti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: mālā ati yaṃ kiñci puppham gandhanti yaṃ kiñci gandha jātam vilepananti chavi rāga karaṇam

original: Tattha piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma. Ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti nāma. Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena
analyzed: tattha piḷandhantaḥ dhārā iti nāma ūna ṭṭhānam pūrentaḥ maṇḍā iti nāma gandha vasena chavi rāga vasena

original: ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ. Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya
analyzed: ca vibhūsā iti nāma ṭhānam vuccati kāraṇam tasmai yāya dussīlya cetanāya

original: tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratoti attho. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati
analyzed: tāni mālā dhāraṇa ādīni mahājanaḥ karoti tatas paṭivirataḥ ti attho uccāsayanam vuccati

original: pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyasanthataṃ, tato paṭiviratoti attho. Jātarūpanti
analyzed: pamāṇa atikkantam mahā sayanam akappiya santhatam tatas paṭivirataḥ ti attho jātarūpanti

original: suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo, lohamāsako, jatumāsako, dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: suvaṇṇam kahāpaṇaḥ loha māsakaḥ jatu māsakaḥ dāru māsakaḥ iti ye vohāram gacchanti

original: Tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva naṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti, na
analyzed: tassa ubhayassa api paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ na iva nam uggaṇhāti na uggaṇhāpeti na

original: upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatīti attho.
analyzed: upanikkhittam sādiyati iti attho

original: Āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇāti sālivīhiyavagodhumakaṅguvarakakudrūsakasaṅkhātassa sattavidhassāpi
analyzed: āmaka dhañña paṭiggahaṇā ti sāli vīhi yava godhuma kaṅgu varaka kudrūsaka saṅkhātassa sattavidhassa api

original: āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: āmaka dhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā na kevalam ca etesam paṭiggahaṇam eva āmasanam pi bhikkhūnam

original: na vaṭṭatiyeva. Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamacchamaṃsānaṃ
analyzed: na vaṭṭatiyā iva āmaka maṃsa paṭiggahaṇā ti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmaka maccha maṃsānaṃ

original: paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ. Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇam eva bhikkhūnam na vaṭṭati no āmasanam itthi kumārika paṭiggahaṇā ti ettha

original: itthīti purisantaragatā. Itarā kumārikā nāma. Tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva.
analyzed: itthī iti purisa antara gatā itarā kumārikā nāma tāsam paṭiggahaṇam pi āmasanam pi a kappiyam eva

original: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. ‘Kappiyakārakaṃ
analyzed: dāsi dāsa paṭiggahaṇā ti ettha dāsi dāsa vasena iva tesam paṭiggahaṇam na vaṭṭati kappiya kārakam

original: dammi’, ‘ārāmikaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati. Ajeḷakādīsupi khettavatthupariyosānesu
analyzed: dammi ārāmikam dammi iti evam vutte pana vaṭṭati ajeḷaka ādīsu pi khetta vatthu pariyosānesu

original: kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo. Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: kappiya akappiya nayaḥ vinaya vasena upaparikkhitabbaḥ tattha khettam nāma yasmim pubbaṇṇam

original: ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati taṃ khettaṃ.
analyzed: ruhati vatthu nāma yasmin aparaṇṇam ruhati yattha vā ubhayam pi ruhati tam khettam

original: Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpitaḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva.
analyzed: tad atthāya akata bhūmi bhāgaḥ vatthu khetta vatthu sīsena ca ittha vāpi taḷāka ādīni pi saṅgahitān eva

original: Dūteyyaṃ vuccati dūtakammaṃ. Gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha
analyzed: dūteyyam vuccati dūta kammam gihīnam pahitam paṇṇam vā sāsanam vā gahetvā tattha

original: tattha gamanaṃ. Pahīṇagamanaṃ vuccati paragharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. Anuyogo
analyzed: tattha gamanam pahīṇa gamanam vuccati para gharam pesitassa khuddaka gamanam anuyogo

original: nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ. Tasmā dūteyyapahīṇagamanānaṃ anugoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: nāma tad ubhaya karaṇam tasmā evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Kayavikkayāti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Tulākūṭādīsu – kūṭanti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ
analyzed: kaya vikkayā ati kayā ca vikkayā ca tulā kūṭa ādīsu kūṭanti vañcanam tattha tulā kūṭam

original: nāma rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha
analyzed: nāma rūpa kūṭam aṅga kūṭam gahaṇa kūṭam paṭicchanna kūṭanti catubbidham hoti tattha

original: rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya
analyzed: rūpakūṭam nāma dve tulā sama rūpā katvā gaṇhantaḥ mahatiyā gaṇhāti dadantaḥ khuddikāya

original: deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge.
analyzed: deti aṅgakūṭam nāma gaṇhantaḥ pacchābhāge hatthena tulam akkamati dadantaḥ pubbabhāge

original: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma
analyzed: gahaṇakūṭam nāma gaṇhantaḥ mūle rajjum gaṇhāti dadantaḥ agge paṭicchannakūṭam nāma

original: tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
analyzed: tulam su siram katvā antar aya cuṇṇam pakkhipitvā gaṇhantaḥ tam pacchābhāge karoti dadantaḥ aggabhāge

original: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti. Tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ vuccati suvaṇṇa pāti tāya vañcanam kaṃsakūṭam katham ekam suvaṇṇa pātim katvā

original: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ
analyzed: aññāḥ dve tissaḥ loha pātiyaḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā karonti tatas janapadam gantvā kiñcid eva aḍḍha kulam

original: pavisitvā suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā’ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā
analyzed: pavisitvā suvaṇṇa bhājanāni kiṇatha iti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataram dātu kāmā

original: honti. Tato tehi ‘kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo’ti vutte ‘vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā’ti
analyzed: honti tatas tehi katham imesam suvaṇṇa bhāvaḥ jānitabbo ti vutte vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhatha ati

original: suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
analyzed: suvaṇṇa pātim pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabba pātiyaḥ datvā gacchanti

original: Mānakūṭaṃ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
analyzed: mānakūṭam nāma hadaya bheda sikhā bheda rajju bheda vasena tividham hoti tattha hadaya bhedaḥ

original: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena ‘saṇikaṃ
analyzed: sappi tela ādi minana kāle labbhati tāni hi gaṇhantaḥ heṭṭhā chiddena mānena saṇikam

original: āsiñcā’ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti. Dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya
analyzed: āsiñcāti vatvā antobhājane bahum pagghara apetvā gaṇhāti dadantaḥ chiddam pidhāya

original: sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto
analyzed: sīgham pūretvā deti sikhā bhedaḥ tila taṇḍula ādi minana kāle labbhati tāni hi gaṇhantaḥ

original: saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti. Dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. Rajjubhedo
analyzed: saṇikam sikham ussāpetvā gaṇhāti dadantaḥ vegena pūretvā sikham chindantaḥ deti rajju bhedaḥ

original: khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
analyzed: khetta vatthu minana kāle labbhati lañjam a labhantā hi khettam amahantam pi mahantam katvā minanti

original: Ukkoṭanādīsu – ukkoṭananti assāmike sāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. Vañcananti tehi tehi
analyzed: ukkoṭana ādīsu ukkoṭananti assāmike sāmike kātum lañjaggahaṇam tehi tehi

original: upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
analyzed: upāyehi paresam vañcanam tatra idam ekam vatthu ekaḥ kira luddakaḥ migañca miga potakañca

original: gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto – “kiṃ bho migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako”ti āha.
analyzed: gahetvā āgacchati tam ekaḥ dhuttaḥ kim bho migaḥ agghati kim miga potakaḥ iti āha

original: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: migaḥ dve kahāpaṇe miga potakaḥ ekam ti ca vutte kahāpaṇam da tvā miga potakam gahetvā

original: thokaṃ gantvā nivatto, “na me bho migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena
analyzed: thokam gantvā nivattaḥ na me bho miga potakena atthaḥ migam me dehi iti āha tena

original: hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti?
analyzed: hi dve kahāpaṇe dehi iti saḥ āha nanu te bho mayā paṭhamam ekaḥ kahāpaṇaḥ dinnaḥ iti

original: “Āma dinno”ti. Idampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghaṇako
analyzed: āma dinno ti idam pi miga potakam gaṇha evam saḥ ca kahāpaṇaḥ ayam ca kahāpaṇa gghaṇakaḥ

original: migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ
analyzed: miga potako ti dve kahāpaṇāḥ bhavissanti iti so kāraṇam vadati iti sallakkhetvā miga potakam

original: gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
analyzed: gahetvā migam adāsi iti

original: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ maṇīti, asuvaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: nikatī iti yoga vasena vā māyā vasena vā apāmaṅgam amaṇim maṇī iti asuvaṇṇam

original: suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo. Etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ
analyzed: katvā pati rūpakena vañcanam kuṭila yogaḥ kuṭila yogaḥ

original: nāmaṃ. Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

6. Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā
202. Chakke – tatrāti tesu chasu puggalesu. Sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabboti so puggalo tena anācariyakena attanā uppāditena sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: chakke tatra ati tesu chasu puggalesu sammāsambuddhaḥ tena daṭṭhabbo ti so puggalo tena anācariyakena attanā uppāditena sabbaññu taññāṇena sabbaññu buddhaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Paccekasambuddho tenātiādīsupi tena paccekasambodhiñāṇena so puggalo paccekasambuddho.

original: Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā.

original: 7. Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā

original: “sa sattakkhattuparamaṃ sandhāvitvāna puggalo”tiādīni suttāni nissāya puggalo sandhāvatīti

original: laddhiṃ gahetvā voharati, tasmāssa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sandhāvatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
analyzed: laddhim gahetvā voharati tasmā assa tam laddhim bhinditum sandhāvati iti pucchā saka vādissa

original: Tattha sandhāvatīti saṃsarati gamanāgamanaṃ karoti. Attano laddhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
analyzed: tattha sandhāvati iti saṃsarati gamana āgamanam karoti attanaḥ laddhi vasena paṭiññā paravādissa

original: So puggalotiādayo anuyogopi sakavādissa, paṭikkhepo itarassa. Tattha soti soyevāti
analyzed: so puggalaḥ ti ādayaḥ anuyogaḥ api sakavādissa paṭikkhepaḥ itarassa tattha saḥ ti saḥ yeva ati

original: attho. Evaṃ pana anuyutto sassatadiṭṭhibhayena paṭikkhipati. Aññoti puṭṭho ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena.
analyzed: attho evam pana anuyuttaḥ sassata diṭṭhi bhayena paṭikkhipati aññaḥ iti puṭṭhaḥ uccheda diṭṭhi bhayena

original: So ca añño cāti puṭṭho ekaccasassatadiṭṭhibhayena. Neva so na aññoti puṭṭho amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhibhayena.
analyzed: so ca añño ca ati puṭṭhaḥ ekacca sassata diṭṭhi bhayena na iva so na aññaḥ ti puṭṭhaḥ amara āvikkhepa diṭṭhi bhayena

original: Puna cattāropi pañhe ekato puṭṭho catunnampi diṭṭhīnaṃ bhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna
analyzed: puna cattāraḥ api pañhe ekatas puṭṭhaḥ catunnam pi diṭṭhīnam bhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna

original: yānissa suttāni nissāya laddhi uppannā tāni dassento tena hi puggalo sandhāvatītiādimāha.
analyzed: yāni issa suttāni nissāya laddhi uppannā tāni dassentaḥ tena hi puggalaḥ sandhāvati iti ādim āha

original: 76. Puna sakavādinā “yvāyaṃ tava laddhiyā sandhāvati, kiṃ so asmiñca parasmiñca loke
analyzed: punar saka vādinā yvā ayam tava sandhāvati kim saḥ asmin ca parasmin ca loke

original: ekoyevā”ti adhippāyena svevāti niyametvā puṭṭho sassatabhayā paṭikkhipitvā puna daḷhaṃ
analyzed: eko yā iva ati adhippāyena su eva ati niyametvā puṭṭhaḥ paṭikkhipitvā puna daḷham

original: katvā tatheva puṭṭho yasmā so puggalova na añño bhāvo, “so tato cuto idhūpapanno”tiādisuttampi
analyzed: katvā tathā iva puṭṭhaḥ yasmā so puggalaḥ iva na aññaḥ bhāvaḥ so tatas cutaḥ idhu upapannaḥ ti ādi suttam pi

original: atthi, tasmā paṭijānāti. Sveva manussoti puṭṭho manussasseva devattābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: atthi tasmai paṭijānāti su eva manusso ti puṭṭhaḥ manussassa iva deva ttā bhāvataḥ paṭikkhipati

original: 77. Puna puṭṭho “ahaṃ tena samayena sunetto nāma satthā ahosi”ntiādisuttavasena paṭijānāti.
analyzed: puna puṭṭhaḥ aham tena samayena sunettaḥ nāma satthā ahosin ti ādi sutta vasena paṭijānāti

original: Athassa sakavādī devamanussupapattīnaṃ nānattato vacanaṃ micchāti pakāsento manusso hutvātiādimāha.
analyzed: athassa saka vādī deva manussa upapattīnam nānattataḥ vacanam micchā ati pakāsentaḥ manussaḥ hutvā iti ādim āha

original: 78. Tattha hevaṃ maraṇaṃ na hehitīti evaṃ sante maraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti attho. Ito paraṃ yakkho petoti attabhāvanānattavasena anuyoganānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tattha ha ivam maraṇam na evam sante maraṇam na bhavissati iti attho itas param yakkho peto ti atta bhāva nānatta vasena anuyoga nānattam veditabbam

original: 82. Khattiyotiādīni jātivasena ceva aṅgavekallādivasena ca vuttāni.
analyzed: khattiya uti ādīni jāti vasena ca iva aṅga vekalla ādi vasena ca vuttāni

original: 87. Puna na vattabbanti paravādinā puṭṭho idhaṭṭhakassa upapattivasena paralokassa
analyzed: puna na vattabbanti paravādinā puṭṭhaḥ idhaṭṭhakassa upapatti vasena para lokassa

original: gamanābhāvato paṭiññā sakavādissa puna sotāpannassa bhavantarepi sotāpannabhāvāvijahanato
analyzed: gamana abhāvato paṭiññā sakavādissa puna sotāpannassa bhavantare pi sotāpanna bhāva avijahanato

original: dutiyapaṭiññāpi tasseva. Hañcītiādivacanaṃ paravādissa.
analyzed: dutiya paṭiññā api tassa iva hañci iti ādi vacanam paravādissa

original: 88. Puna devaloke upapannassa manussattābhāvadassanena anuyogo sakavādissa.
analyzed: puna deva loke upapannassa manussa ttā bhāva dassanena anuyogaḥ saka vādissa

original: 89. Tato paraṃ anañño avigatoti ettha anaññoti sabbākārena ekasadiso. Avigatoti ekenāpi ākārena avigatoti attho. Na hevanti devaloke upapannassa manussabhāvābhāvato evamāha.
analyzed: tatas param anaññaḥ avigatoti ettha anaññaḥ ati sabba ākārena eka sadisaḥ avigatoti ekena api ākārena avigatoti attho na deva loke upapannassa manussa bhāva abhāvataḥ evam āha

original: 90. Puna daḷhaṃ katvā anuyutto “sveva puggalo sandhāvatī”ti laddhiyā anujānāti. Hatthacchinnotiādi
analyzed: puna daḷham katvā anuyuttaḥ svā iva puggalo sandhāvati iti laddhiyā anujānāti hattha chinna utiādi

original: ākāravigamanadassanena avigato sandhāvatīti laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha aḷacchinnoti
analyzed: ākāra vigamana dassanena avigataḥ sandhāvati iti laddhi bhindana attham vuttam tattha aḷacchinnaḥ ti

original: yassa aṅguṭṭhakā chinnā. Kaṇḍaracchinnoti yassa mahānhārū chinnā.
analyzed: yassa aṅguṭṭhakā chinnā yassa mahānhārū chinnā

original: 91. Sarūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe iminā rūpakāyena saddhiṃ agamanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: sarūpa uti ādīsu paṭhame pañhe iminā rūpa kāyena saddhim agamanam sandhāya paṭikkhipati

original: Dutiye antarābhavapuggalaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. So hi tassa laddhiyā sarūpova gantvā
analyzed: dutiye antarābhava puggalam sandhāya paṭijānāti saḥ hi tassa laddhiyā sarūpaḥ uva gantvā

original: mātukucchiṃ pavisati. Athassa taṃ rūpaṃ bhijjati. Taṃ jīvanti yena rūpasaṅkhātena
analyzed: mātukucchim pavisati atha assa tam rūpam bhijjati tam jīvanti yena rūpa saṅkhātena

original: sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati, kimassa tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati. Paravādī
analyzed: sarīrena saddhim gacchati kim assa tat eva jīvam tam sarīram ti pucchati paravādī

original: idha sarīranikkhepā suttavirodhā ca paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: idha sarīra nikkhepā sutta virodhā ca paṭikkhipati

original: Savedanotiādīsu asaññūpapattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, tadaññaṃ upapattiṃ sandhāya
analyzed: sa vedanā ti ādīsu asaññu upapattim sandhāya paṭikkhipati tad aññam upapattim sandhāya

original: paṭijānāti. Taṃ jīvanti yena vedanādisaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati. Kimassa
analyzed: paṭijānāti tam jīvanti yena vedanā ādi saṅkhātena sarīrena saddhim gacchati kim assa

original: tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati. Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti
analyzed: tat eva jīvam tam sarīran ti pucchati tam jīvam tam sarīran aññam jīvam aññam sarīran ti

original: etissā hi laddhiyā pañcapi khandhā sarīranti adhippetā. Paravādī suttavirodhā paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: etissā hi laddhiyā pañca api khandhā sarīranti adhippetā paravādī sutta virodhā paṭikkhipati

original: 92. Arūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe antarābhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiye arūpā rūpaṃ
analyzed: arūpā uti ādīsu paṭhame pañhe antarābhavam sandhāya paṭikkhipati dutiye arūpā rūpam

original: upapajjamānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Aññaṃ, jīvanti yaṃ rūpasaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya
analyzed: upapajjamānam sandhāya paṭijānāti aññam jīvanti yam rūpa saṅkhātam sarīram pahāya

original: arūpo sandhāvati, kiṃ te taṃ sarīraṃ aññaṃ, aññaṃ jīvanti pucchati. Itaro suttavirodhā paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: arūpo sandhāvati kim te tam sarīram aññam aññam jīvanti pucchati itaro sutta virodhā paṭikkhipati

original: Avedanotiādīsu saññībhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, tadaññaṃ upapattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
analyzed: avedanā ti ādīsu saññībhavam sandhāya paṭikkhipati tad aññam upapattim sandhāya paṭijānāti

original: Aññaṃ jīvanti yaṃ vedanādisaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya avedano aviññāṇo sandhāvati, kiṃ
analyzed: aññam jīvanti yam vedanā ādi saṅkhātam sarīram pahāya avedanaḥ aviññāṇo sandhāvati kim

original: te taṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ, aññaṃ jīvanti pucchati. Itaro suttavirodhā paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: te tam aññam sarīram aññam jīvanti pucchati itaro sutta virodhā paṭikkhipati

original: 93. Rūpaṃ sandhāvatītiādīsu ye rūpādayo khandhe upādāya puggalaṃ paññapeti, kiṃ te
analyzed: rūpam sandhāvati itiādīsu ye rūpa ādayaḥ khandhe upādāya puggalam paññapeti kim te

original: tasmiṃ puggale sandhāvante tampi rūpaṃ sandhāvatīti pucchati. Paravādī “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: tasmin puggale sandhāvante rūpam sandhāvati iti pucchati

original: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti sattasseva sandhāvanavacanato
analyzed: sattānam taṇhā saṃyojanānam sandhāvatam saṃsaratanti sattassa iva sandhāvana vacanataḥ

original: paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā rūpādidhamme vinā puggalo natthi, tasmā tasmiṃ sandhāvante
analyzed: paṭikkhipati puna puṭṭhaḥ yasmā rūpa ādi dhamme vinā puggalo na atthi tasmā tasmim sandhāvante

original: tenapi rūpena sandhāvitabbanti saññāya paṭijānāti. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tena api rūpena sandhāvitabbanti saññāya paṭijānāti vedanā ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: 94. Rūpaṃ na sandhāvatītiādīsu yasmā te rūpaṃ puggalo na hoti, sveva ca sandhāvatīti
analyzed: rūpam na sandhāvati itiādīsu yasmā te rūpam puggalaḥ na hoti su eva ca sandhāvati iti

original: vadesi, tasmā taṃ pucchāmi, kiṃ te rūpaṃ na sandhāvatīti attho. Itaro puggale sandhāvante
analyzed: vadesi tasmā tam pucchāmi kim te rūpam na sandhāvati iti attho itaro puggale sandhāvante

original: na sakkā tassa upādānabhūtena rūpena sandhāvitunti saññāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho
analyzed: na sakkā tassa upādāna bhūtena rūpena sandhāvitunti saññāya paṭikkhipati puna puṭṭhaḥ

original: sattānaññeva sandhāvanavacanato paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
analyzed: sattānaññā iva sandhāvana vacanataḥ paṭijānāti sesam ettha uttānam eva

original: Gāthānaṃ pana ayamattho – āyasmato matena rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyā viya, indhanaṃ upādāya
analyzed: gāthānam pana ayam atthaḥ āyasmataḥ matena rukkham upādāya chāyā viya indhanam upādāya

original: aggi viya ca, khandhe upādāya puggalo; rūpādīnaṃ sandhāvane asati tesu khandhesu
analyzed: ca khandhe upādāya puggalaḥ rūpa ādīnam sandhāvane asati tesu khandhesu

original: bhijjamānesu so tava puggalo bhijjati ce, evaṃ sante ucchedā bhavati diṭṭhi, ucchedadiṭṭhi
analyzed: bhijjamānesu saḥ tava puggalo bhijjati ce evam sante ucchedā bhavati diṭṭhi uccheda diṭṭhi

original: te āpajjati. Katarā yā buddhena vivajjitā akusaladiṭṭhi. Yā pana “ucchedavādī samaṇo
analyzed: te āpajjati katarā yā buddhena vivajjitā akusala diṭṭhi yā pana uccheda vādī samaṇaḥ

original: gotamo”ti pariyāyabhāsitā, na taṃ vadāmāti dasseti. Athāpi tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu
analyzed: gotamaḥ ti pariyāya bhāsitā na tam vadāma ati dasseti atha api tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu

original: so puggalo na bhijjati, evaṃ sante sassato puggalo hoti. Tato so nibbānena samasamo
analyzed: saḥ puggalaḥ na bhijjati evam sante sassataḥ puggalo hoti tatas so nibbānena samasamaḥ

original: āpajjati. Samasamoti ativiya samo, samena vā samo, samabhāveneva samo. Yatheva nibbānaṃ
analyzed: āpajjati sama samaḥ ti ativiya samaḥ samena vā samaḥ sama bhāvena iva samaḥ yathā iva nibbānam

original: nuppajjati na bhijjati, evaṃ te puggalopi tena samasamoti.
analyzed: nuppajjati na bhijjati evam te puggalaḥ api tena samasamaḥ ti

original: Gatiparivattanamukhena cutipaṭisandhānuyogo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: gati parivattana mukhena cuti paṭisandhā anuyogaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ

original: Anuyogavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: anuyoga vaṇṇanā

original: 12. Upādāpaññattānuyogavaṇṇanā
analyzed: upādā paññatta anuyoga vaṇṇanā

original: 95. Idāni upādāpaññattānuyogo hoti. Tattha pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññāpaṭikkhepo
analyzed: idāni upādā paññatta anuyogaḥ hoti tattha pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā paṭikkhepo

original: paravādissa. So hi rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyāya viya, indhanaṃ upādāya aggissa viya ca,
analyzed: para vādissa saḥ hi rukkham upādāya chāyāya viya indhanam upādāya aggissa viya ca

original: rūpādīni upādāya puggalassa paññattiṃ paññāpanaṃ avabodhanaṃ icchati, tasmā “rūpaṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādīni upādāya puggalassa paññattim paññāpanam avabodhanam icchati tasmā rūpam

original: upādāyā”ti puṭṭho paṭijānāti. Puna yathā rukkhupādānā chāyā rukkho viya, indhanupādāno

original: ca aggi indhanaṃ viya aniccādidhammo, evaṃ te rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādayo viya
analyzed: ca aggi indhanam viya anicca ādi dhammo evam te rūpa ādi upādānaḥ puggalaḥ rūpa ādayaḥ viya

original: aniccoti imamatthaṃ puṭṭho attano laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: aniccaḥ ti imam attham puṭṭhaḥ attanaḥ laddhiyam ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati

original: 97. Nīlaṃ rūpaṃ upādāya nīlotiādīsu nīlarūpena saddhiṃ puggalassa ekattaṃ, ekasarīre nīlādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: nīlam rūpam upādāya nīla oti ādīsu nīla rūpena saddhim puggalassa ekattam eka sarīre nīla ādīnam bahūnam vasena bahu bhāvam ca an icchantaḥ paṭikkhipati

original: 98. Kusalaṃ vedananti etthāpi vedanāya saddhiṃ ekattaṃ ekasantāne bahūnaṃ kusalavedanānaṃ
analyzed: kusalam vedananti ettha api vedanāya saddhim ekattam eka santāne bahūnam kusala vedanānam

original: vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati. Dutiyanaye maggakusalotiādivacanasabbhāvato
analyzed: vasena bahu bhāvañca an icchantaḥ paṭikkhipati dutiya naye magga kusalaḥ ti ādi vacana sabbhāvato

original: chekaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Saphalotiādīni puṭṭho tathārūpassa vohārassa abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: chekaṭṭham sandhāya paṭijānāti saphalaḥ ti ādīni puṭṭhaḥ tathārūpassa vohārassa abhāvataḥ paṭikkhipati

original: 99. Akusalapakkhe achekaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
analyzed: akusala pakkhe achekaṭṭham sandhāya paṭijānāti

original: 100. Abyākatapakkhe sassatādivasena abyākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: abyākata pakkhe sassata ādi vasena abyākata bhāvam sandhāya paṭijānāti sesam ettha heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 104. Cakkhuṃ upādāyātiādīsu “cakkhumā visamānīva…pe… pāpāni parivajjaye”ti ādivohārasabbhāvato paṭijānāti. Cakkhumattādinirodhena puggalanirodhaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: cakkhum upādāya ati ādīsu cakkhumā pāpāni parivajjaya iti ādi vohāra sabbhāvataḥ paṭijānāti cakkhumat tā ādi nirodhena puggala nirodham an icchantaḥ paṭikkhipati

original: 107. Rūpaṃ upādāya vedanaṃ upādāyāti ettha aññepi rūpamūlakā dukatikacatukkā veditabbā.
analyzed: rūpam upādāya vedanam upādāya ati ettha aññe pi rūpa mūlakā dukatika catukkā veditabbā

original: Yasmā pana khandhe upādāya puggalassa paññatti, tasmā dvepi tayopi cattāropi pañcapi
analyzed: yasmā pana khandhe upādāya puggalassa paññatti tasmā dve pi tayo pi cattāro pi pañca api

original: upādāya paññattiṃ paṭijānāti. Ekasantāne pana dvinnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: upādāya paññattim paṭijānāti eka santāne pana dvinnam pañcannam vā abhāvā paṭikkhipati

original: Āyatanādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: āyatana ādī supi e sa iva nayoḥ

original: 112. Idāni yaṃ upādāya yassa paññatti, yathā tassa aniccatāya tassāpi aniccatā, tato
analyzed: idāni yam upādāya yassa paññatti yathā tassa anicca tāya tassa api anicca tā tatas

original: ca aññattaṃ siddhaṃ, evaṃ tassa puggalassāpi āpajjatīti dassetuṃ yathā rukkhantiādimāha.
analyzed: ca aññattam siddham evam tassa puggalassa api āpajjati iti dassetum yathā rukkhanti ādim āha

original: Tattha upādāyāti paṭicca āgamma, na vinā tanti attho. Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto
analyzed: tattha upādāya ati paṭicca āgamma na vinā tanti attho paravādī pana tathā an icchanto

original: laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: laddhiyam ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati

original: 115. Nigaḷoti saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ. Negaḷikoti tena bandhako yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti yasmā yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavā hoti, tasmā yathā na nigaḷo …pe… añño rūpavāti attho.
analyzed: nigaḷaḥ ti saṅkhalika bandhanam negaḷiko ti tena bandhakaḥ yassa rūpam so rūpavā ati yasmai yassa rūpam so rūpavā hoti tasmai yathā na nigaḷaḥ pe aññaḥ rūpavā ti attho

original: 116. Citte cittetiādīsu sarāgādicittavasena sarāgāditaṃ sandhāya cittānupassanāvasena
analyzed: citte citta iti ādīsu sa rāga ādi citta vasena sa rāga āditam sandhāya citta anupassanā vasena

original: paṭijānāti. Jāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho puggalassa khaṇikabhāvaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: paṭijānāti jāyati iti ādinā nayena puṭṭho puggalassa khaṇika bhāvam an icchantaḥ paṭikkhipati

original: “So”ti vā “añño”ti vā puṭṭho sassatucchedabhayena paṭikkhipati. Puna na vattabbaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ti vā aññaḥ ti vā puṭṭhaḥ sassatu cheda bhayena paṭikkhipati puna na vattabbam

original: “kumārako”ti vā “kumārikā”ti vā puṭṭho lokavohārasamucchedabhayena vattabbanti paṭijānāti.
analyzed: kumārakā iti vā kumārikā ati vā puṭṭhaḥ loka vohāra samuccheda bhayena vattabbanti paṭijānāti

original: Sesamettha pākaṭameva.
analyzed: sesam ettha pākaṭam eva

original: 118. Idāni paravādī aññenākārena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo na vattabbaṃ puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni paravādī aññena ākārena laddhim patiṭṭhāpetu kāmo na vattabbam puggalaḥ upalabbhati iti ādim āha

original: Tattha na vattabbanti kiṃ te iminā evaṃ bahunā upādāpaññattānuyogena, idaṃ tāva vadehi,
analyzed: tattha na vattabbanti kim te iminā evam bahunā upādā paññatta anuyogena idam tāva vadehi

original: kiṃ na vattabbaṃ “puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti. Tato sakavādinā
analyzed: kim na vattabbam puggalaḥ upalabbhati saccikaṭṭha paramatthena ati tatas sakavādinā

original: āmantāti vutte nanu yo passatītiādimāha. Tattha yoti puggalo. Yanti rūpaṃ. Yenāti
analyzed: āmantā iti vutte nanu yaḥ passati iti ādim āha tattha yaḥ ti puggalaḥ yanti rūpam yena ati

original: cakkhunā. Soti puggalo. Tanti rūpaṃ. Tenāti cakkhunā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – nanu yo
analyzed: cakkhunā so ti puggalaḥ tanti rūpam tena ati cakkhunā idam vuttam hoti nanu yaḥ

original: yaṃ rūpaṃ yena cakkhunā passati, so taṃ rūpaṃ tena cakkhunā passanto puggaloti. Sakavādī
analyzed: yam rūpam yena cakkhunā passati so tam rūpam tena cakkhunā passanto puggalo ti sakavādī

original: kiñcāpi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ cakkhumeva rūpaṃ passati, tathā
analyzed: kiñcā api cakkhu viññāṇassa nissaya bhāvam gacchantam cakkhum eva rūpam passati tathā

original: sotameva saddaṃ suṇāti…pe… viññāṇameva dhammaṃ vijānāti, “atthi arahato cakkhu, passati
analyzed: sotam eva saddam suṇāti pe viññāṇam eva dhammam vijānāti atthi arahataḥ cakkhu passati

original: arahā cakkhunā rūpa”ntiādisammutivasena pana āmantāti paṭijānāti.
analyzed: arahā cakkhunā rūpa nti ādi sammuti vasena pana āmantā ti paṭijānāti

original: 120. Tato chalavādaṃ nissāya paravādinā puggalassa vattabbatāya sādhitāya tameva
analyzed: tatas chala vādam nissāya paravādinā puggalassa vattabba tāya sādhitāya tam eva

original: vādaṃ parivattetvā puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha. Tattha yo na passatīti andho asaññasatto
analyzed: vādam parivattetvā puggalaḥ upalabbhati iti ādim āha tattha yaḥ na passati iti andhaḥ asañña satto

original: arūpaṃ upapanno nirodhaṃ samāpanno, anandhopi ca aññatra dassanasamayā na passati
analyzed: arūpam upapannaḥ nirodham samāpannaḥ an andhaḥ api ca aññatra dassana samayā na passati

original: nāma. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva atthato veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nāma sesa vāresu pi esa iva nayo sesam pāḷi vasena iva atthataḥ veditabbam

original: 122. Suttasaṃsandanāyaṃ dibbassa cakkhuno rūpagocarattā rūpaṃ passatīti āha. Dutiyavāre
analyzed: sutta saṃsandanāyam dibbassa cakkhuno rūpa gocara ttā rūpam passati iti āha dutiya vāre

original: “satte passāmī”tivacanato puggalaṃ passatīti āha. Tatiyavāre “rūpaṃ disvā puggalaṃ
analyzed: satte passāmi iti vacanataḥ puggalam passati iti āha tatiya vāre rūpam disvā puggalam

original: vibhāvetī”ti laddhito ubho passatīti āha. Yasmā pana passitabbaṃ nāma diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ
analyzed: vibhāveti iti laddhitaḥ ubho passati iti āha yasmā pana passitabbam nāma diṭṭham sutam

original: mutaṃ viññātanti catubbidhe rūpasaṅgahe rūpāyatanameva saṅgahitaṃ, tasmā sakavādī
analyzed: mutam viññātanti catubbidhe rūpa saṅgahe rūpa āyatanam eva saṅgahitam sakavādī

original: “rūpaṃ puggalo, puggalo rūpaṃ, ubho rūpa”nti anuyogaṃ karoti. Tassattho pākaṭoyevāti.
analyzed: rūpam puggalaḥ puggalaḥ rūpam ubho anuyogam karoti tassa atthaḥ pākaṭaḥ yeva ati

original: Upādāpaññattānuyogavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: upādā paññatta anuyoga vaṇṇanā

original: 13. Purisakārānuyogavaṇṇanā
123. Idāni purisakārānuyogo hoti. Tattha kamme sati niyamato tassa kārakenapi bhavitabbanti
analyzed: idāni purisakāra anuyogaḥ hoti tattha kamme sati niyamataḥ tassa kārakena api bhavitabbanti

original: laddhiyā pucchā paravādissa, tathārūpānaṃ kammānaṃ atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
analyzed: laddhiyā pucchā paravādissa tathārūpānam kammānam atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa

original: Puna kattā kāretāti pucchā paravādissa. Tattha kattāti tesaṃ kammānaṃ kārako. Kāretāti
analyzed: puna kattā kāretā ati pucchā paravādissa tattha kattā ati tesam kammānam kārako kāretā ati

original: āṇattidesanādīhi upāyehi kārāpako. Idāni yasmā paravādī puggalaṃ sandhāya kattāti
analyzed: āṇatti desanā ādīhi upāyehi kārāpakaḥ idāni yasmai paravādī puggalam sandhāya kattā ati

original: pucchati, na karaṇamattaṃ, tasmā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
analyzed: pucchati na karaṇa mattam tasmā paṭikkhepaḥ sakavādissa

original: 124. Tassa kattā kāretāti ettha yadi yaṃ yaṃ upalabbhati, tassa tassa kattā puggalo
analyzed: tassa kattā kāreta ati ettha yadi yam yam upalabbhati tassa tassa kattā puggalaḥ

original: te upalabbhati, kiṃ tassāpi kārako ca kārāpako ca añño puggalo upalabbhatīti attho.
analyzed: te upalabbhati kim tassa api kārako ca kārāpako ca añño puggalo upalabbhati iti attho

original: Paravādī tathā anicchanto issaranimmānavādabhayena paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā
analyzed: paravādī tathā an icchantaḥ issara nimmāna vāda bhayena paṭikkhipati puna puṭṭhaḥ yasmā

original: puggalaṃ mātāpitaro janenti nāmaṃ karonti posenti, tasmāssa te kārakā. Ye ca pana
analyzed: puggalam mātā pitaraḥ janenti nāmam karonti posenti tasmā assa te kārakāḥ ye ca pana

original: taṃ kalyāṇamittā vā ācariyā vā tāni tāni vijjāṭṭhānasippāyatanāni sikkhāpenti, te
analyzed: tam kalyāṇa mittāḥ vā ācariyāḥ vā tāni tāni vijjāṭṭhāna sippa āyatanāni sikkhāpenti te

original: kārāpakā nāmāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Purimakammameva tassa kattā ceva
analyzed: kārāpakāḥ nāma ati imam attham sandhāya paṭijānāti purima kammam eva tassa kattā ca iva

original: kārāpetā cāti adhippetaṃ.
analyzed: ca ati adhippetam

original: 125. Tassa tassevāti iminā idaṃ pucchati – yadi kammānaṃ kārakassa kattā tassāpi
analyzed: tassa tassa iva ati iminā idam pucchati yadi kammānam kārakassa kattā tassa api

original: kattā tassāpi kattā attheva, evaṃ sante purimena purimena avassaṃ pacchā pacchā puggalo
analyzed: kattā tassa api kattā attha iva evam sante purimena purimena avassam pacchā pacchā puggalo

original: kātabboti imināpi te kammānaṃ kārakena puggalena āyatiṃ añño puggalo kātabbo, tenāpi
analyzed: kātabbaḥ ti iminā api te kammānam kārakena puggalena āyatim aññaḥ puggalo kātabbo tena api

original: aññoti natthi dukkhassa antakiriyā, natthi vaṭṭassa upacchedo, natthi appaccayaparinibbānaṃ.
analyzed: aññaḥ ti natthi dukkhassa anta kiriyā natthi vaṭṭassa upacchedaḥ natthi appaccaya parinibbānaṃ

original: Paccayābhāvena paccayapaṭibaddhassa dukkhassa abhāvā yaṃ nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ, natthi
analyzed: paccaya abhāvena paccaya paṭibaddhassa dukkhassa abhāvā yam nibbānam vuttam na atthi

original: te tanti. Atha vā tassa tassevāti yadi kammaṃ kammamattaṃ na hoti, tassa pana kārako
analyzed: te atha vā tassa tassa iva ati yadi kammam kamma mattam na hoti tassa pana kārako

original: puggalo, tassāpi kārako, tassāpi kārakoti evaṃ puggalaparamparā atthi. Evaṃ sante
analyzed: puggalo tassa api kārako tassa api kārako ti evam puggala paramparā atthi evam sante

original: yā esā kammavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā, sā natthīti attho.
analyzed: yā esā kamma vaṭṭassa appavatti karaṇena dukkhassa anta kiriyā vuttā sā natthi iti attho

original: Paravādī taṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati. Ito aparāsupi upalabbhati sāmaññena kārakapucchāsu
analyzed: paravādī tam an icchantaḥ paṭikkhipati itas aparāsu pi upalabbhati sāmaññena kāraka pucchāsu

original: puggalaṃyeva sandhāya “kattā kāretā”ti vuttaṃ, na paccaye. Na hi mahāpathavīādīnaṃ paccayā natthi.
analyzed: puggalaṃ yeva sandhāya kattā kāreta ati vuttam na paccaye na hi mahā pathavī ādīnam paccayāḥ natthi

original: 135. Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ kattāti pañho “saṅkhāravantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
analyzed: aññaḥ kalyāṇa pāpakānam kammānam kattā ati pañhaḥ saṅkhāravantam vā attānam anti ādi diṭṭhi bhayā paṭikkhitto

original: 136. Vipāko upalabbhatītiādi vipākapaṭisaṃvedīvasena puggalaṃ dassentassa laddhibhindanatthaṃ
analyzed: vipākaḥ upalabbhati itiādi vipāka paṭisaṃvedī vasena puggalam dassentassa laddhi bhindana attham

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha vipākapaṭisaṃvedīti anuyogo paravādissa, vipākapavattito aññassa vedakassa
analyzed: vuttam tattha vipāka paṭisaṃvedī iti anuyogaḥ paravādissa vipāka pavattitaḥ aññassa vedakassa

original: abhāvā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Puna pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
analyzed: abhāvā paṭikkhepaḥ sakavādissa puna pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa

original: 138. Tassa paṭisaṃvedīti tassa vipākapaṭisaṃvedakassa paṭisaṃvedī yasmā pana paṭisaṃveditabbo
analyzed: tassa paṭisaṃvedī iti tassa vipāka paṭisaṃvedakassa paṭisaṃvedī yasmai pana paṭisaṃveditabbaḥ

original: nāma vipāko, na ca puggalo vipāko, tasmā paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Puna puṭṭho yasmā
analyzed: nāma vipākaḥ na ca puggalo tasmā paṭikkhepaḥ paravādissa puna puṭṭhaḥ yasmā

original: puññavipāke ṭhitattā vipākapaṭisaṃvedī puttaṃ vā patiṃ vā mātā vā jāyā vā paricumbati
analyzed: puñña vipāke ṭhita ttā vipāka paṭisaṃvedī puttam vā patim vā mātā vā jāyā vā paricumbati

original: parisajjati, tasmā tathārūpaṃ paṭisaṃveditaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti paravādī.
analyzed: parisajjati tasmai tathārūpam paṭisaṃveditam sandhāya paṭijānāti paravādī

original: Tassa tassevāti yadi vipāko vipākamattaṃ na hoti, tassa pana paṭisaṃvedī puggalo,
analyzed: tassa tassa iva ati yadi vipākaḥ vipāka mattam na hoti tassa pana paṭisaṃvedī puggalo

original: tassāpi paṭisaṃvedī tassāpi paṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ puggalaparamparā atthi. Evaṃ sante
analyzed: tassa api paṭisaṃvedī tassa api paṭisaṃvedī iti evam puggala paramparā atthi evam sante

original: yā esā vipākavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā, sā natthīti attho.
analyzed: yā esā vipāka vaṭṭassa appavatti karaṇena dukkhassa anta kiriyā vuttā sā natthi iti attho

original: Ito paraṃ upalabbhatisāmaññena paṭisaṃvedīpucchāsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
analyzed: itas param upalabbhati sāmaññena paṭisaṃvedī pucchāsu heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 142. Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedīti pañho “vedanavantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
analyzed: aññaḥ kalyāṇa pāpakānam kammānam vipāka paṭisaṃvedī iti pañhaḥ vedanavantam vā attā ananti ādi diṭṭhi bhayā paṭikkhitto

original: 143. Dibbaṃ sukhantiādi kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ bhājetvā dassanavasena
analyzed: dibbam sukham tiādi kalyāṇa pāpakānam kammānam vipākam bhājetvā dassana vasena

original: āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sakavādino cettha puggalavaseneva
analyzed: āraddham tat sabbam heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam sakavādino ca ittha puggala vasena iva

original: paṭisaṃvedīpaṭikkhepo veditabbo, na vedayitavasena.
analyzed: paṭisaṃvedī paṭikkhepaḥ veditabbaḥ na vedayita vasena

original: 148. Mahāpathavīādīni hi ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedayitānaṃ uppatti appaṭisiddhā.
analyzed: mahā pathavī ādīni hi ārammaṇam katvā vedayitānam uppatti appaṭisiddhā

original: 170. Kattā kāretā vipākapaṭisaṃvedītiādi vomissakanayavasena āraddhaṃ. Tattha so
analyzed: kattā kāretā vipāka paṭisaṃvedī itiādi vomissaka naya vasena āraddham tattha so

original: karotīti yaṃ tvaṃ kattāti ca paṭisaṃvedīti ca vadesi, kiṃ soyeva karoti, so paṭisaṃvedeti.
analyzed: karoti iti yam tvam kattā ati ca paṭisaṃvedī iti ca vadesi kim saḥ yā iva karoti saḥ paṭisaṃveda iti

original: Ayamanuyogo sakavādissa, suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
analyzed: ayam anuyogaḥ sakavādissa sutta virodha bhayena paṭikkhepaḥ paravādissa

original: 171. Puna puṭṭho “idha nandati pecca nandatī”tiādisuttavasena paṭiññā tasseva. Athassa vacanokāsaṃ paṭibāhanto sakavādī sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti āha.
analyzed: puna puṭṭhaḥ idha nandati pecca nandati iti ādi sutta vasena paṭiññā tassa iva athassa vacana ukāsam paṭibāhanto saka vādī sayaṃkatam sukha dukkhanti āha

original: 172. Tattha añño karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ aññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ. Tato paravādī
analyzed: tattha aññaḥ karoti iti kāraka vedakānam aññatta pucchā vasena vuttam tatas paravādī

original: suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho “manussabhūto katvā devabhūto paṭisaṃvedetī”ti
analyzed: sutta virodha bhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭhaḥ manussa bhūtaḥ katvā deva bhūtaḥ paṭisaṃvedeti iti

original: maññamāno paṭijānāti. Evaṃvādino pana paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena
analyzed: maññamānaḥ paṭijānāti evaṃvādinaḥ pana paraṃkatam sukha dukkham āpajjati iti tassa vasena

original: puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: puṭṭhaḥ puna paṭikkhipati

original: 174. So ca añño cāti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ. Tato paravādī
analyzed: so ca añño ca ati kāraka vedakānam ekatta aññatta pucchā vasena vuttam tatas paravādī

original: suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho purime dvepi naye ekato katvā paṭijānāti.
analyzed: sutta virodha bhayena iva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭhaḥ purime dve pi naye ekatas katvā paṭijānāti

original: Evaṃvādino pana sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: evaṃvādinaḥ pana sayaṃkatam ca paraṃkatam ca sukha dukkham āpajjati iti tassa vasena puṭṭhaḥ puna paṭikkhipati

original: 176. Neva so karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ. Tato
analyzed: na iva so karoti iti kāraka vedakānam ekatta aññatta paṭikkhepa vasena vuttam tatas

original: paravādī suttavirodhavaseneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho yasmā manusso devalokūpapattiyā
analyzed: paravādī sutta virodha vasena iva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭhaḥ yasmā manussaḥ deva loka upapattiyā

original: kammaṃ katvā na manussabhūtova paṭisaṃvedeti, nāpi yena kammaṃ kataṃ, tato aññova
analyzed: kammam katvā na manussa bhūtaḥ uva paṭisaṃvedeti na api yena kammam katam tatas aññaḥ uva

original: paṭisaṃvedeti, tasmā kārakato vedako neva so hoti, na aññoti maññamāno paṭijānāti.
analyzed: paṭisaṃvedeti tasmā kārakataḥ vedakaḥ na iva saḥ hoti na aññaḥ iti maññamānaḥ paṭijānāti

original: Laddhimattamevetaṃ? Evaṃvādino pana asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṃkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ
analyzed: laddhimattam eva etam evaṃvādinaḥ pana asayaṃkāram aparaṃkāram adhicca samuppannam sukha dukkham

original: āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati. Apica imasmiṃ vomissakanaye ādito
analyzed: āpajjati iti tassa vasena puṭṭhaḥ puna paṭikkhipati apica imasmin vomissaka naye āditas

original: paṭṭhāya imināpi nayena attho veditabbo. Yasmā hi ayaṃ puggalavādī kammānaṃ kārakañceva
analyzed: paṭṭhāya iminā api nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ yasmā hi ayam puggala vādī kammānam kārakam ca iva

original: vedakañca icchati, tasmāssa yo kārako, teneva vā vedakena bhavitabbaṃ, aññena vā
analyzed: vedakam ca icchati tasmā assa yaḥ kārako tena iva vā vedakena bhavitabbam aññena vā

original: ubhohi vā bhavitabbaṃ, ubhohi vāpi na bhavitabbanti idamāpannaṃ hoti. Evamāpannameva
analyzed: ubhohi vā bhavitabbam ubhohi vā api na bhavitabbanti idam āpannam hoti evam āpannam eva

original: anuyogaṃ anuyuñjanto sakavādī “so karotī”tiādayo cattāropi vikappe āha. Sesaṃ vuttappakārameva.
analyzed: anuyogam anuyuñjanto saka vādī so karoti iti ādayo cattāraḥ api vikappe āha sesam vutta ppakāram eva

original: Pariyosāne pana cattāropi pañhā ekato puṭṭhā. Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭijānanā ca
analyzed: pariyosāne pana cattāro api pañhāḥ ekatas puṭṭhāḥ tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭijānanā ca

original: sayaṃkatādidosappatti ca purimanayeneva veditabbā. Ito paraṃ “kalyāṇapāpakānī”ti

analyzed: dhammarājassa saddhamma rasam eva adhigacchatu uti

original: Yamakappakaraṇa-aṭṭhakathā

original: Saṅkhepeneva devānaṃ, devadevo surālaye;

original: Yamakaṃ ayamāvatta-nīlāmalatanūruho;

original: 1. Mūlayamakaṃ
Uddesavāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: uddesa vāra vaṇṇanā

analyzed: vasena idam pakaraṇam dasavidhena vibhattam tesam ca iva imassa ca pakaraṇassa nāmattho

analyzed: pakaraṇam yamakan ti veditabbam

original: kusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalāti idaṃ yamakaṃ ādi. Tassa kusalākusalamūlasaṅkhātānaṃ

original: dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena atthayamakanti vā, tesaññeva atthānaṃ vasena anulomapaṭilomato
analyzed: dvinnam atthānam vasena atthayamakanti vā tesaṃ eva atthānam vasena anuloma paṭilomato

original: pavattapāḷidhammavasena dhammayamakanti vā, anulomapaṭilomato pavattapucchāvasena

original: pucchāyamakanti vā tidhā yamakabhāvo veditabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: pucchāyamakanti vā tidhā yamaka bhāvaḥ veditabbo sesesu pi esā iva nayo

original: Idāni imesaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena desite imasmiṃ mūlayamake uddesavārassa tāva nayayamakapucchāatthavārappabhedavasena
analyzed: idāni imesam yamakānam vasena desite imasmin mūlayamake uddesa vārassa tāva naya yamaka pucchā attha vāra ppabheda vasena

original: pāḷivavatthānameva evaṃ veditabbaṃ – kusalattikamātikāya hi ‘kusalā dhammā’ti idaṃ
analyzed: pāḷi vavatthānam eva evam veditabbam kusala ttika mātikāya hi kusalāḥ dhammāḥ ti idam

original: ādipadaṃ nissāya mūlanayo, mūlamūlanayo, mūlakanayo, mūlamūlakanayoti ime cattāro
analyzed: ādi padam nissāya mūla nayaḥ mūlamūlanayaḥ mūlakanayaḥ mūlakanayaḥ iti ime cattāro

original: nayā honti. Tesaṃ ekekasmiṃ naye mūlayamakaṃ, ekamūlayamakaṃ, aññamaññamūlayamakanti

analyzed: tīṇi tīṇi yamakāni evam catūsu nayesu dvādasa yamakāni eka ekasmin yamake anuloma paṭiloma vasena

original: dve dve pucchāti catuvīsati pucchā, ekekāya pucchāya sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayavasena dve
analyzed: dve dve pucchā ati catuvīsati pucchāḥ ekekāya pucchāya sanniṭṭhāna saṃsaya vasena dve

original: dve atthāti aṭṭhacattālīsa atthāti.
analyzed: dve atthā ati aṭṭhacattālīsa atthā ati

original: Tattha ye keci kusalā dhammāti kusalesu “kusalā nu kho, na kusalā nu kho”ti sandehābhāvato
analyzed: tattha ye keci kusalā dhammā ati kusalesu kusalāḥ nu kho na kusalāḥ nu kho iti sandeha abhāvato

original: imasmiṃ pade sanniṭṭhānattho veditabbo. Sabbe te kusalamūlāti “sabbe te kusalā dhammā
analyzed: imasmin pade sanniṭṭhāna tthaḥ veditabbaḥ sabbe te kusala mūlā ati sabbe te kusalāḥ dhammāḥ

original: kusalamūlā nu kho, nanu kho”ti evaṃ vimativasena pucchitattā imasmiṃ pade saṃsayattho
analyzed: kusala mūlāḥ nu kho nanu kho ti evam vimati vasena pucchita ttā imasmin pade saṃsaya attho

analyzed: veditabbaḥ saḥ ca kho veneyyānam saṃsaya ṭṭhāne saṃsaya dīpana attham vuttaḥ tathāgatassa

original: pana saṃsayo nāma natthi. Ito paresupi pucchāpadesu eseva nayo.
analyzed: pana saṃsayaḥ nāma natthi itas paresu pi pucchā padesu esā iva nayo

original: Yathā ca kusalapadaṃ nissāya ime cattāro nayā, ekekasmiṃ naye tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yamakānaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca kusala padam nissāya ime cattāro nayāḥ ekekasmin naye tiṇṇam tiṇṇam yamakānam

original: vasena dvādasa yamakāni, ekekasmiṃ yamake dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ vasena catuvīsati
analyzed: vasena dvādasa yamakāni ekekasmin yamake dvinnam dvinnam pucchānam vasena catuvīsati

original: pucchā; ekekāya pucchāya dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena aṭṭhacattālīsa atthā ca
analyzed: pucchā ekekāya pucchāya dvinnam dvinnam atthānam vasena aṭṭhacattālīsa atthā ca

original: honti. Akusalapadaṃ nissāyapi tatheva. Abyākatapadaṃ nissāyapi tatheva. Tīṇipi padāni
analyzed: honti akusala padam nissāya api tathā iva abyākata padam nissāya api tathā iva tīṇi pi padāni

analyzed: ekatas katvā niddiṭṭham nāmapadam nissāya pi tathā iva ati kusala ttika mātikāya catūsu padesu

analyzed: sabbe pi soḷasa nayāḥ aṭṭhacattālīsa yamakāni channavuti pucchā dvenavuti satam

original: ca uddesavasena vuttāti veditabbā. Ettāvatā mūlavāro nāma paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭho hoti.
analyzed: ca uddesa vasena vuttā iti veditabbā ettāvatā mūlavāraḥ nāma paṭhamam uddiṭṭhaḥ hoti

original: Tato paraṃ ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalahetūtiādayo tasseva mūlavārassa
analyzed: tatas param ye keci kusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe te kusala hetu uti ādayo tassa iva mūlavārassa

original: vevacanavasena nava vārā uddiṭṭhā. Iti mūlavāro, hetuvāro, nidānavāro, sambhavavāro,
analyzed: vevacana vasena nava vārāḥ uddiṭṭhāḥ iti mūla vāraḥ hetu vāraḥ nidāna vāro sambhava vāro

original: pabhavavāro, samuṭṭhānavāro, āhāravāro, ārammaṇavāro, paccayavāro, samudayavāroti

original: sabbepi dasa vārā honti. Tattha mūlavāre āgataparicchedeneva sesesupi nayādayo veditabbāti
analyzed: sabbe api dasa vārāḥ honti tattha mūla vāre āgata paricchedena iva sesesu pi naya ādayaḥ veditabbā ati

analyzed: sabbesu pi dasasu vāresu saṭṭhi sata nayā asīti adhikāni cattāri yamaka satāni saṭṭhi adhikāni

original: navapucchāsatāni, vīsādhikāni ekūnavīsati atthasatāni ca uddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni.
analyzed: nava pucchā satāni vīsa adhikāni ekūnavīsati attha satāni ca uddiṭṭhāni iti veditabbāni

original: Evaṃ tāva uddesavāre nayayamakapucchāatthavārappabhedavasena pāḷivavatthānameva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam tāva uddesa vāre naya yamaka pucchā attha vāra ppabheda vasena pāḷi vavatthānam eva veditabbam

original: Mūlaṃ hetu nidānañcāti gāthā dasannampi vārānaṃ uddānagāthā nāma. Tattha mūlādīni
analyzed: mūlam hetu nidānam ca ati gāthāḥ uddānagāthā nāma tattha mūla ādīni

original: sabbānipi kāraṇavevacanāneva. Kāraṇañhi patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena mūlaṃ. Attano phalanipphādanatthaṃ
analyzed: sabbāni api kāraṇa vevacanāni iva kāraṇam hi patiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena mūlam attanaḥ phala nipphādana attham

analyzed: hinoti pavattati iti hetu handa nam gaṇhātha ati dassentam viya attanaḥ phalam nideti iti

original: nidānaṃ. Etasmā phalaṃ sambhotīti sambhavo. Pabhavatīti pabhavo. Samuṭṭhāti ettha
analyzed: nidānam etasmai phalam sambhoti iti sambhavaḥ pabhavati iti pabhavaḥ samuṭṭhāti ettha

original: phalaṃ, etena vā samuṭṭhātīti samuṭṭhānaṃ. Attano phalaṃ āharatīti āhāro. Appaṭikkhipitabbena

original: attano phalena ālambiyatīti ālambaṇaṃ. Etaṃ paṭicca appaṭikkhipitvā phalaṃ eti pavattatīti
analyzed: attanaḥ phalena ālambiyati iti ālambaṇam etam paṭicca a paṭikkhipitvā phalam eti pavattati iti

original: paccayo. Etasmā phalaṃ samudetīti samudayo. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ vacanattho veditabbo.
analyzed: paccayaḥ etasmā phalam samudeti iti samudayaḥ evam etesam padānam vacana tthaḥ veditabbo

original: Uddesavāravaṇṇanā.
analyzed: uddesa vāra vaṇṇanā

original: Niddesavāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: niddesa vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 50. Idāni yekeci kusalā dhammātiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha ye kecīti
analyzed: idāni ye keci kusalāḥ dhammā ati ādinā nayena niddesa vāraḥ āraddhaḥ tattha ye keci iti

original: anavasesavacanaṃ. Kusalā dhammāti kusalattikassa padabhājane vuttalakkhaṇā anavajjasukhavipākā
analyzed: anavasesa vacanam kusalāḥ dhammā ati kusala ttikassa pada bhājane vutta lakkhaṇā anavajja sukha vipākā

original: kusalasabhāvā. Sabbe te kusalamūlāti kiṃ te sabbeyeva kusalamūlāti pucchati. Tīṇeva
analyzed: kusala sabhāvā sabbe te kusala mūlā ati kim te kusala mūlā ati pucchati tīṇa iva

original: kusalamūlānīti na te sabbe kusalamūlāni, alobhādīni pana tīṇi eva kusalamūlānīti
analyzed: kusala mūlāni iti na te sabbe kusala mūlāni alobha ādīni pana tīṇi eva kusala mūlāni iti

original: attho. Avasesā kusalā dhammā na kusalamūlāti avasesā phassādayo kusalā dhammā kusalamūlāni
analyzed: atthaḥ avasesā kusalā dhammā na kusala mūlā ati avasesā phassa ādayaḥ kusalāḥ dhammāḥ kusala mūlāni

original: nāma na honti. Atha vā avasesā phassādayo kusalā dhammāyeva nāma, na kusalamūlānītipi
analyzed: nāma na honti atha vā avasesā phassa ādayaḥ kusalā dhammāya iva nāma na kusala mūlāni iti pi

original: attho. Ye vā pana kusalamūlāti ye vā pana paṭhamapucchāya dutiyapadena kusalamūlāti
analyzed: atthaḥ ye vā pana kusala mūlā ati ye vā pana paṭhama pucchāya dutiya padena kusala mūlā ati

original: tayo alobhādayo gahitā. Sabbe te dhammā kusalāti kiṃ te sabbe tayopi dhammā kusalāti
analyzed: tayaḥ alobha ādayaḥ gahitā sabbe te dhammā kusalā ati kim te sabbe tayaḥ api dhammā kusalā ati

original: pucchati. Āmantāti sabbesampi kusalamūlānaṃ kusalabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchanto āha. Ayaṃ
analyzed: pucchati āmantā ati sabbesam pi kusala mūlānam kusala bhāvam sampaṭicchantaḥ āha ayaṃ

original: tāva mūlanaye mūlayamakassa attho. Iminā upāyena sabbapucchāsu vissajjananayo veditabbo.
analyzed: tāva mūla naye mūlayamakassa atthaḥ iminā upāyena sabba pucchāsu vissajjana nayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Yaṃ pana yattha visesamattaṃ atthi, tadeva vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: yam pana yattha visesa mattam atthi tat eva vaṇṇayissāma

original: 51. Ekamūlayamake tāva sabbe te kusalamūlena ekamūlāti gaṇanaṭṭhena ekamūlakaṃ aggahetvā
analyzed: eka mūla yamake tāva sabbe te kusala mūlena eka mūlā ati gaṇana ṭṭhena eka mūlakam aggahetvā

original: samānaṭṭhena gahetabbā. Ayañhettha attho – sabbe te kusalamūlena samānamūlā. Yaṃ
analyzed: samāna aṭṭhena gahetabbāḥ ayam ha ittha atthaḥ sabbe te kusala mūlena samāna mūlāḥ yam

original: phassassa mūlaṃ, tadeva vedanādīnanti. Atha nesaṃ tathābhāvaṃ sampaṭicchanto āmantāti
analyzed: phassassa mūlam tat eva atha na īsam tathābhāvam sampaṭicchantaḥ āmantā ati

original: āha. Kusalasamuṭṭhānanti kusalacittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ dassitaṃ. Ekamūlanti alobhādinā
analyzed: āha kusala samuṭṭhānam ti kusala citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam dassitam eka mūlam ti alobha ādinā

original: kusalamūlena samānamūlaṃ. Yatheva hi phassādīnaṃ alobhādayo hetupaccayattā mūlaṃ,
analyzed: kusala mūlena samāna mūlam yathā iva hi phassa ādīnam alobha ādayaḥ hetu paccaya ttā mūlam

original: tathā taṃ samuṭṭhānarūpassāpi, kusalalakkhaṇābhāvena pana taṃ na kusalaṃ.
analyzed: tathā tam samuṭṭhāna rūpassa api kusala lakkhaṇa abhāvena pana tam na kusalam

original: 52. Aññamaññayamake ‘yekeci kusalā’ti apucchitvā yekeci kusalamūlena ekamūlāti pucchā
analyzed: aññamaññayamake ye keci kusalā ati a pucchitvā ye keci kusala mūlena eka mūlā ati pucchā

original: katā. Kasmā? Imināpi byañjanena tassevatthassa sambhavato. Kusalamūlānīti idaṃ purimassa
analyzed: katā kasmai iminā api byañjanena kusala mūlāni iti idam purimassa

original: visesanaṃ. ‘Mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī’ti hi vuttaṃ, tāni pana kusalamūlānipi honti
analyzed: visesanam mūlāni yāni ekatas uppajjanti iti hi vuttam tāni pana kusala mūlāni pi honti

original: akusalaabyākatamūlānipi, idha kusalamūlānīti visesadassanatthamidaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññamaññamūlāni
analyzed: akusala abyākata mūlāni pi idha kusala mūlāni iti visesa dassana attham idam vuttam añña mañña mūlāni

original: cāti aññamaññaṃ hetupaccayena paccayā hontīti attho. Tasseva paṭilomapucchāya ‘sabbe
analyzed: ca ati aññam aññam hetu paccayena paccayāḥ honti iti attho tassa iva paṭiloma pucchāya sabbe

original: te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā’ti avatvā sabbe te dhammā kusalāti vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
analyzed: te dhammā kusala mūlena eka mūlā ati avatvā sabbe te dhammā kusalā ati vuttam kasmā

original: Atthavisesābhāvato. Kusalamūlena ekamūlāti hi pucchāya katāya ‘mūlāni yāni ekato
analyzed: attha visesa abhāvato kusala mūlena eka mūlā ati hi pucchāya katāya mūlāni yāni ekatas

original: uppajjantī’ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyya, evañca sati atthavisesābhāvo

original: Paṇṇattiniddesavāravaṇṇanā.
2. Pavattivāravaṇṇanā
50-205. Idāni yassa rūpakkhandhotiādinā nayena pavattivāro āraddho. Kasmā panettha
analyzed: idāni yassa rūpakkhandho ti ādinā nayena pavatti vāraḥ āraddho kasmā pana ittha

analyzed: yassa rūpa kkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanā kkhandho uppajjati iti imāya pana paṭhama pucchāya

analyzed: asaññasattam upapajjantānam ti ādike imasmim vissajjane asaññasattam upapajjantānam

original: tesaṃ rūpakkhandho uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho uppajjatī’ti imasmiṃ koṭṭhāse

analyzed: ekena iva padena gahitassa rūpa kkhandhassa api uppādaḥ labbhati pañcavokāram upapajjantānam
