analyzed: tesam rūpa kkhandho ca uppajjati vedanā kkhandho ca uppajjati iti imasmin koṭṭhāse

original: padehi saṅgahitānaṃ rūpavedanākkhandhānampi uppādo labbhati. Iti ayañceva añño ca
analyzed: padehi saṅgahitānam rūpa vedanā khandhānam pi uppādaḥ labbhati iti ca iva ca

original: evarūpo pañho paripuṇṇapañhoti veditabbo. Purepacchāpañhotipi etasseva nāmaṃ. Etassa
analyzed: evarūpo pañho paripuṇṇa pañho ti veditabbo purepacchā pañho tipi etassa iva nāmam etassa

original: hi vissajjane purimakoṭṭhāse ekena padena saṅgahitassa rūpakkhandhasseva uppādo dassito.
analyzed: hi vissajjane purima koṭṭhāse ekena padena saṅgahitassa rūpa kkhandhassa iva uppādaḥ dassito

original: Dutiyakoṭṭhāse dvīhi padehi saṅgahitānaṃ rūpavedanākkhandhānaṃ. Imināyeva ca lakkhaṇena
analyzed: dutiya koṭṭhāse dvīhi padehi saṅgahitānam rūpa vedanā khandhānam imināya iva ca lakkhaṇena

original: yattha ekena padena saṅgahitassa khandhassa uppādo vā nirodho vā labbhati, so purepañhoti
analyzed: yattha ekena padena saṅgahitassa khandhassa uppādaḥ vā nirodhaḥ vā labbhati saḥ purepañhaḥ ti

analyzed: vuttaḥ yattha dvīhi pi padehi saṅgahitānam khandhānam uppādaḥ vā nirodhaḥ vā labbhati

original: so pacchāpañhoti vutto.
analyzed: so pacchāpañhaḥ ti vutto

analyzed: yassa rūpa kkhandhaḥ nuppajjittha tassa vedanā kkhandhaḥ nuppajjittha ati imāya pana

analyzed: pucchāya natthi iti imasmim vissajjane paṭikkhepaḥ labbhati yassa rūpa kkhandho uppajjati

original: tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatī’ti pucchāya ‘no’ti imasmiṃ vissajjane paṭisedho labbhati.

analyzed: nāma tam purepañhe labbhati yattha rūpa kkhandho nuppajjati tattha vedanā kkhandho

analyzed: paṭivacana bhāvena attham vissajjeti idam paṭivacanavissajjanam nāma tam pacchāpañhe

analyzed: labbhati yassa rūpa kkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanā kkhandho uppajjati iti hi pañhe

analyzed: asaññasattam upapajjantānan ti idam vissajjanam imesam rūpakkhandho uppajjati

analyzed: attham vissajjayamānam gatam tasmai evarūpesu ṭhānesu sarūpa dassanena vissajjanam

analyzed: alābhataḥ attha paṭisedhanena pañham vissajjeti idam paṭisedhena vissajjanam nāma

original: Taṃ moghapañhe labbhati. ‘Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā’ti
analyzed: tam mogha pañhe labbhati yassa rūpa kkhandho nuppajjittha tassa vedanā kkhandho nuppajjittha ati

original: hi pañhe ‘natthī’ti idaṃ vissajjanaṃ; evarūpo nāma satto natthīti atthapaṭikkhepena

original: vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanam veditabbam

analyzed: idāni ime cattāraḥ pañhāḥ imāni ca pañca vissajjanāni yesu sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu

analyzed: asaññasatte tattha ati ekam asaññasattānam ekam asaññasattā cavantānam ekam

analyzed: arūpam upapajjantānam ekam arūpe tattha ati ekam arūpānam ekam arūpā cavantānam

analyzed: ekam arūpe pacchimabhavikānanti ekam arūpe parinibbantānanti ekam ye ca arūpam

analyzed: ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā imasmin pavatti mahāvāre attha vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ evam viditvā

original: hi pañhaṃ vissajjantena suvissajjito hoti, atthañca vinicchayantena suvinicchito hoti.
analyzed: hi pañham vissajjantena su vissajjitaḥ hoti attham ca vinicchayantena su vinicchitaḥ hoti

original: Tatthāyaṃ nayo – yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti yassa puggalassa uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya
analyzed: tattha ayam nayaḥ yassa rūpa kkhandho uppajjati iti yassa puggalassa uppāda kkhaṇa samaṅgi tāya

analyzed: khaṇe uppajjati iti pucchati asaññasattam upapajjantānam ti acittaka paṭisandhi vasena

original: dvepi khandhā uppajjantiyeva. Pavatte pana tattha uppannānaṃ te khandhā uppajjantipi

analyzed: tasmā pañcavokārān anti avatvā pañcavokāram upapajjantānanti vuttam

original: Idaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānanti ṭhāne paripuṇṇapañhassa pacchimakoṭṭhāse sarūpadassanena

analyzed: vissajjanam iminā upāyena sabbāni vissajjanāni veditabbāni

original: Idaṃ panettha uppādanirodhesu niyamalakkhaṇaṃ – sakalepi hi imasmiṃ khandhayamake
analyzed: idam pana ittha uppāda nirodhesu niyama lakkhaṇam sakale api hi imasmim khandha yamake

analyzed: nānā kammena nibbattānam paṭisandhi khandhānam uppādam dassetum sukhanti paṭisandhi kāle

original: uppādavaseneva uppādavāro kathito. Uppannassa pana vipākavaṭṭassa pariyosānena nirodhaṃ
analyzed: uppāda vasena iva uppāda vāraḥ kathitaḥ uppannassa pana vipāka vaṭṭassa pariyosānena nirodham

original: dassetuṃ sukhanti maraṇakāle nirodhavasena nirodhavāro kathito.
analyzed: dassetum sukhanti maraṇa kāle nirodha vasena nirodhavāro kathito

original: Kiṃ panettha pavattiyaṃ uppādanirodhānaṃ anāmaṭṭhabhāve pamāṇanti? Pāḷiyeva. Pāḷiyañhi
analyzed: kim pana ittha uppāda nirodhānam anāmaṭṭha bhāve pamāṇanti pāḷiyā iva pāḷiyam hi

original: visesena uppādavārassa anāgatakālavāre ‘pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca
analyzed: visesena uppāda vārassa anāgata kāla vāre pacchimabhavikānam tesam rūpa kkhandho ca

original: nuppajjissati, vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī’ti ayaṃ pāḷi atipamāṇameva. Pacchimabhavikānañhi
analyzed: nuppajjissati vedanā khandho ca nuppajjissati iti ayam pāḷi atipamāṇam eva pacchimabhavikānam hi

analyzed: pavatte rūpa arūpa dhammānam uppajjitum yutta bhāve sati pi rūpa kkhandho ca na uppajjissati

original: vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vuttabhāvena pavatte uppādo
analyzed: vedanā khandho ca nuppajjissati iti sanniṭṭhānam katvā vutta bhāvena pavatte uppādaḥ

original: na gahitoti veditabbo. ‘Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na
analyzed: na gahito ti veditabbo suddhāvāse parinibbantānam tesam tattha saññā kkhandho na

original: nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatī’ti ayaṃ pana pāḷi pavatte
analyzed: nirujjhittha no ca tesam tattha vedanā khandhaḥ na nirujjhati iti ayam pana pāḷi pavatte

original: nirodhassa anāmaṭṭhabhāve ativiya pamāṇaṃ. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānañhi cuticittassa
analyzed: nirodhassa anāmaṭṭha bhāve ativiya pamāṇam suddhāvāse parinibbantānam hi cuti cittassa

original: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhitānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavatte uppajjitvā niruddhasaññākkhandhānaṃ
analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe ṭhitānam paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya pavatte uppajjitvā niruddha saññā kkhandhānam

original: gaṇanapatho natthi. ‘Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhitthā’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ

analyzed: eva oḷārika ttā imesam pana anoḷārika ttā etesu rūpa ādīsu anuseti iti na vuttam atthato

341-349. Niddesavāre panassa kassaci satta anusayā anusentīti puthujjanavasena vuttaṃ.

original: Na kevalañca vuccanti, appahīnattā pana te anusentiyeva nāmāti veditabbā.

original: Anusayā bhaṅgā natthīti yassa hi yo anuseti, so anusetiyeva; yo nānuseti, so nānusetiyeva.

original: Ayaṃ anuseti ca nānuseti ca, ayaṃ siyā anuseti siyā nānusetīti, evaṃ vibhajitabbo

original: Tassa hi kāmarāgapaṭighadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayā cattāropi anavasesato pahīnā. Itare

original: tayova appahīnā. Tena vuttaṃ – “kassaci tayo anusayā anusentī”ti.

analyzed: kālatā iti

analyzed: acitta samuṭṭhānānam pi saṅgaṇhanato pañhā vārasmin hi paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vipāka abyākatā

original: Kasmā panāyaṃ hetu paṭisandhiyameva kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayo hoti, na pavatteti?
analyzed: kasmā pana ayam hetu paṭisandhiyam eva kaṭattā rūpānam hetu paccayaḥ hoti na pavatteti

original: Paṭisandhiyaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ cittapaṭibaddhavuttitāya. Paṭisandhiyañhi kammajarūpānaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhiyam kamma ja rūpānam citta paṭibaddha vutti tāya paṭisandhiyam hi kamma ja rūpānam

original: cittapaṭibaddhā pavatti, cittavasena uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca. Tasmiñhi khaṇe
analyzed: citta paṭibaddhā pavatti citta vasena uppajjanti ca iva tiṭṭhanti ca tasmin hi khaṇe

original: cittaṃ cittajarūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti, tānipi vinā cittena uppajjituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ
analyzed: cittam citta ja rūpam janetum na sakkoti tāni api vinā cittena uppajjitum vā ṭhātum

original: vā na sakkonti. Tenevāha – “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe nāmarūpassa
analyzed: vā na sakkonti tena eva āha viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpam tasmin patiṭṭhite viññāṇe nāma rūpassa

original: avakkanti hotī”ti. Pavattiyaṃ pana tesaṃ citte vijjamānepi kammapaṭibaddhāva pavatti,
analyzed: avakkanti hoti iti pavattiyam pana tesam citte vijjamāne pi kamma paṭibaddhā va pavatti

original: na cittapaṭibaddhā. Avijjamāne cāpi citte nirodhasamāpannānaṃ uppajjantiyeva.
analyzed: na citta paṭibaddhāḥ avijjamāne ca api citte nirodha samāpannānam uppajjantiyā iva

original: Kasmā pana paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ cittajarūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkotīti? Kammavegakkhittatāya
analyzed: kasmā pana paṭisandhi kkhaṇe cittam citta ja rūpam janetum na sakkoti iti kamma vega kkhitta tāya

original: ceva appatiṭṭhitavatthutāya ca dubbalattā. Tañhi tadā kammavegakkhittaṃ apurejātavatthukattā
analyzed: ca iva appatiṭṭhita vatthutāya ca dubbala ttā tat hi tadā kamma vega kkhittam a purejāta vatthuka ttā

original: ca appatiṭṭhitavatthukanti dubbalaṃ hoti. Tasmā papāte patitamatto puriso kiñci sippaṃ
analyzed: ca appatiṭṭhita vatthukanti dubbalam hoti tasmā papāte patita mattaḥ puriso kiñci sippam

original: kātuṃ viya rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti; kammajarūpameva panassa cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṭṭhāne
analyzed: kātum viya rūpam janetum na sakkoti kamma ja rūpam eva panassa citta samuṭṭhāna rūpa ṭṭhāne

original: tiṭṭhati. Tañca kammajarūpasseva bījaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Kammaṃ panassa khettasadisaṃ,
analyzed: tiṭṭhati tat ca kamma ja rūpassa iva bīja ṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati kammam panassa khetta sadisam

original: kilesā āpasadisā. Tasmā santepi khette āpe ca paṭhamuppattiyaṃ bījānubhāvena rukkhuppatti
analyzed: kilesāḥ āpa sadisā tasmā sante pi khette āpe ca paṭhama uppattiyam bīja anubhāvena rukkha uppatti

original: viya paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittānubhāvena rūpakāyassa uppatti. Bīje pana vigatepi pathavīāpānubhāvena
analyzed: viya paṭisandhi khaṇe citta anubhāvena rūpa kāyassa uppatti bīje pana vigate api pathavīāpa anubhāvena

original: rukkhassa uparūpari pavatti viya; vinā cittena kammatova kaṭattārūpānaṃ pavatti hotīti
analyzed: rukkhassa upari upari pavatti viya vinā cittena kammataḥ va kaṭattā rūpānam pavatti hoti iti

original: veditabbā. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “kammaṃ khettaṃ viññāṇaṃ bījaṃ taṇhā sneho”ti.
analyzed: veditabbā vuttam pi ca itam kammam khettam viññāṇam bījam taṇhā sneho ti

original: Ayañca panattho okāsavaseneva gahetabbo. Tayo hi okāsā – nāmokāso, rūpokāso, nāmarūpokāsoti.
analyzed: ayam ca pana attho okāsa vasena iva gahetabbo tayaḥ hi okāsāḥ nāma ukāsaḥ rūpa ukāsaḥ nāma rūpa ukāsaḥ iti

original: Tattha arūpabhavo nāmokāso nāma. Tatra hi hadayavatthumattampi rūpapaccayaṃ vinā
analyzed: tattha arūpabhavaḥ nāma ukāsaḥ nāma tatra hi rūpa paccayam vinā

original: arūpadhammāva uppajjanti. Asaññabhavo rūpokāso nāma. Tatra hi paṭisandhicittamattampi
analyzed: uppajjanti asañña bhavaḥ rūpokāsaḥ nāma tatra hi paṭisandhi citta mattam pi

original: arūpapaccayaṃ vinā rūpadhammāva uppajjanti. Pañcavokārabhavo nāmarūpokāso nāma. Tatra
analyzed: arūpa paccayam vinā uppajjanti pañcavokāra bhavaḥ nāma rūpokāsaḥ nāma tatra

original: hi vatthurūpamattampi vinā paṭisandhiyaṃ arūpadhammā, paṭisandhicittañca vinā kammajāpi
analyzed: hi vatthu rūpa mattam pi vinā paṭisandhiyam arūpa dhammā paṭisandhi cittam ca vinā kamma jā api

original: rūpadhammā nuppajjanti. Yuganaddhāva rūpārūpānaṃ uppatti. Yathā hi sassāmike sarājake
analyzed: rūpa dhammāḥ na uppajjanti rūpa arūpānaṃ uppatti yathā hi sa ssāmike sa rājake

original: gehe sadvārapālake rājāṇattiṃ vinā paṭhamappaveso nāma natthi, aparabhāge pana vināpi
analyzed: gehe sa dvārapālake rāja āṇattim vinā paṭhama ppavesaḥ nāma natthi aparabhāge pana vinā api

original: āṇattiṃ purimāṇattiānubhāveneva hoti, evameva pañcavokāre paṭisandhiviññāṇarājassa
analyzed: āṇattim purima āṇatti anubhāvena iva hoti evam eva pañcavokāre paṭisandhi viññāṇa rājassa

original: sahajātādipaccayataṃ vinā rūpassa paṭisandhivasena paṭhamuppatti nāma natthi. Aparabhāge
analyzed: sahajāta ādi paccaya tam vinā rūpassa paṭisandhi vasena paṭhama uppatti nāma natthi apara bhāge

original: pana vināpi paṭisandhiviññāṇassa sahajātādipaccayānubhāvaṃ purimānubhāvavasena laddhappavesassa
analyzed: pana vinā api paṭisandhi viññāṇassa sahajāta ādi paccaya anubhāvam purima anubhāva vasena laddha ppavesassa

original: kammato pavatti hoti. Asaññabhavo pana yasmā arūpokāso na hoti, tasmā tattha vināva
analyzed: kammataḥ pavatti hoti asañña bhavaḥ pana yasmai arūpa ukāsaḥ na hoti tasmā tattha

original: arūpapaccayā asaññokāsattā rūpaṃ pavattati, assāmike suññagehe attano gehe ca purisassa
analyzed: arūpa paccayā asaññokāsattā rūpam pavattati assāmike suñña gehe attanaḥ gehe ca purisassa

original: paveso viya. Arūpabhavopi yasmā rūpokāso na hoti, tasmā tattha vināva rūpapaccayā
analyzed: viya arūpa bhavaḥ api yasmā rūpa ukāsaḥ na hoti tasmā tattha rūpa paccayā

original: aññokāsattā arūpadhammā pavattanti. Pañcavokārabhavo pana rūpārūpokāsoti natthettha
analyzed: aññokāsa ttāḥ arūpa dhammā pavattanti pañcavokāra bhavo pana rūpa arūpa ukāso ti nattha ittha

original: arūpapaccayaṃ vinā paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppattīti. Iti ayaṃ hetu paṭisandhiyameva
analyzed: arūpa paccayam vinā paṭisandhi khaṇe rūpānam uppatti iti iti ayam hetu paṭisandhiyam eva

original: kaṭattārūpānaṃ paccayo hoti, na pavatteti.
analyzed: kaṭattā rūpānam paccayaḥ hoti na pavattā iti

original: Nanu “hetū sahajātānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayoti vutte sabbopi ayamattho gahito hoti,
analyzed: nanu hetū sahajātānam hetu paccayena paccayaḥ ti vutte sabbaḥ api ayam atthaḥ gahitaḥ hoti

original: atha kasmā “hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpāna”nti idaṃ gahitanti?
analyzed: atha kasmā hetu sampayuttakānam dhammānam tad samuṭṭhānānam ca rūpānam ti idam gahitan ti

original: Pavattiyaṃ kaṭattārūpādīnaṃ paccayabhāvapaṭibāhanato. Evañhi sati yāni pavattiyaṃ
analyzed: pavattiyam kaṭattā rūpa ādīnam paccaya bhāva paṭibāhanataḥ evam hi sati yāni

original: hetunā saha ekakkhaṇe kaṭattārūpāni ceva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāni ca jāyanti, tesampi
analyzed: hetunā saha eka kkhaṇe kaṭattā rūpāni ca iva utu āhāra samuṭṭhānāni ca jāyanti tesam pi

original: hetū hetupaccayoti āpajjeyya, na ca so tesaṃ paccayo. Tasmā tesaṃ paccayabhāvassa
analyzed: hetū hetu paccayo ti āpajjeyya na ca saḥ tesam paccayo tasmā tesam paccaya bhāvassa

original: paṭibāhanatthametaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭibāhana attham etam gahitan ti veditabbam

original: Idāni “nānappakārabhedato paccayuppannato”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ vasenettha viññātabbo
analyzed: idāni nānā pakāra bhedataḥ paccaya uppannato ti imesam padānam vasena ittha viññātabbo

original: vinicchayo. Tesu nānappakārabhedatoti ayañhi hetu nāma jātito kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedato
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ tesu nānā pakāra bhedato ti ayan hi hetu nāma jātitaḥ kusala akusala vipāka kiriya bhedato

original: catubbidho. Tattha kusalahetu bhūmantarato kāmāvacarādibhedena catubbidho, akusalahetu
analyzed: catubbidhaḥ tattha kusala hetu bhūmantarataḥ kāmāvacara ādi bhedena catubbidhaḥ akusala hetu

original: kāmāvacarova vipākahetu kāmāvacarādibhedena catubbidho, kiriyahetu kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro
analyzed: vipāka hetu kāmāvacara ādi bhedena catubbidhaḥ kiriya hetu kāmāvacaraḥ rūpāvacaro

original: arūpāvacaroti tividho. Tattha kāmāvacarakusalahetu nāmato alobhādivasena tividho.
analyzed: arūpāvacaro ti tividho nāmataḥ alobha ādi vasena tividhaḥ

original: Rūpāvacarādikusalahetūsupi eseva nayo. Akusalahetu lobhādivasena tividho. Vipākakiriyahetū

original: pana alobhādivasena tayo tayo honti. Taṃtaṃcittasampayogavasena pana tesaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: pana alobha ādi vasena tayaḥ tayaḥ honti tad tad citta sampayoga vasena pana tesam tesam

original: hetūnaṃ nānappakārabhedoyevāti evaṃ tāvettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: hetūnam nānā pakāra bhedaḥ yā iva ati evam tāva ettha nānā pakāra bhedataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Paccayuppannatoti iminā paccayena ime dhammā uppajjanti, imesaṃ nāma dhammānaṃ ayaṃ
analyzed: paccaya uppannato ti iminā paccayena ime dhammāḥ uppajjanti imesam nāma dhammānam ayam

original: paccayoti evampi viññātabbo vinicchayoti attho. Tattha imasmiṃ tāva hetupaccaye kāmāvacarakusalahetu
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti evam pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ ti attho tattha imasmin tāva hetu paccaye kāmāvacara kusala hetu

analyzed: hoti arūpa bhave sampayutta dhammānaṃ yeva rūpāvacara kusala hetu kāma bhava rūpa bhavesu yeva

original: hetupaccayo. Kiriyahetūsu pana tebhūmakesupi kusalahetusadisova paccayoti. Evamettha
analyzed: hetu paccayaḥ kiriya hetūsu pana tebhūmakesu pi kusala hetu sadisaḥ va paccayaḥ ti evam ettha

original: paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
analyzed: paccaya uppannataḥ api viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ ti

original: Hetupaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: hetu paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 2. Ārammaṇapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 2. Ārammaṇapaccayaniddese rūpāyatananti rūpasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccaya niddese rūpa āyatanam ti rūpa saṅkhātam āyatanam sesesu pi esa eva nayo

original: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyāti cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātāya dhātuyā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa dhātuyā ti cakkhu viññāṇa saṅkhātāya dhātuyā sesa padesu pi esa eva nayaḥ

original: Taṃsampayuttakānanti tāya cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā sampayuttakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ,

original: Sabbe dhammāti etāni ca rūpāyatanādīni pañca avasesā ca sabbepi ñeyyadhammā imā cha
analyzed: sabbe dhammā ti etāni ca rūpa āyatana ādīni pañca avasesā ca sabbe pi ñeyya dhammā imā cha

original: paccayoti attho. Yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhāti iminā ye ete etāsaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti atthaḥ yam yam dhammaṃ ārabbha ati iminā ye ete etāsam sattannam viññāṇa dhātūnam

analyzed: yathā najjaḥ sandanti pabbatāḥ tiṭṭhanti iti sabba kāla saṅgaha vasena evam vuttam iti veditabbam

original: Tena yepi ārabbha ye uppajjiṃsu, yepi uppajjissanti, te sabbe ārammaṇapaccayeneva
analyzed: tena ye api ārabbha ye uppajjiṃsu ye api uppajjissanti te sabbe ārammaṇa paccayena iva

analyzed: uppajjiṃsu ca uppajjissanti ca ati siddham hoti citta cetasikāḥ dhammā ati idam ye ye

original: dhammā”ti vuttānaṃ sarūpato nidassanaṃ. Te te dhammāti te te ārammaṇadhammā. Tesaṃ
analyzed: dhammā ti vuttānam sarūpataḥ nidassanam te te dhammā ati te te ārammaṇa dhammā tesam

original: tesanti tesaṃ tesaṃ cittacetasikadhammānaṃ. Ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
analyzed: tesam ti tesam tesam citta cetasika dhammānam ayam tāva ettha pāḷi vaṇṇanā

analyzed: chabbidham hoti tattha ṭhapetvā paññattim avasesam bhūmitaḥ a pariyāpannanti

original: catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ kusalākusalavipākakiriyarūpabhedato pañcavidhaṃ;
analyzed: catubbidham hoti tattha kāmāvacaram kusala akusala vipāka kiriya rūpa bhedato pañcavidham

analyzed: vipākam catu bhūmakam kiriyam ti bhūmakam rūpam eka bhūmakam kāmāvacaram eva nibbānam pi

original: Ayaṃ pana purejātapaccayo suddharūpameva hoti. Tañca kho uppādakkhaṇaṃ atikkamitvā

original: ṭhitippattaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūparūpameva. Taṃ sabbampi vatthupurejātaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti
analyzed: ṭhiti ppattam aṭṭhārasavidham rūpa rūpam eva tam sabbam pi vatthu purejātam ārammaṇa purejātam ti

original: dvidhā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… kāyāyatanaṃ vatthurūpanti idaṃ vatthupurejātaṃ
analyzed: dvidhā ṭhitam tattha cakkhāyatanam pe kāyāyatanam vatthu rūpan ti idam vatthu purejātam

original: nāma. Sesaṃ imāya pāḷiyā āgatañca anāgatañca vaṇṇo saddo gandho raso catasso dhātuyo
analyzed: nāma sesam imāya pāḷiyā āgatam ca anāgatam ca vaṇṇo saddo gandho raso catasso dhātuyaḥ

original: tīṇi indriyāni kabaḷīkāro āhāroti dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātapaccayo nāmāti
analyzed: tīṇi indriyāni kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ iti dvādasavidham rūpam ārammaṇa purejāta paccayaḥ nāma ati

original: evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: evam ettha nānā pakāra bhedataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Evaṃ bhinne panettha cakkhāyatanaṃ dvinnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo,
analyzed: evam bhinne pana ittha cakkha āyatanam dvinnam cakkhu viññāṇānam purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: tathā itarāni cattāri sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ. Vatthurūpaṃ pana ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇāni
analyzed: tathā itarāni cattāri sota viññāṇa ādīnam vatthu rūpam pana ṭhapetvā dvi pañca viññāṇāni

original: cattāro ca āruppavipāke sesānaṃ sabbesampi catubhūmakānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatānaṃ
analyzed: cattāro ca āruppa vipāke sesānam sabbesam pi catu bhūmakānam kusala akusala abyākatānam

original: cittacetasikānaṃ purejātapaccayo hoti. Rūpādīni pana pañcārammaṇāni dvipañcaviññāṇānañceva
analyzed: citta cetasikānam purejāta paccayaḥ hoti rūpa ādīni pana pañca ārammaṇāni dvi pañca viññāṇānam ca iva

original: manodhātūnañca ekanteneva purejātapaccayā honti. Aṭṭhārasavidhampi panetaṃ rūparūpaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dhātūnam ca ekantena iva purejāta paccayāḥ honti aṭṭhārasavidham pi pana itam rūpa rūpam

original: kāmāvacarakusalassa rūpāvacarato abhiññākusalassa akusalassa tadārammaṇabhāvino kāmāvacaravipākassa
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalassa rūpāvacarataḥ abhiññā kusalassa akusalassa tad ārammaṇa bhāvino kāmāvacara vipākassa

original: kāmāvacarakiriyassa rūpāvacarato abhiññākiriyassāti imesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ purejātapaccayo
analyzed: kāmāvacara kiriyassa rūpāvacarataḥ abhiññā kiriyassa ati imesam channam rāsīnam purejāta paccayo

original: hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
analyzed: hoti iti evam ettha paccaya uppannataḥ pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ ti

original: Purejātapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: purejāta paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 11. Pacchājātapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā
11. Pacchājātapaccayaniddese pacchājātāti yassa kāyassa paccayā honti, tasmiṃ uppajjitvā
analyzed: pacchājāta paccaya niddese pacchājātā ati yassa kāyassa paccayāḥ honti tasmim uppajjitvā

original: ṭhite jātā. Purejātassāti tesaṃ uppādato paṭhamataraṃ jātassa jātikkhaṇaṃ atikkamitvā
analyzed: ṭhite jātā purejātassa ati tesam uppādataḥ paṭhamataram jātassa jāti kkhaṇam atikkamitvā

analyzed: ṭhiti pattassa imassa kāyassa ati imassa catu samuṭṭhānika tisamuṭṭhānika bhūta aupādā rūpa saṅkhātassa

analyzed: kāyassa ettha ca ti samuṭṭhānika kāyo ti āhāra samuṭṭhānassa abhāvataḥ brahma pārisajja ādīnam

analyzed: catudhā bhijjati iti evam ettha nānā pakāra bhedataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Evaṃ bhinne panettha pañcavokārabhave uppannaṃ catubhūmakakusalañca akusalañca uppādakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: evam bhinne pana ittha pañcavokāra bhave uppannam catu bhūmaka kusalam ca akusalam ca uppāda kkhaṇam

original: atikkamitvā ṭhitippattassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikarūpakāyassa pacchājātapaccayo
analyzed: atikkamitvā ṭhiti pattassa catu samuṭṭhānika ti samuṭṭhānika rūpa kāyassa pacchājāta paccayo

original: hoti. Vipākepi ṭhapetvā paṭisandhivipākaṃ avaseso kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipāko tasseva
analyzed: hoti vipāke pi ṭhapetvā paṭisandhi vipākam avasesaḥ kāmāvacara rūpāvacara vipāko tassa eva

original: ekantena pacchājātapaccayo hoti. Lokuttaropi pañcavokāre uppannavipāko tasseva pacchājātapaccayo

original: hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
analyzed: hoti iti evam ettha paccaya uppannataḥ pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ ti

original: Pacchājātapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: pacchājāta paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 12. Āsevanapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: āsevana paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

analyzed: āsevana paccaya niddese purimā purimā iti sabba nayesu samanantarā atītā ava daṭṭhabbā

original: Kasmā panettha anantarapaccaye viya “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha anantara paccaye viya purimā purimā kusalāḥ dhammāḥ pacchimānam pacchimānam

original: abyākatānaṃ dhammāna”ntiādinā nayena bhinnajātikehi saddhiṃ niddeso na katoti? Attano
analyzed: abyākatānam dhammānam ti ādinā nayena bhinna jātikehi saddhim niddesaḥ na kataḥ iti attanaḥ

original: gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ asamatthatāya. Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ āsevanaguṇena
analyzed: gatim gāhāpetum a samattha tāya bhinna jātikāḥ hi bhinna jātikānam arūpa dhammānam āsevana guṇena

analyzed: paguṇa balava bhāvam sādhayamānāḥ attanaḥ kusala ādi bhāva saṅkhātam gatim gāhāpetum na sakkonti

original: Tasmā tehi saddhiṃ niddesaṃ akatvā ye yesaṃ vāsanāsaṅkhātena āsevanena paguṇatarabalavatarabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: tasmā tehi saddhim niddesam a katvā ye vāsanā saṅkhātena āsevanena paguṇatara balavatara bhāva visiṭṭham

analyzed: saddhim niddeso kato ti veditabbo atha vipāka abyākatam kasmā na gahitan ti āsevana abhāvena

original: Vipākañhi kammavasena vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammapariṇāmitaṃ hutvā vattati nirussāhaṃ
analyzed: vipākam hi kamma vasena vipāka bhāva ppattam kamma pariṇāmitam hutvā vattati nirussāham

original: dubbalanti taṃ āsevanaguṇena attano sabhāvaṃ gāhāpetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññaṃ vipākaṃ
analyzed: dubbalanti tam āsevana guṇena attanaḥ sabhāvam gāhāpetvā paribhāvetvā na iva aññam vipākam

original: uppādetuṃ sakkoti, na purimavipākānubhāvaṃ gahetvā uppajjitunti. Kammavegakkhittaṃ
analyzed: uppādetum sakkoti na purima vipāka anubhāvam gahetvā uppajjitum ti kamma vegakkhittam

original: pana patitaṃ viya hutvā uppajjatīti sabbathāpi vipāke āsevanaṃ natthīti āsevanābhāvena
analyzed: pana patitam viya hutvā uppajjati iti sabbathā api vipāke āsevanam natthi iti āsevana abhāvena

analyzed: vipākam na gahitam kusala akusala kiriyā anantaram uppajjamānam pi ca itam kamma paṭibaddha vutti tāya

analyzed: na bhūmito pana ārammaṇato vā nānājātika ttam nāma natthi tasmā kāmāvacara kusala kiriyā mahaggata kusala kiriyānam pi

analyzed: saṅkhāra ārammaṇam ca anuloma kusalam nibbāna ārammaṇassa gotrabhu kusalassa āsevana paccayo

analyzed: arūpāvacaraḥ tividhaḥ kiriyā byākato kāmāvacaraḥ rūpāvacaraḥ

analyzed: viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Evaṃ bhinne panettha sahajātā kāmāvacarakusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva

analyzed: citta samuṭṭhāna rūpassa ca catu vokāre sampayutta kkhandhānaṃ ca eva sahajāta kamma paccayo

analyzed: hoti uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attanaḥ vipākānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam nānākkhaṇika kamma paccayena

original: paccayo hoti. Sā ca kho pañcavokāreyeva, na aññattha. Sahajātā rūpāvacarakusalacetanā
analyzed: paccayo hoti sā ca kho pañcavokāreya iva na aññattha sahajātā rūpāvacara kusala cetanā

original: attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca ekanteneva sahajātakammapaccayena
analyzed: attanā sampayutta dhammānaṃ ca iva citta samuṭṭhāna rūpānaṃ ca ekantena iva sahajāta kamma paccayena

original: paccayo. Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attano vipākānañceva kaṭattārūpānañca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attanaḥ vipākānam ca iva kaṭattā rūpānam ca nānā kkhaṇika kamma paccayena

original: paccayo. Arūpāvacarā pana lokuttarā ca sahajātā kusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva
analyzed: paccayaḥ arūpāvacarā pana lokuttarā ca sahajātā kusala cetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayutta dhammānam ca iva

original: cakkhuviññāṇānaṃ, sotindriyādīni tathāvidhānaññeva sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ, rūpajīvitindriyaṃ

original: Indriyapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā.

original: 17. Jhānapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā

analyzed: jhāna paccaya niddese jhāna aṅgāni iti dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjesu sesa cittesu uppannāni

analyzed: ca yam pana ittha āruppe uppajjati tam sampayutta dhammānam ñeva jhāna paccayena paccayo ti

original: evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
analyzed: evam ettha paccaya uppannataḥ pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ ti

original: Jhānapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: jhāna paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

analyzed: paññā vitakko sammāvācā kammanta ājīvā vīriyam sati samādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchā vācā kammanta ājīvā ati

analyzed: ca rūpānam magga paccayena paccayo ti ayam tāva ettha pāḷi vaṇṇanā

original: 19. Sampayuttapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sampayutta paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Ayaṃ pana vippayuttapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato pañcavokārabhave vattamānā rūpārūpadhammā.

original: pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Chadhā ṭhitesu pana rūpesu vatthurūpaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe

original: saddhiṃ saṃsandane yā gaṇanā labbhati, taṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayassa purimabhāge
analyzed: saddhim saṃsandane yā gaṇanā labbhati tam dassetum ārammaṇa paccayassa purima bhāge

original: ṭhitampi hetupaccayaṃ pacchimabhāgeva ṭhapetvā “ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhitam pi hetu paccayam pacchima bhāga eva ṭhapetvā ārammaṇa paccayāḥ hetuyā tīṇi iti vuttam

original: Tenetaṃ āvi karoti – ārammaṇapaccayo yena yena bahutaragaṇanena vā samānagaṇanena
analyzed: tena itam āvi karoti ārammaṇa paccayaḥ yena yena bahutara gaṇanena vā samāna gaṇanena

original: vā paccayena saddhiṃ dukatikādibhedaṃ gacchati, sabbattha tīṇeva pañhāvissajjanāni
analyzed: vā paccayena saddhim dukatika ādi bhedam gacchati sabbattha tīṇi iva pañha vissajjanāni

original: veditabbāni. Vipākapaccayena pana saddhiṃ saṃsandane ekameva labbhati, taṃ vipākapaccayādikāya
analyzed: veditabbāni vipāka paccayena pana saddhim saṃsandane ekam eva labbhati tam vipāka paccaya ādikāya

original: gaṇanāya āvi bhavissatīti idha na dassitaṃ. Yā cesā dumūlake gaṇanā dassitā, timūlakādīsupi
analyzed: gaṇanāya bhavissati iti idha na dassitam yā ca isā dumūlake gaṇanā dassitā timūlaka ādīsu pi

original: esāva gaṇanāti ārammaṇapaccayavasena timūlakādayo na vitthāritā.
analyzed: esā ava gaṇanā ti ārammaṇa paccaya vasena timūlaka ādayaḥ na vitthāritā

original: Idāni adhipatipaccayādivasena dumūlakādīsu gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayā hetuyā
analyzed: idāni adhipati paccaya ādi vasena du mūlaka ādīsu gaṇanam dassetum adhipati paccayāḥ hetuyā

original: navātiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi vuttanayeneva paccayasanniveso veditabbo. Yathā ca adhipatipaccayā
analyzed: nava atiādi vuttam tattha api vutta nayena iva paccaya sannivesaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā ca adhipati paccayā

original: hetuyā nava, evaṃ sesesupi hetunā samānagaṇanāsu naveva. Iti yo yo paccayo ādimhi
analyzed: hetuyā nava evam sesesu pi hetunā samāna gaṇanāsu navā iva iti yaḥ yaḥ paccayaḥ ādimhi

original: tiṭṭhati, tena tena saddhiṃ samānagaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ādimhi ṭhitassa vasena gaṇanā
analyzed: tiṭṭhati tena tena saddhim samāna gaṇanānam saṃsandane ādimhi ṭhitassa vasena gaṇanā

original: hoti. Tena pana saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā
analyzed: tena pana saddhim ūnatara gaṇanānam saṃsandane vasena gaṇanā

original: hotīti veditabbo. Yathā ca ārammaṇapaccayavasena evaṃ adhipatipaccayavasenāpi tato
analyzed: hoti iti veditabbaḥ yathā ca ārammaṇa paccaya vasena evam adhipati paccaya vasena api tatas

original: paresaṃ anantarādīnaṃ vasenāpi timūlakādayo na vitthāritā. Tasmā dumūlake dassitagaṇanāvaseneva
analyzed: paresam anantara ādīnam vasena api timūlaka ādayaḥ na vitthāritā tasmā dumūlake dassita gaṇanā vasena iva

original: sabbattha sādhetabbā. Teneva vuttaṃ “ekekaṃ paccayaṃ mūlakaṃ kātuna sajjhāyamaggena gaṇetabbā”ti.
analyzed: sabbattha sādhetabbā tena iva vuttam ekekam paccayam mūlakam kātuna sajjhāya maggena gaṇetabbā ati

original: Paccayānulomavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paccaya anuloma vaṇṇanā

original: Paṭiccavāro
analyzed: paṭiccavāro

original: Paccayapaccanīyavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paccaya paccanīya vaṇṇanā

original: 86-87. Paccayapaccanīyaṃ pana yasmā kusalapade na labbhati kusaladhammassa hetupaccayena
analyzed: paccaya paccanīyam pana yasmā kusala pade na labbhati kusala dhammassa hetu paccayena

original: vinā anuppattito, tasmā akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha nahetupaccayāti
analyzed: vinā anuppattitaḥ tasmai akusalam dhammam paṭicca atiādi āraddham tattha na hetu paccayā ti

original: hetupaccayapaṭikkhepo hetupaccayaṃ vinā aññena paccayena uppajjatīti attho. Vicikicchāsahagato
analyzed: hetu paccaya paṭikkhepaḥ hetu paccayam vinā aññena paccayena uppajjati iti atthaḥ vicikicchā sahagataḥ

original: uddhaccasahagato mohoti ayañhi sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca
analyzed: uddhacca sahagataḥ mohaḥ ti ayam hi sampayutta dhammānam ca iva citta samuṭṭhāna rūpassa ca

original: sayaṃ hetupaccayo hoti, aññassa pana sampayuttahetuno abhāvā na hetupaccayā uppajjatīti
analyzed: sayam hetu paccayaḥ hoti aññassa pana sampayutta hetuno abhāvā na hetu paccayā uppajjati iti

original: ṭhapetvā hetupaccayaṃ sesehi attano anurūpapaccayehi uppajjati. Iminā nayena sabbapaccayapaṭikkhepesu
analyzed: ṭhapetvā hetu paccayam sesehi attanaḥ anurūpa paccayehi uppajjati iminā nayena sabba paccaya paṭikkhepesu

original: attho veditabbo. Ahetukaṃ vipākābyākatanti idaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakavaseneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ahetukam vipāka abyākatam ti idam rūpa samuṭṭhāpaka vasena iva veditabbam

original: Aññesupi evarūpesu eseva nayo.
analyzed: aññesu pi evarūpesu esa iva nayo

original: 88. Naadhipatipaccaye kāmaṃ adhipatipi attanā saddhiṃ dutiyassa adhipatino abhāvā
analyzed: na adhipati paccaye kāmam adhipati pi attanā saddhim dutiyassa adhipatino abhāvā

original: naadhipatipaccayaṃ labhati, yathā pana vicikicchuddhaccasahagato moho ahetuko, na
analyzed: na adhipati paccayam labhati yathā pana vicikicchu ddhacca sahagataḥ mohaḥ ahetukaḥ na

original: tathā adhipatayo eva nirādhipati. Chandādīsu pana aññataraṃ adhipatiṃ akatvā kusalādīnaṃ
analyzed: tathā adhipatayaḥ eva chanda ādīsu pana aññataram adhipatim a katvā kusala ādīnam

original: uppattikāle sabbepi kusalādayo nirādhipatino. Tasmā mohaṃ viya visuṃ adhipatimattameva
analyzed: uppatti kāle sabbe pi kusala ādayaḥ tasmā moham viya visum adhipati mattam eva

original: anuddharitvā sabbasaṅgāhikavasena esā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādikā
analyzed: an uddharitvā sabba saṅgāhika vasena esā ekam khandham paṭicca tayo khandhā iti ādikā

original: desanā katāti veditabbā.
analyzed: desanā katā ati veditabbā

original: 89. Nānantaranasamanantaresu nārammaṇe viya rūpameva paccayuppannaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
analyzed: na anantara na sa manantaresu na ārammaṇe viya rūpam eva paccaya uppannam tena vuttam

original: “nārammaṇapaccayasadisa”nti. Sahajātapaccayo parihīno. Yathā cesa, tathā nissayaatthiavigatapaccayāpi.
analyzed: na ārammaṇa paccaya sadisanti sahajāta paccayaḥ parihīnaḥ yathā ca isa tathā nissaya atthi avigata paccayā api

original: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Etehi vinā kassaci anuppattito. Sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayepi
analyzed: kim kāraṇā etehi vinā kassaci anuppattitaḥ sahajāta nissaya atthi avigata paccaye pi

original: hi paccakkhāya ekopi rūpārūpadhammo nuppajjati, tasmā te parihīnā.
analyzed: hi paccakkhāya ekaḥ api rūpa arūpa dhammo na uppajjati tasmā te parihīnā

original: 90. Naaññamaññapaccayavibhaṅge paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākate khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti hadayavatthuvajjaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: na aññamañña paccaya vibhaṅge paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vipāka abyākate khandhe paṭicca kaṭattā rūpanti hadaya vatthu vajjam veditabbaṃ

original: 91. Naupanissayapaccayavibhaṅge rūpameva paccayuppannaṃ, tañhi upanissayaṃ na labhati.
analyzed: na aupanissaya paccaya vibhaṅge rūpam eva paccaya uppannam tat hi upanissayam na labhati

original: Arūpaṃ pana kiñcāpi ārammaṇūpanissayapakatūpanissaye na labheyya, anantarūpanissayamuttakaṃ
analyzed: arūpam pana kiñca api ārammaṇa upanissaya pakata upanissaye na labheyya anantara upanissayam uttakam

original: pana natthi. Tena vuttaṃ “nārammaṇapaccayasadisa”nti.
analyzed: pana natthi tena vuttam na ārammaṇa paccaya sadisam ti

original: 92. Napurejāte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpanti pañcavokāravasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na purejāte citta samuṭṭhāna rūpan ti pañca vokāra vasena vuttam

original: 93. Napacchājātapaccayāti ettha sahajātapurejātapaccayā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Tasmā
analyzed: na pacchājāta paccayā ti ettha sahajāta purejāta paccayā saṅgaham gacchanti tasmā

original: sahajātapaccayasadisā ettha pāḷi, sā naadhipatipaccaye vitthāritāti idha saṅkhittā.
analyzed: sahajāta paccaya sadisā ettha sā na adhipati paccaye vitthāritā ati idha saṅkhittā

original: Nāsevanapaccaye kusalākusalā paṭhamajavanavasena veditabbā, tathā kiriyābyākataṃ.
analyzed: na āsevana paccaye kusala akusalā paṭhama javana vasena veditabbā tathā kiriyā abyākatam

original: Pāḷi pana idhāpi naadhipatipaccaye vitthāritavasena veditabbā. Tenevāha – “napacchājātapaccayampi
analyzed: pāḷi pana idha api na adhipati paccaye vitthārita vasena veditabbā tena iva āha na pacchājāta paccayam pi

original: nāsevanapaccayampi nādhipatipaccayasadisa”nti.
analyzed: na āsevana paccayam pi na ādhipati paccaya sadisanti

original: 94-97. Nakammapaccaye vipākacetanā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ labhatīti na gahitā. Nāhārapaccaye ekaccaṃ rūpameva paccayuppannaṃ, tathā naindriyapaccaye.
analyzed: na kamma paccaye vipāka cetanā nānākkhaṇika kamma paccayam labhati iti na gahitā na āhāra paccaye ekaccam rūpam eva paccaya uppannam tathā na aindriya paccaye

original: 98. Najhānapaccaye pañcaviññāṇadhammā ceva ekaccañca rūpaṃ paccayuppannaṃ. Pañcaviññāṇasmiñhi
analyzed: na jhāna paccaye pañca viññāṇa dhammā ca iva ekaccam ca rūpam paccaya uppannam pañca viññāṇasmin hi

original: vedanā ca cittekaggatā ca dubbalattā upanijjhānalakkhaṇaṃ na pāpuṇantīti jhānapaccaye na gahitā.
analyzed: vedanā ca citta ekagga tā ca dubbala ttā upanijjhāna lakkhaṇam na pāpuṇanti iti jhāna paccaye na gahitā

original: 99-102. Namaggapaccaye ahetukavipākakiriyañceva ekaccañca rūpaṃ paccayuppannaṃ. Nasampayuttanonatthinovigatesu rūpameva paccayuppannaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “nārammaṇapaccayasadisa”nti.
analyzed: na magga paccaye ahetuka vipāka kiriyam ca iva ekaccam ca rūpam paccaya uppannam na sampayutta nonatthi no vigatesu rūpam eva paccaya uppannam tena vuttam na ārammaṇa paccaya sadisam ti

original: 103. Nahetuyā dveti ekamūlakagaṇanāya yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.
analyzed: eka mūlaka gaṇanāya yathāpāḷim eva niyyāti

original: 104. Dumūlake nahetupaccayā nārammaṇe ekanti ettha kiñcāpi bahugaṇanena saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanassa
analyzed: du mūlake na hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe ekam ti ettha kiñcā api bahu gaṇanena saddhim ūnatara gaṇanassa

original: saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanavasena nahetuyā viya dvīhi bhavitabbaṃ. Nārammaṇavasena pana
analyzed: saṃsandane ūnatara gaṇana vasena na hetuyā viya dvīhi bhavitabbam na ārammaṇa vasena pana

original: arūpadhammānaṃ parihīnattā abyākataṃ paṭicca rūpābyākatassa uppattiṃ sandhāya “eka”nti
analyzed: arūpa dhammānam parihīna ttā abyākatam paṭicca rūpa abyākatassa uppattim sandhāya ekam ti

original: vuttaṃ. Sabbesu ekakesupi eseva nayo. Dveti vuttaṭṭhāne pana nahetuyā laddhavasena
analyzed: vuttam sabbesu ekakesu pi esā iva nayaḥ dve ti vutta ṭṭhāne pana na hetuyā laddha vasena

original: vāradvayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vāra dvayam veditabbam

original: 105-106. Timūlakādīsu pana sabbesu nārammaṇapaccayassa aparihīnattā ekameva vissajjananti ayaṃ paccanīye nahetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakādīsu gaṇanā.
analyzed: timūlaka ādīsu pana sabbesu na ārammaṇa paccayassa aparihīna ttā ekam eva ayam paccanīye na hetu paccayam ādim katvā ekamūlaka ādīsu gaṇanā

original: 107-130. Nārammaṇapaccayādayo pana ekamūlake tāva purimena sadisattā idhāpi na dassitāyeva.
analyzed: na ārammaṇa paccaya ādayaḥ pana eka mūlake tāva purimena sadisa ttā idha api na dassi tāya eva

original: Nārammaṇapaccayavasena dumūlake nārammaṇapaccayā, nahetuyā ekanti nahetudumūlake
analyzed: na ārammaṇa paccaya vasena dumūlake na ārammaṇa paccayāḥ na hetuyā ekanti na hetu dumūlake

original: vuttameva. Nādhipatiyā pañcāti nārammaṇapaccaye laddhavasena veditabbāti evaṃ sabbasaṃsandanesu
analyzed: vuttam eva na adhipatiyā pañca ati na ārammaṇa paccaye laddha vasena veditabbā ti evam sabba saṃsandanesu

original: ūnataragaṇanasseva paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā. Yattha yattha ca nārammaṇapaccayo
analyzed: ūnatara gaṇanassa iva paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā yattha yattha ca na ārammaṇa paccayo

original: pavisati, tattha tattha rūpameva paccayuppannaṃ. Nānantaranasamanantaranaaññamaññanaupanissayanāhāranaindriyanasampayuttanonatthinovigatapaccayānaṃ
analyzed: pavisati tattha tattha rūpam eva paccaya uppannam

original: paviṭṭhaṭṭhānepi eseva nayo. Nāhāranaindriyanajhānanamaggapaccayā sabbattha sadisavissajjanā.
analyzed: paviṭṭha ṭṭhāne pi esa eva nayaḥ na āhāra na indriya na jhāna na magga paccayā sabbattha sadisa vissajjanā

original: Nasahajātādicatukkaṃ idhāpi parihīnamevāti idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ. Iminā pana lakkhaṇena
analyzed: na sahajāta ādi catukkam idha api parihīnam eva ati idam ettha lakkhaṇam iminā pana lakkhaṇena

original: sabbesu dumūlakādīsu “ayaṃ paccayo mūlaṃ, ayamettha dumūlako, ayaṃ timūlako, ayaṃ
analyzed: sabbesu dumūlaka ādīsu ayam paccayaḥ mūlam ayam ettha dumūlakaḥ ayam timūlakaḥ ayam

original: sabbamūlako”ti sallakkhetvā ūnataragaṇanassa paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbāti.
analyzed: sabbamūlako ti sallakkhetvā ūnatara gaṇanassa paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā ti

original: Paccayapaccanīyavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paccaya paccanīya vaṇṇanā

original: Paccayānulomapaccanīyavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paccaya anuloma paccanīya vaṇṇanā

original: 131-189. Idāni anulomapaccanīye gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ hetupaccayā nārammaṇe pañcātiādi
analyzed: idāni anuloma paccanīye gaṇanam dassetum hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe pañca ati ādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Tattha hetādhipatimaggapaccayesu anulomato ṭhitesu sahajātādayo cattāro
analyzed: āraddham tattha hetu adhipati magga paccayesu anulomataḥ ṭhitesu sahajāta ādayo cattāro

original: sabbaṭṭhānikapaccayā, āhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayā cattāroti ime aṭṭha paccanīyato
analyzed: sabbaṭṭhānika paccayāḥ āhāra indriya jhāna magga paccayāḥ cattāro ti ime aṭṭha paccanīyato

original: na labbhanti. Hetupaccayādivasena hi uppajjamāno dhammo ime aṭṭha paccaye alabhanto
analyzed: na labbhanti hetu paccaya ādi vasena hi uppajjamānaḥ dhammo ime aṭṭha paccaye a labhantaḥ

original: nāma natthi. Ārammaṇaanantarasamanantaraupanissayasampayuttanatthivigatapaccayesu
analyzed: nāma natthi ārammaṇa anantara samanantara upanissaya sampayutta natthi vigata paccayesu

original: pana anulomato ṭhitesu arūpaṭṭhānikā paccanīkato na labbhanti. Na hi ārammaṇapaccayādīhi
analyzed: pana anulomataḥ ṭhitesu arūpa ṭṭhānikā paccanīkato na labbhanti na hi ārammaṇa paccaya ādīhi

original: uppajjamānā anantarasamanantarapaccayādayo na labhanti. Sahajātaaññamaññanissayakammāhārindriyaatthiavigatapaccayesu
analyzed: uppajjamānāḥ anantara samanantara paccaya ādayaḥ na labhanti sahajāta aññamañña nissaya kamma āhāra indriya atthi avigata paccayesu

original: pana anulomato ṭhitesu cattāro sabbaṭṭhānikāyeva, paccanīkato na labbhanti. Etesañhi
analyzed: pana anulomataḥ ṭhitesu cattāro sabba ṭṭhānikāya iva paccanīkato na labbhanti etesam hi

original: paccayānaṃ vasena uppajjamāno sabbaṭṭhānike alabhanto nāma natthi. Pacchājātapaccayassa
analyzed: paccayānam vasena uppajjamāno sabba ṭṭhānike a labhantaḥ nāma natthi pacchājāta paccayassa

original: anulomato ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃ sesesu anulomato ṭhitesu ye ca labbhanti, ye ca
analyzed: anulomataḥ ṭhānam nāma natthi evam sesesu anulomataḥ ṭhitesu ye ca labbhanti ye ca

original: na labbhanti, te sallakkhetvā sabbesupi dumūlakādīsu nayesu tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayānaṃ
analyzed: na labbhanti te sallakkhetvā sabbesu pi dumūlaka ādīsu nayesu tesam tesam paccayānam

original: saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā veditabbāti.
analyzed: saṃsandane ūnatara gaṇanā anaṃyā iva vasena gaṇanā veditabbā ati

original: Paccayānulomapaccanīyavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paccaya anuloma paccanīya vaṇṇanā

original: Paccayapaccanīyānulomavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paccaya paccanīya anuloma vaṇṇanā

original: 190. Idāni paccanīyānulome gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dvetiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni paccanīya anulome gaṇanam dassetum na hetu paccayāḥ ārammaṇe dve iti ādi āraddham

original: Tattha hetumhi paccanīkato ṭhite ṭhapetvā adhipatiṃ avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
analyzed: tattha hetumhi paccanīkataḥ ṭhite ṭhapetvā adhipatim avasesāḥ anulomataḥ labbhanti

original: Pacchājāto pana anulomato sabbattheva na labbhati, ye nava paccayā “arūpānaññevā”ti
analyzed: pacchājātaḥ pana anulomato sabbattha iva na labbhati ye nava paccayāḥ arūpa anañña eva āti

original: vuttā, tesu purejātañca āsevanañca ṭhapetvā avasesesu sattasu paccanīkato ṭhitesu
analyzed: vuttā tesu purejātañca āsevanañca ṭhapetvā avasesesu sattasu paccanīkato ṭhitesu

original: sesā arūpaṭṭhānikā anulomato na labbhanti. Yo hi ārammaṇādīhi nuppajjati, na so anantarādayo
analyzed: sesāḥ arūpa ṭṭhānikāḥ anulomataḥ na labbhanti yaḥ hi ārammaṇa ādīhi na uppajjati na saḥ anantara ādayo

original: labhati. Paṭisandhivipāko pana purejātato, sabbavipāko ca saddhiṃ kiriyamanodhātuyā

original: 253-254. Adhipatipaccaye vipākābyākataṃ lokuttarameva veditabbaṃ. Anantarasamanantarā rūpābhāvena ārammaṇasadisā. Parato āsevananatthivigatesupi eseva nayo.

original: 255. Sahajātapaccaye kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpanti upādārūpasaṅkhātaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. Idaṃ asaññasattānaññeva rūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cakkhāyatanādīni pañcavokāravasena vuttāni.
analyzed: sahajāta paccaye kaṭattā rūpam upādā rūpan ti upādā rūpa saṅkhātam kaṭattā rūpam idam asañña sattā anaññā iva rūpam sandhāya vuttam cakkha āyatana ādīni pañca vokāra vasena vuttāni

original: 256-257. Aññamaññapaccaye ca yathā ārammaṇapaccayā evanti vissajjanasamataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paccayuppannesu pana nānattaṃ atthi.
analyzed: aññamañña paccaye ca yathā ārammaṇa paccayāḥ evanti vissajjana samatam sandhāya vuttam paccaya uppannesu pana nānattam atthi

original: 258. Upanissayapaccaye ārammaṇapaccayasadisanti rūpābhāvatopi vissajjanasamatāyapi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: upanissaya paccaye ārammaṇa paccaya sadisanti rūpa abhāvataḥ api vissajjana sama tāya api vuttam

original: 259-260. Vatthuṃ purejātapaccayātiādīnaṃ paṭiccavāre vuttanayenevattho gahetabbo.
analyzed: vatthum purejāta paccaya ati ādīnam paṭiccavāre vutta nayena iva atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ

original: 261-266. Kammapaccaye tīṇīti kusalaṃ paccayā kusalo abyākato kusalābyākato cāti evaṃ tīṇi veditabbāni. Akusalepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: kamma paccaye tīṇi iti kusalam paccayā kusalaḥ abyākato kusala abyākato ca ati evam tīṇi veditabbāni akusale pi esa eva nayo

original: 267-268. Vippayuttapaccaye khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti khandhe nissāya vippayuttapaccayā
analyzed: vippayutta paccaye khandhe vippayutta paccayā ati khandhe nissāya vippayutta paccayā

analyzed: uppajjanti iti attho sesam heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 269-276. Idāni yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā sattarasātiādimāha.

original: katvā uppajjatīti attho. Na kevalañca tadārammaṇavaseneva, paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasenāpi.
analyzed: katvā uppajjati iti atthaḥ na kevalam ca tad ārammaṇa vasena iva paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena api

original: Vipāko hi kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā gahitapaṭisandhikassa kusalārammaṇo hotiyeva, so
analyzed: vipākaḥ hi kammam ārammaṇam katvā gahita paṭisandhikassa kusala ārammaṇaḥ so

original: pana dubbiññeyyattā idha na dassito.
analyzed: pana dubbiññeyya ttā idha na dassito

original: Kusalaṃ assādetītiādi akusalajavanāvasāne kusalārammaṇavipākaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Viññāṇañcāyatanavipākassāti
analyzed: kusalam assādeti itiādi akusala javana avasāne kusala ārammaṇa vipākam dassetum vuttam viññāṇañca āyatana vipākassa ati

original: idaṃ dubbiññeyyampi samānaṃ mahaggatavipākassa tadārammaṇabhāvena anuppattito labbhamānakavasena
analyzed: idam dubbiññeyyam pi samānam mahaggata vipākassa tad ārammaṇa bhāvena anuppattitaḥ labbhamānaka vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Kiriyassāti arahattaṃ patvā asamāpannapubbe ākāsānañcāyatane paṭilomato vā
analyzed: vuttam kiriyassa ati arahattam patvā a samāpanna pubbe ākāsānañcāyatane paṭilomataḥ vā

original: ekantarikavasena vā samāpannakiriyāya. Cetopariyañāṇassātiādīni parato āvajjanāya
analyzed: ekantarika vasena vā samāpanna kiriyāya cetaḥ pariya ñāṇassa ati ādīni paratas āvajjanāya

original: yojetabbāni. Yā etesaṃ āvajjanā, tassā kusalā khandhā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti ayañhettha attho.
analyzed: yojetabbāni yā etesam āvajjanā tassā kusalā khandhāḥ ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ti ayam ha ittha attho

original: 407-409. Rāganti attano vā parassa vā rāgaṃ. Attano rāgavasena panettha vaṇṇanā pākaṭā
analyzed: rāgam ti attanaḥ vā parassa vā rāgam attanaḥ rāga vasena pana ittha vaṇṇanā pākaṭā

original: hoti. Assādetītiādīni vuttatthāneva. Vicikicchādīsu pana tīsu assādetabbatāya abhāvena
analyzed: hoti assādeti itiādīni vutta tthāni eva vicikicchā ādīsu pana tīsu assādetabba tāya abhāvena

original: “assādetī”ti na vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhi panettha uppajjati, sā assādetīti padassa parihīnattā
analyzed: assādeti iti na vuttam diṭṭhi pana ittha uppajjati sā assādeti iti padassa parihīna ttā

original: āgatapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ na vuttā. Vicikicchādīsuyeva taṃ taṃ sabhāgaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā
analyzed: āgata paṭipāṭiyā paṭhamam na vuttā tam tam sa bhāgam paṭhamam vatvā

original: tassa tassa anantarā vuttā. Imesu ca pana rāgādīsu “kiṃ me pāpadhammā uppajjantī”ti
analyzed: tassa tassa anantarā vuttā imesu ca pana rāga ādīsu kim me pāpa dhammā uppajjanti iti

original: akkhantivasena vā, “kataṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ luddha”nti vippaṭisārādivasena vā domanassuppatti veditabbā.
analyzed: akkhanti vasena vā katam pāpam katam vippaṭisāra ādi vasena vā domanassa uppatti veditabbā

original: 410. Cakkhuṃ aniccatoti vipassanānukkamena oḷārikāyatanāni vatthurūpañcāti ekādasa
analyzed: cakkhum aniccato ti vipassanā anukkamena oḷārika āyatanāni vatthu rūpañca ati ekādasa

original: rūpāni pākaṭattā gahitāni. Puna rūpāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇattā gahitāni.
analyzed: rūpāni pākaṭa ttā gahitāni puna rūpa āyatana ādīni cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam ārammaṇa ttā gahitāni

original: Yasmā panesā viññāṇakāyavasena desanā, na dhātuvasena, tasmā manodhātu na gahitā.
analyzed: yasmā pana isā viññāṇa kāya vasena desanā na dhātu vasena tasmā manaḥ dhātu na gahitā

original: Evaṃ sabbattha gahitāgahitaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam sabbattha gahita a gahitam veditabbam

original: 411. Phalaṃ paccavekkhanti nibbānaṃ paccavekkhantīti paccavekkhaṇakusalassa ārammaṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: phalam paccavekkhanti nibbānam paccavekkhanti iti paccavekkhaṇa kusalassa ārammaṇa dassana tham vuttam

original: 413-416. Ārammaṇādhipatiniddese sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ vasena catubhūmakakusalaṃ dassitaṃ,
analyzed: ārammaṇa adhipati niddese sekkha puthujjanānam vasena catu bhūmaka kusalam dassitam

original: tathā sahajātādhipatiniddese. Arahato uttamadhammaṃ adhigatattā lokiyakusalesu garukāro
analyzed: tathā sahajāta adhipati niddese arahataḥ uttama dhammaṃ adhigata ttā lokiya kusalesu garukāro

original: natthīti aggamaggova dassito.
analyzed: natthi iti aggamaggaḥ uva dassitaḥ

original: 417. Anantarapaccaye purimā purimāti ekabhūmakāpi nānābhūmakāpi kusalā ekato katvā
analyzed: anantara paccaye purimā purimā ati eka bhūmakā api nānā bhūmakā api kusalā ekatas katvā

original: vuttā. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassāti nānārammaṇavasena. Gotrabhu maggassa,
analyzed: vuttā anulomam gotrabhussa anulomam vodānassa ati nānā ārammaṇa vasena gotrabhu maggassa

original: vodānaṃ maggassāti nānābhūmivasena. Kusalaṃ vuṭṭhānassāti ettha pana kusalanti tebhūmakakusalaṃ.
analyzed: vodānam maggassa ati nānā bhūmi vasena kusalam vuṭṭhānassa ati ettha pana kusalanti tebhūmaka kusalam

original: Vuṭṭhānanti tebhūmakavipākaṃ. Tehi kusalajavanavīthito vuṭṭhahanti, tasmā vuṭṭhānanti
analyzed: vuṭṭhānanti tebhūmaka vipākam tehi kusala javana vīthitaḥ vuṭṭhahanti tasmai vuṭṭhānanti

original: vuccati. Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – tadārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgañca. Tattha kāmāvacarakusalassa
analyzed: vuccati tam duvidham hoti tad ārammaṇam bhavaṅgam ca tattha kāmāvacara kusalassa

original: ubhayampi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, mahaggatassa bhavaṅgameva. Maggo phalassāti idaṃ yasmā
analyzed: ubhayam pi vuṭṭhānam hoti mahaggatassa bhavaṅgama eva maggo phalassa ati idam yasmā

original: lokuttaravipākaṃ javanavīthipariyāpannattā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā visuṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: lokuttara vipākam javana vīthi pariyāpanna ttā vuṭṭhānam nāma na hoti tasmā visum vuttam

original: Anulomaṃ sekkhāyāti asekkhāya kusalaṃ anantaraṃ na hoti, tasmā vibhāgaṃ karoti. Phalasamāpattiyāti
analyzed: anulomam sekkhāya ati asekkhāya kusalam anantaram na hoti tasmai vibhāgam karoti phala samāpattiyā iti

original: sotāpattiphalasakadāgāmiphalaanāgāmiphalasamāpattiyāpi. Phalasamāpattiyāti anāgāmiphalasamāpattiyā.
analyzed: sa utāpatti phala sakadāgāmi phala anāgāmi phala samāpattiyā api phala samāpattiyā ati anāgāmi phala samāpattiyā

original: Akusale duvidhampi vuṭṭhānaṃ labbhati. Vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatāti ettha vipākābyākatā
analyzed: akusale duvidham pi vuṭṭhānam labbhati vipāka abyākatā kiriyā abyākatā ati ettha vipāka abyākatā

original: vipākābyākatānaṃyeva, kiriyābyākatā kiriyābyākatānaṃyeva veditabbā. Bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāyātiādi
analyzed: vipāka abyākatānam iva kiriyā abyākatā kiriyā abyākatānam iva veditabbā bhavaṅgam āvajjanāya atiādi

original: vomissakavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha kiriyāti kāmāvacarakiriyā. Sā duvidhassāpi vuṭṭhānassa
analyzed: vomissaka vasena vuttam tattha kiriyā ti kāmāvacara kiriyā sā duvidhassa api vuṭṭhānassa

original: anantarapaccayo hoti, mahaggatā bhavaṅgasseva. Iti ye heṭṭhā paccayavibhaṅganiddese
analyzed: anantara paccayaḥ hoti mahaggatā bhavaṅgassa iva iti ye heṭṭhā paccaya vibhaṅga niddese

original: “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena
analyzed: purimāḥ purimāḥ kusalāḥ dhammāḥ pacchimānam pacchimānam kusalānam dhammānam anantara paccayena

original: paccayo”ti ārabhitvā kusalaṃ kusalassa, kusalaṃ abyākatassa, akusalaṃ akusalassa,
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti ārabhitvā kusalam kusalassa kusalam abyākatassa akusalam akusalassa

original: akusalaṃ abyākatassa, abyākataṃ abyākatassa, abyākataṃ kusalassa, abyākataṃ akusalassāti
analyzed: akusalam abyākatassa abyākatam abyākatassa abyākatam kusalassa abyākatam akusalassa ati

original: satta vārā dassitā; tesaṃ vasena idha saṅkhepato anantarapaccayo vibhatto.
analyzed: satta vārāḥ dassitā tesam vasena idha saṅkhepataḥ anantara paccayaḥ vibhatto

original: Vitthārato panettha –
analyzed: vitthārataḥ pana ittha

original: Dasadhā sattarasadhā, samasaṭṭhividhena ca;
analyzed: dasadhā sattarasadhā sama saṭṭhi vidhena ca

original: Bahudhāpi ca niddesaṃ, sādhukaṃ upalakkhaye.
analyzed: bahudhā api ca niddesam sādhukam upalakkhaye

original: Ayañhi anantarapaccayo na kevalaṃ sattadhāva niddesaṃ labhati, kusalaṃ pana kusalassa
analyzed: ayam hi anantara paccayaḥ na kevalam sattadhā ava niddesam labhati kusalam pana kusalassa

original: vipākassa; akusalaṃ akusalassa vipākassa; vipākaṃ vipākassa kiriyassa; kiriyaṃ kusalassa
analyzed: vipākassa akusalam akusalassa vipākassa vipākam vipākassa kiriyassa kiriyam kusalassa

original: akusalassa vipākassa kiriyassāti evaṃ dasadhāpi niddesaṃ labhati. Na kevalaṃ dasadhāyeva,
analyzed: akusalassa vipākassa kiriyassa ati evam dasadhā api niddesam labhati na kevalam dasadhā yā iva

original: kusalaṃ pana kusalassa kusalavipākassa akusalavipākassa; akusalaṃ akusalassa akusalavipākassa
analyzed: kusalam pana kusalassa kusala vipākassa akusala vipākassa akusalam akusala vipākassa

original: kusalavipākassa; kusalavipākaṃ kusalavipākassa akusalavipākassa kiriyassa; akusalavipākaṃ
analyzed: kusala vipākassa kusala vipākam kusala vipākassa akusala vipākassa kiriyassa akusala vipākam

original: akusalavipākassa kusalavipākassa kiriyassa; kiriyaṃ kiriyassa kusalassa akusalassa
analyzed: akusala vipākassa kusala vipākassa kiriyassa kiriyam kiriyassa kusalassa akusalassa

original: kusalavipākassa akusalavipākassāti evaṃ sattarasadhā niddesaṃ labhati.
analyzed: kusala vipākassa akusala vipākassa ati evam sattarasadhā niddesam labhati

original: Na kevalañca sattarasadhāva samasaṭṭhividhenāpi niddesaṃ labhateva. Kathaṃ? Kāmāvacarakusalañhi
analyzed: na kevalam ca niddesam labhatā iva katham kāmāvacara kusalam hi

original: bhūmibhedena catubbidhassa kusalassa anantarapaccayo hoti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ
analyzed: bhūmi bhedena catubbidhassa kusalassa anantara paccayaḥ hoti rūpāvacara arūpāvacaram

original: sakasakabhūmikassevāti kusalaṃ kusalassa chabbidhena anantarapaccayo. Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
analyzed: sakasaka bhūmikassa iva ati kusalam kusalassa chabbidhena anantara paccayo kāmāvacara kusalam

original: pana kāmāvacarakusalavipākassa akusalavipākassa rūpāvacaravipākassa arūpāvacaravipākassa
analyzed: pana kāmāvacara kusala vipākassa akusala vipākassa rūpāvacara vipākassa arūpāvacara vipākassa

original: lokuttaravipākassa; rūpāvacarakusalaṃ rūpāvacaravipākassa kāmāvacarakusalavipākassa;

original: arūpāvacarakusalaṃ kāmāvacarakusalavipākassa rūpāvacaraarūpāvacaralokuttaravipākassa;
analyzed: arūpāvacara kusalam kāmāvacara kusala vipākassa rūpāvacara arūpāvacara lokuttara vipākassa

original: lokuttarakusalaṃ lokuttaravipākassāti kusalaṃ vipākassa dvādasavidhena anantarapaccayo.
analyzed: lokuttara kusalam lokuttara vipākassa ati kusalam vipākassa dvādasavidhena anantara paccayo

original: Akusalaṃ akusalassa akusalavipākassa tebhūmakakusalavipākassāti pañcavidhena anantarapaccayo.
analyzed: akusalam akusalassa akusala vipākassa tebhūmaka kusala vipākassa ati pañcavidhena anantara paccayo

original: Kāmāvacarakusalavipākaṃ kāmāvacarakusalavipākassa akusalavipākassa rūpāvacaravipākassa
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusala vipākam kāmāvacara kusala vipākassa akusala vipākassa rūpāvacara vipākassa

original: Rūpāvacaravipākaṃ tebhūmakakusalavipākassāti tividhena anantarapaccayo. Arūpāvacaravipākaṃ
analyzed: rūpāvacara vipākam tebhūmaka kusala vipākassa ati tividhena anantara paccayaḥ arūpāvacara vipākam

original: arūpāvacaravipākassa kāmāvacarakusalavipākassāti duvidhena anantarapaccayo. Lokuttaravipākaṃ

original: catubhūmakakusalavipākassāti catubbidhena anantarapaccayo. Evaṃ kusalavipākaṃ vipākassa

original: terasadhāpi anantarapaccayo. Akusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākassa kāmāvacarakusalavipākassāti
analyzed: terasadhā api anantara paccayaḥ akusala vipākam akusala vipākassa kāmāvacara kusala vipākassa ati

original: duvidhena anantarapaccayo. Evaṃ sabbathāpi vipākaṃ vipākassa pañcadasavidhena anantarapaccayo.
analyzed: duvidhena anantara paccayaḥ evam sabbathā api vipākam vipākassa pañcadasavidhena anantara paccayaḥ

original: Kāmāvacarakusalavipākaṃ pana kāmāvacarakiriyassa, tathā akusalavipākaṃ, tathā rūpāvacaravipākaṃ,

original: tathā arūpāvacaravipākañcāti vipākaṃ kiriyassa ca catubbidhena anantarapaccayo.
analyzed: tathā arūpa avacara vipākam ca ati vipākam kiriyassa ca catubbidhena anantara paccayo

original: Kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ tebhūmakakiriyassa, rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarānaññevāti
analyzed: kāmāvacara kiriyam tebhūmaka kiriyassa rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kiriyam rūpāvacara arūpāvacara anañña eva ati

original: kiriyaṃ kiriyassa pañcavidhena anantarapaccayo. Kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ akusalavipākassa
analyzed: kiriyam kiriyassa pañcavidhena anantara paccayaḥ kāmāvacara kiriyam akusala vipākassa

original: ceva catubhūmakakusalavipākassa ca, rūpāvacarakiriyaṃ kāmāvacarakusalavipākarūpāvacaravipākānaṃ
analyzed: ca iva catu bhūmaka kusala vipākassa ca rūpāvacara kiriyam kāmāvacara kusala vipāka rūpāvacara vipākānam

original: arūpāvacarakiriyaṃ catubhūmakakusalavipākassāpīti kiriyaṃ vipākassa ekādasavidhena
analyzed: arūpāvacara kiriyam catu bhūmaka kusala vipākassa api iti kiriyam vipākassa ekādasavidhena

original: anantarapaccayo. Kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ pana kāmāvacarakusalassa akusalassāti kusalākusalānaṃ
analyzed: anantara paccayaḥ kāmāvacara kiriyam pana kāmāvacara kusalassa akusalassa ati kusala akusalānam

original: duvidhena anantarapaccayo hoti. Evaṃ samasaṭṭhividhenāpi niddesaṃ labhati.
analyzed: duvidhena anantara paccayaḥ hoti evam niddesam labhati

original: Na kevalañca samasaṭṭhividheneva, bahuvidhenāpi labhateva. Kathaṃ? Kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittaṃ
analyzed: na kevalam ca sama saṭṭhividhena iva bahuvidhena api labhatā iva katham kāmāvacara paṭhama mahā kusala cittam

original: tāva attano, catunnañca rūpāvacarakusalānaṃ pādakayogena soḷasannaṃ somanassalokuttarānanti
analyzed: catunnam ca rūpāvacara kusalānam pādaka yogena soḷasannam somanassa lokuttarānam

original: ekavīsatiyā ca kusalānaṃ, javanapariyosāne tadārammaṇabhavaṅgavasena uppajjamānānaṃ
analyzed: ekavīsatiyā ca kusalānam javana pariyosāne tad ārammaṇa bhavaṅga vasena uppajjamānānam

original: ekādasannaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ, bhavaṅgavaseneva pavattānaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākānaṃ,
analyzed: kāmāvacara vipākānam bhavaṅga vasena iva rūpāvacara arūpāvacara vipākānam

original: phalasamāpattivasena pavattānaṃ dvādasannaṃ lokuttaravipākānanti evaṃ ekavīsatiyā
analyzed: phala samāpatti vasena evam ekavīsatiyā

original: kusalānaṃ; dvattiṃsāya vipākānanti tepaññāsāya cittānaṃ anantarapaccayo hoti. Tathā
analyzed: kusalānam dvattiṃsāya vipākānam ti tepaññāsāya cittānam anantara paccayaḥ hoti tathā

original: dutiyakusalacittaṃ. Tatiyacatutthāni pana ṭhapetvā uparibhūmakakusalāni ca lokuttaravipākāni
analyzed: dutiya kusala cittam tatiya catutthāni pana ṭhapetvā upari bhūmaka kusalāni ca lokuttara vipākāni

original: ca sesaekavīsaticittānaṃ. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni attano ca, navannañca uparibhūmakaupekkhākusalānaṃ,
analyzed: ca sesa ekavīsati cittānam pañcama chaṭṭhāni ca navannam ca upari bhūmaka aupekkhā kusalānam

original: tevīsatiyā ca vipākānanti tettiṃsāya. Sattamaaṭṭhamāni ekavīsatiyāva.
analyzed: tevīsatiyā ca tettiṃsāya sattama aṭṭhamāni ekavīsatiyā ava

original: Pañca rūpāvacarakusalāni attano attano pacchimānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalānaṃ, catunnampi
analyzed: pañca rūpāvacara kusalāni attano attano pacchimānam rūpāvacara kusalānam catunnam pi

original: ñāṇasampayuttamahāvipākānaṃ, pañcannaṃ rūpāvacaravipākānañcāti dasannaṃ. Eteneva
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayutta mahā vipākānam pañcannam rūpāvacara vipākānam ca ati dasannam etena iva

original: ca nayena arūpāvacarakusalesu paṭhamaṃ attano vipākena saddhiṃ ekādasannaṃ, dutiyaṃ

original: dvādasannaṃ, tatiyaṃ terasannaṃ, catutthaṃ cuddasannaṃ phalasamāpattiyā cāti pannarasannaṃ
analyzed: dvādasannam tatiyam terasannam catuttham phala samāpattiyā ca ati pannarasannam

original: lokuttarakusalaṃ attano attano vipākasseva. Aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesu ekekaṃ akusalaṃ
analyzed: lokuttara kusalam attanaḥ attanaḥ vipākassa iva aṭṭhasu lobha sahagatesu ekekam akusalam

original: ekādasannaṃ kāmāvacaravipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ navannaṃ, mahaggatavipākānaṃ attano
analyzed: kāmāvacara vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam navannam mahaggata vipākānam attano

original: attano pacchimassa cāti ekavīsatiyā. Dve domanassasahagatāni upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ pacchimassa ca ati ekavīsatiyā dve domanassa sahagatāni upekkhā sahagatānam channam

original: kāmāvacaravipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti sattannaṃ. Vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ

original: somanassasahagatāhetukavipākena saddhiṃ ekādasannaṃ kāmāvacaravipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ

original: navannaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākānaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti ekavīsatiyā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara vipākānam attano pacchimassa ca ati ekavīsatiyā

original: Kusalavipākapañcaviññāṇā kusalavipākamanodhātuyā, manodhātu dvinnaṃ vipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ.
analyzed: kusala vipāka pañca viññāṇā kusala vipāka manaḥ dhātuyāḥ manaḥ dhātu dvinnam vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam

original: Tāsu dvīsu somanassasahagatā dasannaṃ vipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ bhavaṅgabhūtānaṃ

original: tadārammaṇakāle attano pacchimassa voṭṭhabbanakiriyassa cāti dvādasannaṃ. Upekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa kāle attano pacchimassa voṭṭhabbana kiriyassa ca ati dvādasannam upekkhā sahagata ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: pana āvajjanamanodhātuyā dviṭṭhānikāya āvajjanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā dasannañca vipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnanti

original: dvādasannameva. Tihetukamahāvipākā somanassasahagatāhetukavajjānaṃ dasannampi kāmāvacaravipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ
analyzed: dvādasannam eva ti hetuka mahā vipākā somanassa sahagatā ahetuka vajjānam dasannam pi kāmāvacara vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam

original: rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākānaṃ āvajjanadvayassa cāti ekavīsatiyā, duhetukavipākā ṭhapetvā
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara vipākānaṃ āvajjana dvayassa ca ati ekavīsatiyāḥ du hetuka vipākā ṭhapetvā

analyzed: āvajjana dvayassa ca ati ekūnavīsatiyāḥ arūpāvacara vipākesu paṭhamam kāmāvacara kusala vipāka ti hetuka paṭisandhi cittānam

original: tīṇi heṭṭhimāni vajjetvā channaṃ cattāri lokuttaravipākāni tihetukavipākānaṃ terasannaṃ

original: attano attano pacchimassa cāti cuddasannaṃ.
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ pacchimassa

original: Akusalavipākapañcaviññāṇā akusalavipākamanodhātuyā, manodhātu akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā.

original: Sā tadārammaṇakāle attano pacchimassa cutikāle paṭisandhivasena bhavaṅgavasena ca

original: Kāmāvacaratihetukasomanassasahagatakiriyadvayaṃ bhavaṅgavasena pavattānaṃ terasannaṃ

original: hoti. Evaṃ bahuvidhenāpi niddesaṃ labhati. Tena vuttaṃ –

analyzed: samanantara paccaya ādayaḥ uttāna tthāya eva

analyzed: pavattā iti tasmā saddham upanissāya iti vuttam

original: Maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattinti tena tena maggena sithilīkatapāripanthakattā
