original: Kāyikaṃ sukhantiādīsu sukhe uppanne taṃ assādetvā punappunaṃ tathārūpeheva paccayehi
analyzed: kāyikam sukham ti ādīsu sukhe uppanne tam assādetvā punappunam tathārūpehi iva paccayehi

original: taṃ uppādentassa purimaṃ pacchimassa upanissayo hoti. Sītādīsu pana aggisantāpanādīni
analyzed: tam uppādentassa purimam pacchimassa upanissayaḥ hoti sītā ādīsu pana aggi santāpana ādīni

original: atisevantassa pubbabhāge sukhaṃ aparabhāge dukkhassa, “sukho vati missā paribbājikāya
analyzed: atisevantassa pubba bhāge sukham apara bhāge dukkhassa sukhaḥ vati missā paribbājikāya

original: taruṇāya lomasāya bāhāya samphasso”ti kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantassa idha kāyikaṃ
analyzed: taruṇāya lomasāya bāhāya samphassoti kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjantassa idha kāyikam

original: sukhaṃ nerayikassa kāyikadukkhassa, arogabhāvena pana sukhino phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantassa
analyzed: sukham nerayikassa kāyika dukkhassa aroga bhāvena pana sukhinaḥ phala samāpattim samāpajjantassa

original: kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayo hoti. Dukkhapaṭighātāya pana sukhaṃ
analyzed: kāyikam sukham phala samāpattiyā upanissaya paccayaḥ hoti dukkha paṭighātāya pana sukham

original: sevantassa dukkhapaṭighātāya ca bhagavato viya ābādhaṃ vikkhambhetvā phalasamāpattiṃ
analyzed: sevantassa dukkha paṭighātāya ca bhagavataḥ viyas ābādham vikkhambhetvā phala samāpattim

original: samāpajjantassa kāyikadukkhaṃ kāyikasukhassa ceva phalasamāpattiyā ca, upanissayapaccayo
analyzed: samāpajjantassa kāyika dukkham kāyika sukhassa ca iva phala samāpattiyāḥ ca upanissaya paccayo

original: hoti. Utusappāyo sukhassa ceva phalasamāpattiyā ca, asappāyo dukkhassa. Utuasappāyaṃ
analyzed: hoti utu sappāyaḥ sukhassa ca iva phala samāpattiyā ca asappāyaḥ dukkhassa utu asappāyam

original: vā abhibhavitvā samāpattisamuṭṭhitarūpavasena uppannaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavitukāmassa asappāyopi
analyzed: vā abhibhavitvā samāpatti samuṭṭhita rūpa vasena uppannam sukham anubhavitu kāmassa asappāyaḥ api

original: utu phalasamāpattiyā paccayova. Bhojanasenāsanesupi eseva nayo. Puna kāyikaṃ sukhantiādīni
analyzed: phala samāpattiyā paccayaḥ uva bhojana senāsanesu pi esa iva nayo puna kāyikam sukham ti ādīni

original: kevalaṃ ekato dassitāni. Heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva panesaṃ paccayabhāvo veditabbo. Phalasamāpatti
analyzed: kevalam ekatas dassitāni heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva pana esam paccaya bhāvaḥ veditabbo phala samāpatti

original: kāyikassa sukhassāti samāpattisamuṭṭhānarūpavasena uppannassa sukhassa. Taṃ hesa
analyzed: kāyikassa sukhassa ati samāpatti samuṭṭhāna rūpa vasena uppannassa sukhassa tam ha āsa

original: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya anubhavati.
analyzed: samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhāya anubhavati

original: Kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya dānantiādīsu “aho vata me idaṃ sukhaṃ na parihāyeyyā”ti
analyzed: kāyikam sukham upanissāya dāna nti ādīsu aho vata me idam sukham na parihāyeyya ati

original: pattassa vā aparihāyanavasena; “aho vatāhaṃ āyatiṃ evarūpaṃ sukhaṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti
analyzed: pattassa vā a parihāyana vasena aho vata aham āyatim evarūpam sukham pāpuṇeyyanti

original: appattassa vā pattivasena; dukkhepi “aho vata me dukkhaṃ parihāyeyyā”ti pattassa
analyzed: appattassa vā patti vasena dukkhe pi aho vata me dukkham parihāyeyya ati pattassa

original: parihāyanavasena vā; “āyatiṃ evarūpaṃ nuppajjeyyā”ti anuppādapatthanāvasena vā sukhadukkhānaṃ
analyzed: parihāyana vasena vā āyatim evarūpam na uppajjeyyāti anuppāda patthanā vasena vā sukha dukkhānam

original: upanissayatā veditabbā. Utubhojanasenāsanāni vuttanayāneva. Puna kāyikaṃ sukhantiādīsu
analyzed: upanissaya tā veditabbā utu bhojana senāsanāni vutta nayānā eva puna kāyikam sukham ti ādīsu

original: yasmā “sādhu kho, mārisa, moggallāna, buddhasaraṇagamanaṃ hotī”ti sukhappattānampi,
analyzed: sādhu kho mārisa moggallāna buddha saraṇa gamanam hoti iti sukha ppattānam pi

original: “sammāsambuddho vata, so bhagavā, yo evarūpassa dukkhassa pariññāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ vata saḥ bhagavā yaḥ evarūpassa dukkhassa pariññāya dhammaṃ deseti iti

original: dukkhappattānampi saddhā uppajjati. Sukhadukkhehi ca saṃyogaviyogatthāya sīlādiparipūraṇaṃ
analyzed: dukkha ppattānam pi saddhā uppajjati sukha dukkhehi ca saṃyoga viyoga tthāya sīla ādi paripūraṇam

original: kareyya, tasmā sukhadukkhāni saddhādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvena dassitāni. Utuādīnipi
analyzed: kareyya tasmā sukha dukkhāni saddhā ādīnam upanissaya bhāvena dassitāni utu ādīni pi

original: yathāyogaṃ yojetabbāni. Kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanatītiādīsupi vuttanayānusāreneva
analyzed: yathāyogam yojetabbāni kāyikam sukham upanissāya pāṇam hanati iti ādīsu pi vutta naya anusārena eva

original: sukhādīnaṃ upanissayatā veditabbā.
analyzed: sukha ādīnam upanissaya tā veditabbā

original: Imasmiṃ pana upanissayabhājanīye kusalo kusalassa tividhenāpi upanissayo, akusalassa
analyzed: imasmin pana upanissaya bhājanīye kusalaḥ kusalassa tividhena api upanissayaḥ akusalassa

original: duvidhena, abyākatassa tividhena. Akusalo akusalassa tividhena, kusalassa ekavidhena,
analyzed: duvidhena abyākatassa tividhena akusalaḥ akusalassa tividhena kusalassa ekavidhena

original: abyākatassa duvidhena. Abyākatopi abyākatassa tividhena, tathā kusalassa, tathā akusalassāti.
analyzed: abyākatassa duvidhena abyākataḥ api abyākatassa tividhena tathā kusalassa tathā akusalassa ati

original: Evaṃ kusalo aṭṭhavidhena, akusalo chabbidhena, abyākato navavidhenāti tevīsatividhena
analyzed: evam kusalaḥ aṭṭhavidhena akusalaḥ chabbidhena abyākataḥ navavidhena ati tevīsatividhena

original: upanissayo bhājitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: upanissayaḥ bhājito ti veditabbo

original: 424. Purejāte cakkhādīni oḷārikavasena vuttāni. Āpodhātuādīnipi pana purejātārammaṇāni
analyzed: purejāte cakkha ādīni oḷārika vasena vuttāni āpodhātu ādīni pi pana purejāta ārammaṇāni

original: hontiyeva. Vatthu purejātaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādi yaṃ vatthu hutvā purejātaṃ hoti, taṃ
analyzed: vatthu purejātam cakkha āyatana ntiādi yam vatthu hutvā purejātam hoti tam

original: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Vatthu vipākābyākatānanti pavattiyaṃ purejātapaccayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum vuttam vatthu vipāka abyākatānam ti pavattiyam purejāta paccayam sandhāya vuttam

original: 425. Pacchājāte imassa kāyassāti cātumahābhūtikakāyassa. Pacchājātapaccayena paccayoti
analyzed: pacchājāte imassa kāyassa ati cātumahābhūtika kāyassa pacchājāta paccayena paccayo ti

original: upatthambhanavasena pacchājāto hutvā paccayo. Upatthambhakaṭṭhena paccayattāyeva
analyzed: upatthambhana vasena pacchājātaḥ hutvā paccayaḥ upatthambhaka ṭṭhena paccaya ttāya iva

original: hesa pacchājātapaccayoti imasmiṃ pañhāvāre anulomato āgato.
analyzed: ha isa pacchājāta paccayo ti imasmin pañhāvāre anulomataḥ āgato

original: 426. Āsevanapaccaye anulomaṃ gotrabhussātiādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇe heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: āsevana paccaye anulomam gotra bhussāti ādīnam visum gahaṇe heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva kāraṇam veditabbam

original: 427. Kammapaccaye kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānanti ettha sahajātanānākkhaṇikavibhāgassa
analyzed: kamma paccaye kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānam ti ettha sahajāta nānā khaṇika vibhāgassa

original: abhāvato sahajātāti na vuttā. Abyākatavissajjane pana so vibhāgo atthi, tasmā tattha
analyzed: abhāvato sahajātā ati na vuttā abyākata vissajjane pana so vibhāgaḥ atthi tasmā tattha

original: vuttā. Paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ vasena kataṃ. Cetanā vatthussāti kiñcāpi
analyzed: vuttā paṭisandhi ggahaṇam kaṭattā rūpānam vasena katam cetanā vatthussa ati kiñcā api

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthupatiṭṭhitā arūpadhammā vatthupaccayā vattanti, cetanā pana
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vatthu patiṭṭhitāḥ arūpa dhammāḥ vatthu paccayāḥ vattanti cetanā pana

original: vatthussāpi paccayoti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vatthussa api paccayaḥ ti dassetum vuttam

original: 428. Vipākapaccaye paṭisandhivāre imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: vipāka paccaye paṭisandhi vāre iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 429-438. Āhārapaccaye imassa kāyassāti imasmiṃ catusantativasena pavatte cātumahābhūtikakāye
analyzed: āhāra paccaye imassa kāyassa ati imasmin catu santati vasena pavatte cātumahābhūtika kāye

original: āhārasamuṭṭhānassa janakavasena, sesassa upatthambhakavasena āhārapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: āhāra samuṭṭhānassa janaka vasena sesassa upatthambhaka vasena āhāra paccayena paccayo

original: Indriyapaccayādīsupi paṭisandhivāro vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: indriya paccaya ādīsu pi paṭisandhi vāraḥ vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ sesam sabbattha uttānattham eva ati

original: Pañhāvāravibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pañhā vāra vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Pañhāvārassa ghaṭane anulomagaṇanā
analyzed: pañhāvārassa ghaṭane anuloma gaṇanā

original: 439. Idānettha yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanāvasena dassetuṃ hetuyā sattātiādi
analyzed: idāni ittha yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanā vasena dassetum hetuyā satta ati ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha sattāti kusalena kusalaṃ, abyākataṃ, kusalābyākatanti tīṇi. Tathā
analyzed: vuttam tattha satta ati kusalena kusalam abyākatam kusala abyākatam tīṇi tathā

original: akusalena; abyākatena abyākatamevāti evaṃ satta. Ārammaṇe navāti ekamūlakaekāvasānāni
analyzed: akusalena abyākatena abyākatam eva ati evam satta ārammaṇe nava ati eka mūlaka eka avasānāni

original: nava. Adhipatiyā dasāti kusalaṃ kusalassa sahajātato ceva ārammaṇato ca; akusalassa
analyzed: nava adhipatiyā dasāti kusalam kusalassa sahajātato ca iva ārammaṇato ca akusalassa

original: ārammaṇatova abyākatassa sahajātato ceva ārammaṇato ca; kusalābyākatassa sahajātatovāti
analyzed: ārammaṇato va abyākatassa sahajātato ca iva ārammaṇato ca kusala abyākatassa sahajātato vā ati

original: kusalamūlakāni cattāri. Akusalaṃ akusalassa sahajātato ceva ārammaṇato ca; abyākatassa
analyzed: kusala mūlakāni cattāri akusalam akusalassa sahajātato ca iva ārammaṇato ca abyākatassa

original: sahajātatova tathā akusalābyākatassāti akusalamūlakāni tīṇi. Abyākato abyākatassa
analyzed: sahajātataḥ va tathā akusala abyākatassa ati akusala mūlakāni tīṇi abyākataḥ abyākatassa

original: sahajātato ceva ārammaṇato ca; kusalassa ārammaṇatova tathā akusalassāti abyākatamūlakāni
analyzed: sahajātataḥ ca iva ārammaṇataḥ ca kusalassa ārammaṇataḥ va tathā akusalassa ati abyākata mūlakāni

original: tīṇīti evaṃ dasa. Ettha pana ārammaṇādhipatipi sattadhā, sahajātādhipatipi sattadhāva labbhati.
analyzed: tīṇi iti evam dasa ettha pana ārammaṇa adhipati sattadhā sahajāta adhipati sattadhā ava labbhati

original: Anantare sattāti kusalamūlakāni dve, tathā akusalamūlakāni, abyākatamūlakāni tīṇīti
analyzed: anantare kusala mūlakāni dve tathā akusala mūlakāni abyākata mūlakāni tīṇi iti

original: evaṃ satta. Samanantarepi etāneva. Sahajāte navāti kusalamūlakāni tīṇi, akusalamūlakāni
analyzed: evam satta samanantare api etān eva sahajāte kusala mūlakāni tīṇi akusala mūlakāni

original: tīṇi, abyākatamūlakaṃ ekaṃ, tathā kusalābyākatamūlakaṃ, akusalābyākatamūlakañcāti
analyzed: tīṇi abyākata mūlakam ekam tathā kusala abyākata mūlakam akusala abyākata mūlakam ca ati

original: evaṃ nava. Aññamaññe tīṇīti kusalena kusalaṃ, akusalena akusalaṃ, abyākatena abyākatanti
analyzed: evam nava aññamaññe tīṇi iti kusalena kusalam akusalena akusalam abyākatena abyākatanti

original: evaṃ tīṇi. Nissaye terasāti sahajātatova kusalamūlakāni tīṇi, tathā akusalamūlakāni,
analyzed: evam tīṇi nissaye sahajātataḥ va kusala mūlakāni tīṇi tathā akusala mūlakāni

original: tathā abyākatamūlakāni. Ettha pana purejātampi labbhati. Abyākatañhi abyākatassa
analyzed: tathā abyākata mūlakāni ettha pana purejātam pi labbhati abyākatam hi abyākatassa

original: sahajātampi hoti purejātampi; kusalassa purejātameva tathā akusalassa. Puna kusalābyākato
analyzed: sahajātam pi hoti purejātam pi kusalassa purejātam eva tathā akusalassa puna kusala abyākato

original: sahajātapurejātato kusalassa, sahajātatova abyākatassa, tathā akusalābyākatoti evaṃ
analyzed: sahajāta purejātataḥ kusalassa sahajātataḥ va abyākatassa tathā akusala abyākata ti evam

original: terasa. Upanissaye navāti ekamūlakekāvasānā nava. Tesaṃ vibhaṅge tevīsati bhedā dassitā.
analyzed: terasaḥ upanissaye nava ati eka mūlaka ikā avasānāḥ nava tesam vibhaṅge tevīsati bhedāḥ dassitā

original: Tesu ārammaṇūpanissaye satta, anantarūpanissaye satta, pakatūpanissaye nava honti.
analyzed: tesu ārammaṇa upanissaye satta anantara upanissaye satta pakata upanissaye nava honti

original: Purejāte tīṇīti abyākato abyākatassa, kusalassa, akusalassāti evaṃ tīṇi.
analyzed: purejāte tīṇi iti abyākataḥ abyākatassa kusalassa akusalassa ati evam tīṇi

original: Pacchājāte tīṇīti kusalo abyākatassa, akusalo abyākatassa, abyākato abyākatassāti
analyzed: pacchājāte tīṇi iti kusalaḥ abyākatassa akusalaḥ abyākatassa abyākataḥ abyākatassa ati

original: evaṃ tīṇi. Āsevane tīṇi aññamaññasadisāni. Kamme satta hetusadisāni. Tattha dvīsu
analyzed: evam tīṇi āsevane tīṇi aññamañña sadisāni kamme satta hetu sadisāni tattha dvīsu

original: vissajjanesu nānākkhaṇikakammampi āgataṃ, pañcasu sahajātameva. Vipāke ekaṃ abyākatena
analyzed: vissajjanesu nānā kkhaṇika kammam pi āgatam pañcasu sahajātam eva vipāke ekam abyākatena

original: abyākataṃ. Āhāraindriyajhānamaggesu satta hetusadisāneva. Indriyaṃ panettha sahajātapurejātavasena
analyzed: abyākatam āhāra aindriya jhāna maggesu satta hetu sadisāna eva indriyam pana ittha sahajāta purejāta vasena

original: āgataṃ. Sampayutte tīṇi aññamaññasadisāni. Vippayutte pañcāti sahajātapacchājātato
analyzed: āgatam sampayutte tīṇi aññamañña sadisāni vippayutte pañca ati sahajāta pacchājātato

original: kusalena abyākataṃ, akusalena abyākataṃ, sahajātapurejātapacchājātato abyākatena
analyzed: kusalena abyākatam akusalena abyākatam sahajāta purejāta pacchājātataḥ abyākatena

original: abyākataṃ, vatthupurejātato abyākatena kusalaṃ, tathā akusalanti ekaṃ kusalamūlaṃ,
analyzed: abyākatam vatthu purejātataḥ abyākatena kusalam tathā ekam kusala mūlam

original: ekaṃ akusalamūlaṃ, tīṇi abyākatamūlānīti evaṃ pañca.
analyzed: ekam akusala mūlam tīṇi abyākata mūlāni iti evam pañca

original: Atthiyā terasāti sahajātato kusalena kusalaṃ, sahajātapacchājātato kusalena abyākataṃ,
analyzed: sahajātato kusalena kusalam sahajāta pacchājātato kusalena abyākatam

original: sahajātatova kusalena kusalābyākatanti kusalamūlāni tīṇi, tathā akusalamūlāni, sahajātapurejātapacchājātāhārindriyato
analyzed: kusalena kusala mūlāni tīṇi tathā akusala mūlāni sahajāta purejāta pacchājāta āhāra indriyato

original: pana abyākatena abyākataṃ, vatthārammaṇapurejātato abyākatena kusalaṃ, tathā akusalaṃ,
analyzed: pana abyākatena abyākatam vattha ārammaṇa purejātataḥ abyākatena kusalam tathā akusalam

original: sahajātapurejātato kusalo ca abyākato ca akusalassa; sveva abyākatassa sahajātapacchājātaāhārindriyato
analyzed: sahajāta purejātato kusalo ca abyākato ca akusalassa su eva abyākatassa sahajāta pacchājāta āhāra indriyato

original: sahajātapurejātato ca kusalo ca abyākato ca kusalassa; sveva abyākatassa sahajātapacchājātaāhārindriyatoti
analyzed: sahajāta purejātato ca kusalo ca abyākato ca kusalassa su eva abyākatassa sahajāta pacchājāta āhāra indriyato ti

original: evaṃ terasa. Natthivigatesu satta anantarasadisāni. Avigate terasa atthisadisānīti.
analyzed: evam terasa natthi vigatesu satta anantara sadisāni avigate terasa atthi sadisāni iti

original: Evamettha satta gaṇanaparicchedā ekaṃ tīṇi pañca satta nava dasa terasāti. Tesu vipākavasena
analyzed: evam ettha satta gaṇana paricchedāḥ ekam tīṇi pañca satta nava dasa terasā ati tesu vipāka vasena

original: ekameva ekakaṃ, aññamaññapurejātapacchājātāsevanasampayuttavasena pañca tikā, vippayuttavasena
analyzed: ekam eva ekakam aññamañña purejāta pacchājāta āsevana sampayutta vasena pañca tikāḥ vippayutta vasena

original: ekameva pañcakaṃ, hetuanantarasamanantarakammaāhārindriyajhānamagganatthivigatavasena
analyzed: ekam eva pañcakam hetu anantara samanantara kamma āhāra indriya jhāna magga natthi vigata vasena

original: dasa sattakā, ārammaṇasahajātaupanissayavasena tayo navakā, adhipativasena ekaṃ dasakaṃ,
analyzed: dasa sattakāḥ ārammaṇa sahajāta upanissaya vasena tayaḥ navakāḥ adhipati vasena ekam dasakam

original: nissayaatthiavigatavasena tayo terasakāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccaye niddiṭṭhavāre
analyzed: nissaya atthi avigata vasena tayo terasakā ati evam tasmin tasmin paccaye niddiṭṭha vāre

original: gaṇanavasena sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane gaṇanā veditabbā.
analyzed: gaṇana vasena sādhukam sallakkhetvā tesam vasena dukatika ādīsu paccaya saṃsandane gaṇanā veditabbā

original: 440. Ye pana paccayā yesaṃ paccayānaṃ visabhāgā vā viruddhā vā honti, te tehi saddhiṃ

analyzed: kusalam ca atthi avigatesu aṭṭha nissaya sadisāna eva

analyzed: veditabbāni upanissaye ekanti vatthum ārammaṇa upanissayam katvā uppanna akusalam sesam

analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

analyzed: tato parāni dve ananta rūpa nissaya vasena vuttāni tesu gaṇanā pākaṭāya iva tatas dve

analyzed: gahetabbā dutiye lokuttara kusalā ava

original: 473-477. Kammamūlake anantare ekanti maggacetanāvasena vuttaṃ. Aññamaññe tīṇīti ettha
analyzed: kamma mūlake anantare ekam ti magga cetanā vasena vuttam aññamaññe tīṇi iti ettha

original: heṭṭhā vuttāneva. Evaṃ sesānipi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Ettha pana ekādasa

analyzed: uttāna tthānā iva

original: 478-483. Āhāramūlake sattātiādīni vuttanayāneva. Ghaṭanāni panettha catuttiṃsa. Tesu

original: nirādhipativiññāṇāhāravasena. Tato parāni sādhipativiññāṇāhāravasena cha ghaṭanāni

analyzed: lokiyānam vipākānam abhāvataḥ vatthu parihāyati

original: 484-495. Indriyamūlake purejāte ekanti cakkhundriyādīnaṃ vasena abyākatena abyākataṃ.
analyzed: indriya mūlake purejāte cakkhu indriya ādīnam vasena abyākatena abyākatam

original: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ. Tato parāni nava ghaṭanāni sahajātaarūpindriyavasena vuttāni,
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam tatas parāni nava ghaṭanāni sahajāta arūpindriya vasena vuttāni

original: maggasampayuttāni cha, tato amohahetuvasena nirādhipatīni nava, sādhipatīni cha.

analyzed: tesu sabbesu vipāka paccayena ayuttāni ca yuttāni ca heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: 496-500. Jhānamūlakepi dumūlakaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ghaṭanāni panettha
analyzed: jhāna mūlake pi dumūlakam heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam ghaṭanāni pana ittha

analyzed: chattiṃsa tesu paṭhamāni nava indriya magga bhāvam an āmasitvā sādhāraṇa jhā an aṅga vasena iva

original: vuttāni. Tato parāni nava indriyabhūtajhānaṅgavasena, tato nava maggabhūtajhānaṅgavasena,

analyzed: tatas nava indriya magga bhūta jhāna aṅga vasena catūsu pi ca itesu navakesu ādito cattāri

original: Tesu paṭhamāni nava indriyajhānabhāvaṃ anāmasitvā suddhikamaggavaseneva vuttāni.
analyzed: tesu paṭhamāni nava indriya jhāna bhāvam an āmasitvā suddhika magga vasena iva vuttāni

original: 509-510. Sampayuttamūlake dumūlakaṃ uttānatthameva. Ettha pana dveyeva ghaṭanāni. Tattha ekaṃ sādhāraṇavasena, ekaṃ vipākavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sampayutta mūlake du mūlakam uttāna attham eva ettha pana dveyeva ghaṭanāni tattha ekam sādhāraṇa vasena ekam vipāka vasena vuttam

original: Tattha paṭhame pañcāti kusalo abyākatassa, tathā akusalo, abyākato tiṇṇannampi. Ettha

analyzed: sesam dumūlake uttānam eva ghaṭanāni pana ittha tesu paṭhame

analyzed: vasena sahajāta purejāta pacchājāta paccayāḥ labbhanti dutiye pacchājāta kabaḷīkāra āhārā

analyzed: na labbhanti adhipatinā saddhim upari tatiya catutthāni

original: gacchati. Vippayuttapaccayo sahajātapurejātapacchājātabhedato tividho. Tattha sahajātavippayutto

original: sahajātānaññeva vippayuttapaccayabhāvato sahajātapaccaye saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Purejātavippayutto
analyzed: sahajāta anaññā iva vippayutta paccaya bhāvataḥ sahajāta paccaye saṅgaham gacchati purejāta vippayuttaḥ

original: pure uppajjitvā pacchā uppajjamānānaṃ paccayabhāvato purejāte saṅgahito. Pacchājātavippayutto
analyzed: pure uppajjitvā pacchā uppajjamānānam paccaya bhāvato purejāte saṅgahito pacchājāta vippayutto

original: pacchā uppajjitvā pure uppannānaṃ upatthambhanavasena paccayabhāvato pacchājātapaccaye
analyzed: pacchā uppajjitvā pure uppannānam upatthambhana vasena paccaya bhāvato pacchājāta paccaye

original: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Atthipaccayaavigatapaccayā sahajātapurejātapacchājātaāhārindriyānañceva
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati atthi paccaya avigata paccayā sahajāta purejāta pacchājāta āhāra indriyā nañ ca iva

original: atthiavigatesu ca ekekassa vasena chahi bhedehi ṭhitā. Tattha sahajātaatthiavigatā
analyzed: atthi avigatesu ca ekekassa vasena chahi bhedehi ṭhitā tattha sahajāta atthi avigatā

original: sahajātānaññeva atthiavigatapaccayabhāvato. Sahajātapaccaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Purejātā
analyzed: sahajāta anaññā iva atthi avigata paccaya bhāvato sahajāta paccaye saṅgaham gacchanti purejātā

original: pure uppajjitvā pacchā uppajjamānānaṃ paccayabhāvato purejātapaccaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: pure uppajjitvā pacchā uppajjamānānam paccaya bhāvataḥ purejāta paccaye saṅgaham gacchanti

original: Pacchājātā pacchā uppajjitvā pure uppannānaṃ upatthambhanavasena paccayabhāvato pacchājātapaccaye
analyzed: pacchājātā pacchā uppajjitvā pure uppannānam upatthambhana vasena paccaya bhāvato pacchājāta paccaye

original: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Āhārabhūtā kabaḷīkārāhārapaccaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Indriyabhūtā
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchanti āhāra bhūtā kabaḷīkāra āhāra paccaye saṅgaham gacchanti indriya bhūtā

original: rūpajīvitindriyapaccaye saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti evaṃ ime soḷasa paccayā imesu aṭṭhasu
analyzed: rūpa jīvita indriya paccaye saṅgaham gacchanti iti evam ime soḷasa paccayāḥ imesu aṭṭhasu

original: paccayesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: paccayesu saṅgaham gacchanti iti veditabbā

original: Imesampi pana aṭṭhannaṃ paccayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅgaho atthiyeva. Ādito niddiṭṭho
analyzed: imesam pi pana aṭṭhannam paccayānam aññamaññam saṅgahaḥ atthiyā iva āditaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: hi ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatianadhipatibhedena duvidho. Tattha adhipatibhūto ārammaṇūpanissayalakkhaṇena
analyzed: hi ārammaṇa paccayaḥ adhipati anadhipati bhedena duvidhaḥ tattha adhipati bhūtaḥ ārammaṇa upanissaya lakkhaṇena

original: upanissaye saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Anadhipatibhūto suddho ārammaṇapaccayova. Kammapaccayopi
analyzed: upanissaye saṅgaham gacchati anadhipati bhūtaḥ suddhaḥ ārammaṇa paccayaḥ uva kamma paccayaḥ pi

original: sahajātanānākkhaṇikavasena duvidho. Tattha sahajātakammaṃ attanā sahajātānaññeva
analyzed: sahajāta nānā khaṇika vasena duvidhaḥ tattha sahajāta kammam attanā

original: kammapaccayabhāvato sahajāteyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Nānākkhaṇikakammaṃ balavadubbalavasena
analyzed: kamma paccaya bhāvataḥ sahajātā iya iva saṅgaham gacchati nānā khaṇika kammam balavat ubbala vasena

original: duvidhaṃ. Tattha balavakammaṃ vipākadhammānaṃ upanissayova hutvā paccayo hotīti upanissaye
analyzed: duvidham tattha balava kammam vipāka dhammānam upanissayaḥ uva hutvā paccayaḥ hoti iti upanissaye

original: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Balavampi pana rūpānaṃ dubbalañca arūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayeneva
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati balavam pi pana rūpānam dubbalam ca arūpānam nānākkhaṇika kamma paccayena iva

original: paccayo. Āhārapaccayopi rūpārūpato duvidho. Tattha arūpāhāro attanā sahajātānaññeva
analyzed: paccayaḥ āhāra paccayaḥ api rūpa arūpataḥ duvidhaḥ tattha arūpa āhāraḥ attanā

original: paccayo hotīti sahajātapaccaye saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Rūpāhāro sahajātapurejātapacchājātānaṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti iti sahajāta paccaye saṅgaham gacchati rūpa āhāraḥ sahajāta purejāta pacchājātānam

original: paccayo na hoti. Attano pana uppādakkhaṇaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitippatto āhārapaccayataṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ na hoti attanaḥ pana uppāda khaṇam atikkamitvā ṭhiti ppattaḥ āhāra paccaya tam

original: sādhetīti āhārapaccayova hoti. Indriyapaccayopi rūpārūpato duvidho. Tattha arūpindriyapaccayo
analyzed: sādheti iti āhāra paccayaḥ uva hoti indriya paccayaḥ pi rūpa arūpataḥ duvidhaḥ tattha arūpin indriya paccayo

original: attanā sahajātānaññeva indriyapaccayataṃ sādhetīti sahajāteyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: attanā sahajātā anaññā iva indriya paccaya tam sādheti iti sahajātā iya iva saṅgaham gacchati

original: Rūpindriyapaccayo pana ajjhattabahiddhābhedato duvidho. Tattha ajjhattaṃ indriyapaccayo
analyzed: rūpa indriya paccayaḥ pana ajjhatta bahiddhā bhedataḥ duvidhaḥ tattha ajjhattam indriya paccayo

original: pure uppajjitvā pacchā uppajjamānānaṃ sasampayuttadhammānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ indriyapaccayo
analyzed: pure uppajjitvā pacchā uppajjamānānam sa sampayutta dhammānam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam indriya paccayaḥ

original: hotīti purejāteyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Bāhiro indriyapaccayo nāma rūpajīvitindriyaṃ,
analyzed: hoti iti purejātā iya iva saṅgaham gacchati bāhiraḥ indriya paccayaḥ nāma rūpa jīvitindriyam

original: taṃ sahajātānaṃ paccayo hontampi anupālanamattavaseneva hoti, na janakavasenāti indriyapaccayova
analyzed: tam sahajātānam paccayaḥ hontam pi anupālana matta vasena iva hoti na janaka vasena ati indriya paccayaḥ uva

original: hoti. Evaṃ ime aṭṭha paccayā aññamaññampi saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā. Ayaṃ tāva
analyzed: hoti evam ime aṭṭha paccayāḥ aññam aññam pi saṅgaham gacchanti iti veditabbā ayam tāva

original: aṭṭhasu paccayesu avasesānaṃ soḷasannañceva tesaṃyeva ca aṭṭhannaṃ aññamaññavasena saṅgahanayo.
analyzed: aṭṭhasu paccayesu avasesānam soḷasannam ca iva tesam yeva ca aṭṭhannam aññamañña vasena saṅgahanayo

original: Idāni imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ paccayānaṃ ekekasmiṃ catuvīsatiyāpi paccayesu ye ye saṅgahaṃ
analyzed: idāni imesam aṭṭhannam paccayānam ekekasmin catuvīsatiyā api paccayesu ye ye saṅgaham

original: gacchanti, te te veditabbā. Tattha aṭṭhannaṃ tāva sabbapaṭhame ārammaṇapaccaye ārammaṇapaccayova
analyzed: gacchanti te te veditabbā tattha aṭṭhannam tāva sabba paṭhame ārammaṇa paccaye ārammaṇa paccayo uva

original: saṅgahaṃ gacchati, na sesā tevīsati. Dutiye sahajātapaccaye hetupaccayo sahajātādhipatipaccayo
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati na sesā tevīsati dutiye sahajāta paccaye hetu paccayo sahajāta adhipati paccayo

analyzed: sahajāta āhāra paccayaḥ sahajāta aindriya paccayaḥ jhāna paccayaḥ magga paccayaḥ sampayutta paccayaḥ

analyzed: sahajāta vippayutta paccayo sahajāta atthi paccayo sahajāta avigata paccayo ti ime pannarasa

analyzed: paccayā saṅgaham gacchanti tatiye upanissaya paccaye adhipati bhūtaḥ ārammaṇa paccayo

analyzed: balava kamma paccayaḥ natthi paccayaḥ vigata paccayaḥ ti ime nava paccayā saṅgaham gacchanti

original: Catutthe purejātapaccaye purejātanissayapaccayo purejātapaccayo purejātindriyapaccayo
analyzed: catutthe purejāta paccaye purejāta nissaya paccayo purejāta paccayo purejāta indriya paccayo

analyzed: saṅgaham gacchanti pañcame pacchājāta paccaye pacchājāta paccayo pacchājāta vippayutta paccayo

original: gahitāva hontīti veditabbā.
analyzed: gahitāḥ ava honti iti veditabbā

analyzed: ime pannarasa pañhā uddharitvā vissajjitā tattha kusalaḥ kusalassa kusalaḥ akusalassa

analyzed: kusalaḥ abyākatassa kusalaḥ kusala abyākatassa ati kusala ādikā cattāro pañhā tathā akusala ādikā

original: abyākato pana abyākatassa, abyākato kusalassa, abyākato akusalassāti abyākatādikā
analyzed: abyākataḥ pana abyākatassa abyākataḥ kusalassa abyākataḥ akusalassa ati abyākata ādikā

original: tayo; kusalo ca abyākato ca kusalassa; tathā abyākatassa; akusalo ca abyākato ca
analyzed: tayo kusalo ca abyākato ca kusalassa tathā abyākatassa akusalo ca abyākato ca

original: akusalassa; tathā abyākatassāti dumūlakekāvasānā cattāro honti. Tesu paṭhame pañhe
analyzed: akusalassa tathā a byākatassa ati du mūla kekā avasānā cattāro honti tesu paṭhame pañhe

analyzed: yehi bhavitabbam te sabbe saṅgahetvā tayo paccayāḥ vuttāḥ dutiye dve tatiye pañca

original: catutthe ekova pañcame tayo, chaṭṭhe dve, sattame pañca, aṭṭhame ekova navame satta,
analyzed: catutthe ekaḥ uva pañcame tayaḥ chaṭṭhe dve sattame pañca aṭṭhame ekaḥ uva navame satta

original: dasame tayo, ekādasame tayo, dvādasame dve, terasame cattāro, cuddasame dve, pannarasamepi
analyzed: dasame tayaḥ ekādasame tayaḥ dvādasame dve terasame cattāro cuddasame dve pannarasame pi

original: cattārova. Te “sahajātapaccayenā”ti avatvā “sahajātaṃ pacchājāta”nti vuttā. Tattha
analyzed: cattāro va te sahajāta paccayena ati avatvā sahajātam pacchājātanti vuttā tattha

original: kāraṇaṃ parato vakkhāma.
analyzed: kāraṇam paratas vakkhāma

original: Samāsato panettha eko dve tayo cattāro pañca sattāti chaḷeva paccayaparicchedā honti.
analyzed: samāsatas pana ittha ekaḥ dve tayo cattāro pañca sattā ati chaṭ eva paccaya paricchedāḥ honti

original: Ayaṃ pañhāvārassa paccanīye ukkaṭṭhavasena pañhāparicchedo ceva te te paccaye saṅgahetvā
analyzed: ayam pañhāvārassa paccanīye ukkaṭṭha vasena pañhā paricchedo ca iva te te paccaye saṅgahetvā

original: ekapaccanīyepi ito uddhaṃ pañhā vā paccayā vā na labbhanti, heṭṭhā labbhanti. Tasmā
analyzed: eka paccanīye pi itas uddham pañhāḥ vā paccayāḥ vā na labbhanti heṭṭhā labbhanti tasmā

original: yesu pañhesu “kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: yesu pañhesu kusalaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo”ti evaṃ ekova paccayo āgato, tasmiṃ paccaye paṭikkhitte te pañhā parihāyanti.
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti evam ekaḥ iva paccayaḥ āgato tasmin paccaye paṭikkhitte te pañhāḥ parihāyanti

original: Yasmiṃ pana pañhe “kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo upanissayapaccayena
analyzed: yasmin pana pañhe kusalaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena

original: paccayo”ti evaṃ dve paccayā āgatā. Tattha nārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ ekasmiṃ paccaye
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti evam dve paccayāḥ āgatā tattha na ārammaṇa paccayā ati evam ekasmim paccaye

original: paṭikkhittepi itarassa paccayassa vasena so pañho labbhateva. Tesu pana dvīsupi paccayesu
analyzed: paṭikkhitte pi itarassa paccayassa vasena so pañhaḥ labbhateva tesu pana dvīsu pi paccayesu

original: Sabbesu pana paccayesu paṭikkhittesu sabbepi te vārā pacchijjantīti idameva cettha
analyzed: sabbesu pana paccayesu paṭikkhittesu sabbe api te vārāḥ pacchijjanti iti idam eva ca ittha

original: lakkhaṇaṃ. Iminā lakkhaṇena ādito paṭṭhāya tesu tesu pañhesu saṅkhipitvā vuttapaccayānaṃ
analyzed: lakkhaṇam iminā lakkhaṇena āditaḥ paṭṭhāya tesu tesu pañhesu saṅkhipitvā vutta paccayānam

original: pabhedo ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccanīye tesaṃ tesaṃ pañhānaṃ parihāni ca veditabbā.
analyzed: pabhedaḥ ca tasmim tasmim paccanīye tesam tesam pañhānam ca veditabbā

original: Tatrāyaṃ vitthārakathā – paṭhamapañhe tāva tīhi paccayehi ekūnavīsati paccayā dassitā.
analyzed: tatra ayam vitthāra kathā paṭhama pañhe tāva tīhi paccayehi ekūnavīsati paccayā dassitā

original: Kathaṃ? Kusalo hi kusalassa purejātapacchājātavipākavippayutteheva paccayo na hoti,
analyzed: katham kusalaḥ hi kusalassa purejāta pacchājāta vipāka vippayuttehi iva paccayaḥ na hoti

analyzed: sesehi vīsatiyā hoti tesu ārammaṇa paccayo ekaḥ eva sahajāte pana sabba saṅgāhika vasena

original: pannarasa paccayā saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vuttā. Tesu hetupaccaye paṭikkhitte cuddasa

original: honti. Kusalo pana kusalassa neva vipākapaccayo na, vippayuttapaccayoti te dve apanetvā

original: nava paccayā saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vuttā. Tesu adhipatibhūto ārammaṇapaccayo ārammaṇabhūto

original: ca adhipatipaccayo ārammaṇūpanissayavasena upanissayameva anupaviṭṭho. Kusalo pana

original: dhammaṃ paṭicca vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayāti ayaṃ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca vissajjanam veditabbam abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā ati ayaṃ

original: pana pañho “vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
analyzed: pana pañhaḥ vipāka abyākatam kiriyā abyākatam ekam khandham paṭicca tayo khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānañca

original: rūpa”nti vissajjitova. Iti sabbapañhesu avissajjitassa atthānurūpaṃ vissajjitassa
analyzed: iti sabba pañhesu a vissajjitassa attha anurūpam vissajjitassa

original: ca pāḷiāgatameva vissajjanaṃ. Ekekasmiñca tikaduke vārappabhedapaccayagaṇanavidhānaṃ
analyzed: ca pāḷi āgatam eva vissajjanam eka ekasmin ca tika duke vāra ppabheda paccaya gaṇana vidhānam

original: sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam heṭṭhā vutta naya anusārena iva veditabbam

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ dukuttamaṃ,
analyzed: tikam ca paṭṭhāna varam duk uttamam

original: Dukaṃ tikañceva tikaṃ dukañca;
analyzed: dukam tikam ca iva tikam dukam ca

original: Tikaṃ tikañceva dukaṃ dukañca,
analyzed: tikam tikam ca iva dukam dukam ca

original: Cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrāti. –
analyzed: cha paccanīya anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā ati

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttagāthāya dīpitā. Dhammapaccanīyānulomapaṭṭhāne cha nayā niddiṭṭhā
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam vutta gāthāya dīpitā dhamma paccanīya anuloma paṭṭhāne cha nayāḥ niddiṭṭhā

original: honti. Paccayavasena panettha ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne anulomādayo cattāro cattāro nayāti
analyzed: honti paccaya vasena pana ittha ekekasmin paṭṭhāne anuloma ādayo cattāro cattāro

original: ekena pariyāyena catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ paccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānaññeva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ekena pariyāyena catuvīsati naya paṭimaṇḍitam paccanīya anuloma paṭṭhānaññā iva veditabbam

original: Paccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paccanīya anuloma paṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: Evaṃ dhammānulomādivasena catūsu vāresu ekekasmiṃ catuvīsatiyā catuvīsatiyā nayānaṃ
analyzed: evam dhamma anuloma ādi vasena catūsu vāresu ekekasmin catuvīsatiyā catuvīsatiyā

original: vasena channavuti nayā honti. Tattha paccayanaye aggahetvā ekekasmiṃ paṭṭhāne tikadukādīnaññeva
analyzed: vasena channavuti nayāḥ honti tattha paccaya naye aggahetvā ekekasmin paṭṭhāne

original: channaṃ channaṃ nayānaṃ vasenetaṃ catuvīsatinayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: channam channam nayānam vasena itam catuvīsati naya paṭimaṇḍitam samanta paṭṭhāna mahā apakaraṇam

original: veditabbaṃ. Keci pana “kusalārammaṇo dhammo akusalārammaṇo dhammo”tiādinā nayena
analyzed: veditabbam keci pana kusala ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ akusala ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ iti ādinā nayena

original: ārammaṇamātikaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā “kusalārammaṇo dhammo kusalārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
analyzed: ārammaṇa mātikam nāma ṭhapetvā kusala ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ kusala ārammaṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena

original: paccayo”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassetvā aparampi phassādīnaṃ vasenapi
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti ādinā nayena ārammaṇa paṭṭhānam nāma dassetvā aparam pi phassa ādīnam vasena api

original: phassapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma uddharitvā dassenti. Taṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāsu sandissatīti
analyzed: phassapaṭṭhānam nāma uddharitvā dassenti tam na iva pāḷiyam na aṭṭhakathāsu sandissati iti

original: idha na vicāritaṃ. Saṅgītiāruḷhapāḷivaseneva panettha vaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā.
analyzed: na vicāritam saṅgīti āruḷha pāḷi vasena iva pana ittha vaṇṇanā katā iti veditabbā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Sammūḷhā yattha pajā, tantākulādibhāvamāpannā;
analyzed: sammūḍhā yattha pajā tantākula ādi bhāvam āpannā

original: Nekavidhadukkhagahanaṃ, saṃsāraṃ nātivattanti.
analyzed: nekavidha dukkha gahanam saṃsāram na ativattanti

original: Paccayabhede kusalo, loke garutampi paccayākāraṃ;
analyzed: paccaya bhede kusalaḥ loke paccaya ākāram

original: Atinippuṇagambhīraṃ, javanabbhūmiṃ buddhañāṇassa.
analyzed: ati nippuṇa gambhīram java nabbhūmim buddha ñāṇassa

original: Kusalādidhammabhedaṃ, nissāya nayehi vividhagaṇanehi;
analyzed: kusala ādi dhamma bhedam nissāya nayehi vividha gaṇanehi

original: Vitthārento sattama-mabhidhammappakaraṇaṃ satthā.
analyzed: vitthārento sattamam abhidhammappakaraṇam satthā

original: Suvihitasanniṭṭhāno, paṭṭhānaṃ nāma yaṃ pakāsesi;
analyzed: su vihita sanniṭṭhānaḥ paṭṭhānam nāma yam pakāsesi

original: Saddhāya samāraddhā, yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassa.
analyzed: saddhāya samāraddhā yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassa

original: Ācariyānaṃ vādaṃ, avihāya vibhajjavādisissānaṃ;
analyzed: ācariyānam vādam a vihāya vibhajja vādi sissānam

original: Atibahuvidhantarāye, lokamhi anantarāyena.
analyzed: an antarāyena

original: Sā evaṃ ajja katā, cuddasamattehi bhāṇavārehi;
analyzed: sā evam ajja katā cuddasa mattehi bhāṇa vārehi

original: Atthaṃ pakāsayantī, paṭṭhānavarassa sakalassa.
analyzed: attham pakāsayantī paṭṭhāna varassa sakalassa

original: Sanniṭṭhānaṃ pattā yatheva niṭṭhaṃ tathā bahujanassa;
analyzed: sanniṭṭhānam pattāḥ yathā iva niṭṭham tathā bahu janassa

original: Sampāpuṇantu sīghaṃ, kalyāṇā sabbasaṅkappā.
analyzed: sampāpuṇantu sīgham kalyāṇā sabba saṅkappā

original: Ettāvatā –
analyzed: ettāvatā

original: Sattappakaraṇaṃ nātho, abhidhammamadesayi;
analyzed: satta ppakaraṇam nātho abhidhammam adesayi

original: Devātidevo devānaṃ, devalokamhi yaṃ pure.
analyzed: devātidevaḥ yam pure

original: Tassa aṭṭhakathā esā, sakalassāpi niṭṭhitā;
analyzed: tassa aṭṭhakathā esā sakalassa api niṭṭhitā

original: Ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ dhammassa, niṭṭhapentena taṃ mayā.
analyzed: cira ṭṭhita ttham dhammassa niṭṭhapentena tam mayā

original: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
analyzed: yam pattam kusalam tassa ānubhāvena pāṇinaḥ

original: Sabbe saddhammarājassa, ñatvā dhammaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
analyzed: sabbe saddhammarājassa ñatvā dhammam sukha āvaham

original: Pāpuṇantu visuddhāya, sukhāya paṭipattiyā;
analyzed: pāpuṇantu visuddhāya sukhāya paṭipattiyā

original: Asokamanupāyāsaṃ, nibbānasukhamuttamaṃ.
analyzed: asokam anupāyāsam nibbāna sukham uttamam

original: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
analyzed: ciram tiṭṭhatu saddhammaḥ dhamme hontu sa gāravā

original: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu.
analyzed: sabbe api sattā kālena sammā devaḥ pavassatu

original: Yathā rakkhiṃsu porāṇā, surājāno tathevimaṃ;
analyzed: yathā rakkhiṃsu porāṇā su rājāno

original: Rājā rakkhatu dhammena, attanova pajaṃ pajanti.
analyzed: rājā rakkhatu dhammena attanā uva pajam pajanti

original: Paṭṭhānappakaraṇa-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna ppakaraṇa aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā

original: Niṭṭhitā ca pañcapakaraṇaṭṭhakathāti.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca pañca pakaraṇa ṭṭhakathā ti

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyapaṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
analyzed: parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīla ācāra java maddava ādi guṇa samudaya samuditena

original: sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede
analyzed: saka samaya samaya antara gahana ajjhogāhaṇa samatthena paññā veyyattiya samannāgatena ti piṭaka pariyat tippa bhede

original: sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena mahāveyyākaraṇena karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanalāvaṇṇayuttena
analyzed: sa aṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihata ñāṇa ppabhāvena mahā veyyākaraṇena karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacana lāvaṇṇa yuttena

original: yuttamuttavādinā vādīvarena mahākavinā pabhinnapaṭisambhidāparivāre chaḷabhiññādippabhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍite
analyzed: yutta mutta vādinā vādīvarena mahā kavinā pabhinna paṭisambhidā parivāre chaṣ abhiññā ādi pabheda guṇa paṭimaṇḍite

original: uttarimanussadhamme suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
analyzed: uttari manussa dhamme su patiṭṭhita buddhīnam thera vaṃsa ppadīpānam therānam mahāvihāra vāsīnam

original: vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
analyzed: vaṃsa alaṅkāra bhūtena vipula visuddha buddhinā buddha ghosaḥ iti garūhi gahita nāmadheyyena

original: therena katā ayaṃ sakalassapi abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā –
analyzed: therena katā ayam sakalassa api abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā

original: Tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, lokanittharaṇesinaṃ;
analyzed: tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmim loka nittharaṇa īsinam

original: Dassentī kulaputtānaṃ, nayaṃ paññāvisuddhiyā.
analyzed: dassentī kula puttānam nayam paññā visuddhiyā

original: Yāva buddhoti nāmampi, suddhacittassa tādino;
analyzed: yāva buddhaḥ ti nāmam pi suddhacittassa tādinaḥ

original: Lokamhi lokajeṭṭhassa, pavattati mahesinoti.
analyzed: lokamhi loka jeṭṭhassa pavattati mahesino ti

original: Abhidhammapiṭaka-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: abhidhamma piṭaka aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā
